column23: An excellent essay! Good job!

column1: 78&Plants can provide food, shelter, clothing, or medicine. What is one kind of plant that is important to your or the people in your country? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice
column3: <IN>Plants are very important commodity in people¡¯s lives that people eat and use plants everyday. <TR>Therefore</TR>, accustomed plants show one¡¯s nature and culture; because growth of plants depends on the nature like climate and soils, and people use that plant in their daily lives. <TS>In Korea, one of the staple plants is ginseng since it has been used for medicine, food and articles of trade.</TS></IN> <BO1><MI1>To begin with, ginseng has been the best plant to heal seriously ill people.</MI1> <SI1>Ginseng helps to improve the body condition of patients so that he/she can be recovered quickly. <EX>When I get a flu, I don¡¯t take other medicine but ginseng tea because it does not only cure the cold but make my body stronger.</EX> Ginseng does not have any bad effect that people take this even when they are well, for it helps to maintain health. Many Koreans take ginseng as a tonic.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>To continue, ginseng is used in various cooking.</MI2> <SI2>People drink ginseng tea not only because it is good for health but also because it tastes good. Ginseng is also used for savory that it gets rid of the bad smell and taste. <EX><TR>For instance</TR>, my mom put ginseng in chicken soup to make it tasty and healthy.</EX> Ginseng can be added to any food like rice, noddle, soup and meat cooking, helping to improve the quality of the food.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, ginseng has been one of the best exports to trade with other countries.</MI3> <SI3>Ginseng used to be the best commodity to trade with neighboring countries like China and Japan, and it had been big help to Korea economics when Korea was poor. Now, Korean Ginseng is known for the best quality and suitable price that it is sold to all over the world, helping to enhance the economic as well as the national pride.</SI3></BO3><CO>Ginseng is very important Plant for Koreans because it serves as medicine, food and exports, helping Koreans in various ways. I believe that ginseng¡¯s roles as staple commodity would not be disappeared easily in Korea.</CO>
column23: An excellent and informative essay! Good job!

column1: 79&A person you know is planning to move to your town or city. What do you think this person would like and dislike about living in your town or city? Why? Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3: <IN><TS>Our town is located in the side of the Capitol of Korea, Seoul. So, it has the advatage of both city and countryside.</TS> While people in our town can use the convinient facilities such as public transportaion system, department stores, gyms and so on easily, It is surrounded by mountain along with brook in contrast to other cities. For that reason, I'm sure that people which move into my town get to love it very much.</IN><BO1><MI1>The station for subway is near my home town.</MI1> <SI1>It spends 4 or 5 minues in walk, and many bus pass by it every day. So, There is few place where people can't go without their own car. Especially, because the road in my town is broad and good to drive and the town is not located in center of Seoul, there is few traffic jam. Anyone can use a fast bus.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Because our town is convinient to use transportaion system as I mentioned above, it has many convinient facilities.</MI2> <SI2>I can buy my necessary things easily because department is not remote from my town. Because many facilities such as theater, gym for entertaionment and rest are placed near, when I get depressed or want to refresh, I can easily use it.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>In addtion to above advatage as a town in city, it has a good point many other cities don't have.</MI3> <SI3>Because it has a big mountain, which is called Mountain An, I can feel happy in fresh air there and sometimes go there to have a feeling which I can't get in usual life. It also has a brook. Seoul announced that the brook is the one of the best pure in it. These things give a peculiar and beautiful view which can't be seen in other countries.</SI3></BO3><CO>Almost all people which visit my town were suprised with the convinience and the town's view. They always say that I am a happy person because I live in the best place to live. I am certain that once people move to my town, they will be satisfied necessarily.</CO>
column23: A very good essay. Nice job.

column1: 80&Businesses should hire employees for their entire lives. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Modern society is specialized in variable filed. So many company are established, and businesses is not responsibility for employees as much as past. <TS>But I think that businesses should hire employees for their entire lives because employees have affection to company and make an effort to make harmony with coworker.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, if businesses would hire employees for their entire lives, employees have more affection than not that.</MI1> <SI1>One of the greatest concerns among employ employees ees is lay-off. Lay-off is increased in modern society. So Many employees are always worried and have stress because of lay-off. If businesses wouldn¡¯t hire employees for their entire lives, employees often feel fear about when they will lay-off. Thus they search the better new job if they have chances. Then the efficiency of work decrease as a result of the total profit in company is not good.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, if employees know that businesses would hire employees for their entire lives, they make an effort to make harmony with coworker.</MI2> <SI2>Employees regard company as self-company in all life so that they do best to make harmony with coworker. Unless hiring employee for their entire lives, they have not concern except their work. The most important thing is a cooperation to do project but if they work only their work in team, they don¡¯t get a better result than cooperating team. In the manner, work is carried throughout cooperation, then businesses should make a condition to cooperate other employees.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I agree that Businesses should hire employees for their entire lives in view of development in the future company. If businesses guarantee to hire employees for their entire lives, employees is hard working with love of company and each employee is harmony with one goal to develop company.</CO>
column23: An excellent essay! Great work! Take the "but" out of your thesis statement to make it stronger.

column1: 81&Why do you think people visit museums?
column3: <IN>When people usually visit a new place, they go to a museum. Why do people go there? When I was a school girl, I visited a museum which teachers chose to go there. The teachers told me that if I go to a new place, I call on a museum. I had no idea that time, but now I probably know that reason. that is because I know history, and culture which people who live there have made. Also I can acquire knowledge of various fields. <TS>Visiting a museum enable me to meet new people, conditions, and so on.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I come at history and culture relating to the place.</MI1> <SI1>When I visited seoul, I go to National Museum of Korea. There are many antique things such as tools, potteries, and so on. I was glad that I saw those things. Those were things which I had seen at a book. Seoul was the place where prehistorical people lived and the place which was the center of korea for 600 years. I can know those through visiting the museum.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, I am able to learn living manner of old men, and tools that the men used.</MI2> <SI2>Moreover I can acquire information in relation to clothes that the men wore. That I know those things make me happy. That is why I can come close to them, so I can understand them.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, I enjoy myself meeting new people, fresh environments, and so on.</MI3> <SI3>Although I might be annoyed because of no adapting to new roads and new food, I can win those matter. I obtain energy by going there. I can make myself develop through things in the museum. they enable me to think many things with a variety of views. As I need a stir, I travel a strange place where I can change myself to the other. That is a mirth to me.</SI3></BO3><CO>A travel make us develop now that it has information, culture, wisdom. So, many people go to a museum which people collect antique things. The things in the museum is not dead. Rather they are active, and inform us of things that we need to think. we can learn history, culture through looking at the things in the museum. Also because we can acquire manner of old people, we go to a museum. I want to go overseas so that I meet new things that another country have in museums.</CO>
column23: You have written a very good essay! I think your first and second main paragraphs are similar enough that you should combine them.

column1: 82&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Attending a live performance (for example, a play, concert or sporting event) is more enjoyable than watching the game event on television. Use specific reasons and example to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>I disagree with this statement that attending a live performance is more enjoyable than watching the game event on TV. Some people go to stadium to see the baseball, soccer game and go to concert hall to listen the live music. Other people, meanwhile, prefer to watch the game and concert on TV. <TS>Even though seeing the live performance has a lot of merits, I will explain why I think watching on TV is much more joyful than live through the use of specific reasons and several examples.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I can save lots of money and time wasted on the street.</MI1> <SI1><TR> Actually</TR>, the price of a concert ticket or sport game ticket is far more expensive than I expected. For an instant, in the 2002 Korea Japan World cup game, the price of the semi-final game was 2000,000 won. It is about twice as much as the salary of a young man. I also have to pay a lot on Concert ticket. If I see the performance on TV, this charge is unnecessary. <TR>In addition</TR>, I also waste much time on the street when I move. Watching TV doesn¡¯t need this kind of wasting time because I can watch TV at home.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, watching TV at home is more comfortable than attending a live performance.</MI2> <SI2>If I go to concert hall to listen a nice music, I have to listen not only beautiful music but also the noises of the crowd. <TR>However,</TR> the audio system of TV only catch the sound of music. <EX>For another example, in the stadium, I cannot see the player¡¯s face closely. In the latest World Cup, I have been Inchon stadium to see the players minutely, yet I couldn¡¯t recognize the players¡¯ face. In contrast, I can see the detailed action of them.</EX> <TR>Furthermore</TR>, watching TV at home on the sofa is more relaxing than being in the crowd.</SI2></BO2><CO>Even so, people say that there is special atmosphere in the concert hall or stadium which I cannot feel on TV. It certainly does, but by the development of audio and camera technique, I can see the subtle motions and listen to the fine sound on TV. I weigh the advantages of watching TV with these reasons.</CO>
column23: You have written a very good essay. Strengthen your thesis statement and it will be perfect!

column1: 83&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Some People believe that parents are not always the best teachers and there are many other good teachers in our life. <TS>I partly agree that they are not always the best teachers.</TS> <TR>However</TR> ,I think that parents still can teach us many important things in our life like love, companionship and so on.</IN><BO1><MI1>In family, We not only learn about basic things like eating, toddling, and other fundmental skills in childhood, but also be provided of nessary advises and criticism by parents as we grow up.</MI1> <SI1>Other people cannot be such an important role of us, for they are not as emotionally close as our parents in general.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR>parents often express their affections to their childeren to let children feel love.</MI2> <SI2>It is undoudtly important for children to know what love and affections are.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>Actually recent research shows us that many criminals' famillies are lack of one of their parents or both of them.</MI3> <SI3>The criminals couldn't do good in both school and society without parents, and committed the crime in the end. It clearly shows us the important role of parents.</SI3></BO3><CO>Parents cannot always give us the best directions and advises. They do make mistake as we do. <TR>However</TR>,they can teach us many consequence things when we're children. They are also our closest people who can give us essential advises and most importantly, let us know what love is.</CO>
column23: This essay makes it seem like you haven't really thought about the subject. Your first two main paragraphs are very short with little to no evidence. Your third main paragraph doesn't really give us any substantial evidence, just an accusation that we have to take your word for. Finally, you don't really choose a side. You need to choose a side to write an essay like this. Consider these things and try again.

column1: 84&Some people prefer to spend time with one or two close friends. Others choose to spend time with a large number of friends. Compare the advantages of each choice. Which of these two ways of spending time do you prefer? Use specific reasons to support your anwser.
column3: <IN>There are two kinds of people in a society. One spends time with one or two close friends and the other spends time with a large number of friends.<TS> I prefer to spend my time with a large group of my friends because I can have various kinds of friends and get new information from them.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Getting along with one or two close friends may have some good points such as a deep relationship between friends and getting closer to each other. </MI1> <SI1><TR>However</TR>, people like that would limit thier relationships with other people.<TR> Also</TR>, they might feel isolated by getting along with thw same, old friends every day. <TR>Besides</TR>, it would be hard for people to get new informatiln if they spent time with only one or two close friends.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI1><TR>On the other hand</TR>, getting along with a large number of friends enables people to widen their relationship and share new information together.</MI1> <SI1>They can experience new people and get to know their characteristics, so they can share thier thoughts and get to understand them more by spending time with them. <TR>Therefore</TR>,they can become open-minded persons. <TR>Also</TR>, they can share news and information that are useful in their lives by meeting various kinds of friends.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Thus</TR>, I choose to spend time with a large number of friends. I believe that getting along with various people would give me good skills to help me make better relationships with people.</CO>
column23: Good job! Nice work on your essay.

column1: 85&Decisions can be made quickly, or they can be made after careful thought. Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? The decisions that people make quickly are always wrong. Use reasons and specific examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>Everyday we are confronted with decisions that we have to make. Sometimes we decide quickly, but sometimes we have much time to think about it. <TS>I agree that the decisions that people make quickly are always wrong because of a couple of reasons.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>The quick decisions are derived from no sufficient references and data all the time.</MI1> <SI1>People make a decision with only their own experiences because they have enough time to ponder, which results in fallacies or errors. Every now and then other peoples who have experienced a similar situation or take a look at the problem objectively can help you to decide wisely. <TR>In addition</TR>, you can¡¯t know what situation will happen without proper data; <TR>moreover</TR>, you can¡¯t expect anything. That leads you to a big problem. It is said that ¡®look before you leap¡¯ in a traditional proverb, which represents the importance of discreet decisions.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>People don¡¯t prepare the second best when their decisions are wrong.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR> In my case</TR>, since I had no other ways to fix my thoughtless decision, I was really at a loss. The quick decision didn¡¯t make me ready for a failure. We should always think of the worst case of our decisions. It requires much time to think about it. </EX></SI2></BO2><CO>Accordingly I prefer a prudent decision to a hasty one. We meditate on the decision carefully with the full, useful data or advices from others, preventing some mistakes and preparing the next best policy.</CO>
column23: I think your two main paragraphs are similar enough that they could be combined. What is the great mistake you made? Make sure to explain your points,

column1: 86&In some countries, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. Do you think this is a good idea? Support your opinion by using specific reasons and details.
column3: <IN>Having a job at teenager have advantages and disadvantages. Although all things have two aspects, but I disagree about this. The following are two main reasons why I didn't agree with this. </IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I think time is the most valuable thing in our life.</MI1> <SI1>We couldn't estimate the value of the time. If they were losing their invaluable time because of job, they would lose their opportunity for their better life. It's a very important thing to use time usefully: study many subject, try to improve their own ability, maintain relationship among friends. Hard work drove them to extreme weariness and they couldn't study because of fatigue. Teenagers have many things to do rather than have a job. The time never return again.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondary</TR>, the working condition are sometimes very dangerous to teenagers.</MI2> <SI2>Although teenagers want to work in a good condition, they have many troubles : their age ,deficiency of expertise. They have to find correct information before they apply for. Many young teenagers have many troubles because of incorrect information. By having wrong knowledge about work, they exposed themselves to danger. Sometimes, the work is very harmful to teenagers. Teenagers need causion when they are in dangerous work condition. If teenagers didn't try to escape these harmful situation, it resulted in destroying their physical and mental health.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, many people regret that they were using their invaluable time in vain during their studying period. <TR>However,</TR> most of the teenagers killed their important time. If they use their time for nothing, they will regret about losing their time in the future</CO>
column23: Your essay doesn't really give any examples or support, just your opinion. Add some research to really convince me.

column1: 87&Some people believe that the best way of learning about the life is by listening to the advice of family and friends. Other people believe that the best way of learning about life is through personal experience. Compare the advantages of these two different ways of learning about life. Which do you think is preferable? Use specific examples to support your preference.
column3: <IN>There are various ways of learning about the life. Among them listening to the advice of people and personal experience are both main ways of learning about the life. Both ways have their own merits to learn about the life and especially, <TS><TR>in my case</TR>, it¡¯s more preferable way to listen to the advice of family and friends.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>In case of personal experience, that experience is so useful for us to learn about something very in detail otherwise when we get information from what we¡¯ve heard, sometimes we can get confused due to its superficiality.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, when I was high school student, my class had an experiment in a laboratory to get a proposed result but it was not easy to experiment according to what we¡¯ve learned because our class had no experience to experiment before this time.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>However,</TR> in case of listening to the advice of family and friends, it can make us learn faster and more to learn about the life.</MI2> <SI2><TR><EX>For instance</TR>, when I want to find an information to do homework, it¡¯s good way of saving time to ask my friend who already has done that homework. As a result of the faster learning, I can use spare time to learn about more things.</EX></SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Moreover,</TR> it¡¯s so safe to learn about the life by listening to the advice of people.</MI3> <SI3>A lot of information we can get are not easy to experience by many reasons and one of those factors is danger. <TR>For example</TR>, we can solve the curiosity about the fish which live in the deep by what we¡¯ve heard from people without the risk of diving into the deep sea.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, both ways of learning about the life, listening to the advice of people and personal experience are essential to broaden our view. Even though they have their own advantages, in my case, I prefer to listen to the advice of family and friends for the purpose of time saving, safety.</CO>
column23: I think if you take out your first main paragraph, your essay will be much stronger. Stick to the argument about why it is good to listen to family and friends. Also, if you take the transition out of your thesis statement, it will be stronger.

column1: 88&Some people believe that university students should be required to attend class. Others believe that going to classes should be optional for students. Which point of view do you agree with? Use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>Many students attend college or university, these days. As the society grows, people may tend to be impersonal. Schools like universities or colleges must act as the standards for preventing people from being impersonal. It is important not only to attain knowledge but also to be the member of their own society. <TS>Attending class for university students means that they may have opportunity to get to know each other and to be a social member.</TS></IN> <BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, people may tend to be impersonal, as the society grows.</MI1> <SI1>These days, people think only for themselves . They don't know how to live and co-operate with others. Long time ago, people should co-operate to survive. They built houses, hunted animals, and harvested crops together. However, we don't need to build, hunt, and harvest by ourselves. People become impersonal because they don't have enough opportunities to take care of each others instead of thinking only themselves.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>As we don't have enough opportunities to take care of each others, we may not know social skills.</MI2> <SI2>To live genuine human, it may be important that they know how to respect each others. It is called social skills which mean the crucial standard for being humans. We can learn them from attending schools. You might say that we can learn them from the society to which we are belong. Of course we can lean them when we are in the member of society. But learning these socail skills in schools might seem better than learning them in the society by trial and error.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Accordingly</TR>, we can prevent from being impersonal as well as know social skills by attending classes at universities.If going to classes is optional for students, the society might become hard enough to live together. People in society might as well not take care of each others and think only themselves. Therefore, people must learn these social skills by attending classes at universities.</CO>
column23: You lost me in the first paragraph. If you are going to talk about the poor social skills of people these days, you have to relate it to your topic. Otherwise, take the whole paragraph out. There are many other reasons you could add to this argument, so I suggest you do it.

column1: 89&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Children should be required to help with household tasks as soon as they are able to do so.
column3: <IN>As nuclear families are increasing, people generally have one or two children. so people tend to overprotect their children. ,<TR>Nevertheless</TR>, Some people say that children should be required to help with household tasks as soon as they are able to do so, while others maintain that they don't need to do. <TS><TR>In my case</TR>, I agree that children should be required to help with household tasks as soon as they are able to do so in terms of forming a responsibility and understanding their parent¡¯s favor. </TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, that children help with household tasks could form and develop a responsibility.</MI1> <SI1>It is a important point through life to understand that people have to be responsible for anything which they did and responsibility can be formed in childhood for helping household tasks. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, my brother who cleaned his room in childhood still clean there and he take it granted to do. If my mother did that in his infancy, I am sure that he would never clean his room until now.</EX> Similarly, experience to help household task could give children a responsibility.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, Children could understand a parent¡¯s favor during helping with household tasks.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Generally</TR>, there are many things to make people feel a parent¡¯s favor but it is one of best ways to make them feel how a difficult event to do household tasks in childhood, and memory in infancy could last longer than any other memories. <TR>Therefore</TR>, it's important for children to help household tasks in childhood in aspect of feeling a parent¡¯s favor deeply.</SI2></BO2> <CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I think that children¡¯s helping household tasks could make them form and develop responsibility and appreciate their parent¡¯s love. <TR>Moreover</TR>, the good habit growing in childhood could influence on the rest of whole life righteously.</CO>
column23: A very good essay! Nice work.

column1: 90&Some people say that physical exercise should be a required part of shool day. Other people belive that students should spend the whole shool day on academic studies. Which option doyou agree with? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>The basic idea of shooling is to educate and inform the courses. Some are inclined to emphasize that this idea is the only purpose of the learning peocess. <TR>However</TR>, physical activity is an important part of shool day :because it help students to relieve stress due to over load of education and supplement them with phsical strengh. <TR>In addition</TR>, it contribute to maintain good relation with their friends. <TS>So I agree that physical activity like exercise should be required at school.</TS> Here are some detail examples to support above statement.</IN> <BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, physical exercise plays a important role in deviate from stress for school day.</MI1> <SI1>If schools emphasize that students should spend their whole time on academic process, they will suffer from mental illness in results of over burden of learning process. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, if schools allocate a little time to physical activity, they will relieve their stresses. <TR>Also</TR>, through some exercise, they are able to keep on good relation with their friends. So, students benefit from physical activity shools provide.</SI1></BO1> <BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, physical activity supplement students with physical strength.</MI2> <SI2>Some exercise can provide them with good condition. <TR>Moreover,</TR> physical strengh make it possible to study continuously without exhaustion. Students who equip as good health condition by doing exercise can spend more time on their learning process. <TR>Therefore</TR>, shools will not ignore physical activity.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To summary</TR>, it is necessay for student to participate in physical activity. Though students spend the whole time on study, they have to think about physical activity. However little students invest time in exercise, they have many advantages in terms of strengh, decreasing stress and good relation with their friend. So this is reason why I agree physical activity at school.</CO>
column23: A good essay! Remember, school is not spelled "shool" despite what the prompt may say.

column1: 91&Parents make the best teachers. Do you agree or disagree with that statement? Use specific examples and reasons to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>There are many people who influence a child such as teachers and friends. Some people assert that friends can be the best teachers for a child our of them, while others think that parents can make the best teachers. <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, I agree with the statement parents can be good teachers for their children in terms of understanding and spending a lot of time with their children.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, parents are the best teachers and advisers for their children becasue they can understand their children more deeply than any others, and help their children to make a right decision.</MI1> <SI1>Usually, parents are concerned about their children's lives and try to talk with them much more. Through these efforts, parents can recognize their children's problems and help them how to solve the problems. That is, parents can be the best teachers of life. <EX><TR> For example</TR>, I had a hard time to study when I was a high school student. I was so exhausted and streesful. At that time, my parents always tried to cheer me up. And they help me to have a confidence and to decide my future. Thanks to parents' advices and encouraging, I could stand this period.</EX> Like this, Parents can be the best teachers when a child is likely to be on the wrong way.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, parents' acts and thinkings can influence their children because a child spend much time with their parents.</MI2> <SI2>Usually, people are likely to be affected by a person who gets along and spends much time with them. So, parents' life style can affect their children's lives a lot. <EX><TR>To illustrate</TR>, my parents are honest and diligent and I also have similar characteristic.</EX> From my point of view, parents' acts and characteristics can influence their children's life. So, right behaviors of parnets can be good examples to their children.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I strongly agree that parents make the best teachers. Some people are opposed to this statement because of some bad parents who influence their childrend badly. But I believe that most of parents love their childrend so much and they try to provide better educational circumstances and be a model of good behavior.</CO>
column23: A very good essay! Nice work!

column1: 92&People attend college or university for many different reasons(for example, new experiences, career preparation, increased knowledge). Why do you think people attend college or university? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Today, it is well known that more and more people attend college or university. In my undergraduate class for example, about a half of students applied to some graduate school. This tendency occurs in all field of study making the admission process for graduate study more competitive. The question is then why so many people tend to spend or invest their time to post graduate education.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR> , in these competitive society, people with higher education can get better job easier than who do not.</MI1> <SI1>Among my friends who already are emplyed, this tendency is more accentuated. And they confess that due to the competition, they are forced to seek higher education. Beside, we cannot forget that most jobs which give more than $20,000 in salary require people to graduate university.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the increasing number of graduate school resulted in more opportunity to realize a graduate study.</MI2> <SI2>In the past, due to limited number of school, the admission process was extremely difficult and only small part of student could afford financially but nowday, you can choose among more than one school and make comparision to find a right school.</SI2></BO2> <BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR>, the competition present among innumerous institution forced them to open more specialized study area and develop for new teaching methodology and this tendency made in growing interests from people to decide for a graduate study.</MI3></BO3><BO4><MI4><TR>Fourth</TR>, unemployed people using their spare time not only seeking for the job announcement but they are preparing professionally for new opportunities.</MI4> <SI4>In these hard times, you can see more unemployed people in class than employed.</SI4></BO4><CO>There are more reasons for people in graduate education, but whatever the motivation, further education open the possibilities and prepare for future challenges.</CO>
column23: You have written a very good essay! I couldn't find a thesis statement though. Your points are good, but I would take out your third main point as it does not seem to fit in your argument. Your essay will be stronger without it.

column1: 93&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Some People believe that parents are not always the best teachers and there are many other good teachers in our life. <TS>I partly agree that they are not always the best teachers.</TS> <TR>However</TR> ,I think that parents still can teach us many important things in our life like love, companionship and so on.</IN><BO1><MI1>In family, We not only learn about basic things like eating, toddling, and other fundmental skills in childhood, but also be provided of nessary advises and criticism by parents as we grow up.</MI1> <SI1>Other people cannot be such an important role of us, for they are not as emotionally close as our parents in general.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR>parents often express their affections to their childeren to let children feel love.</MI2> <SI2>It is undoudtly important for children to know what love and affections are.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>Actually recent research shows us that many criminals' famillies are lack of one of their parents or both of them.</MI3> <SI3>The criminals couldn't do good in both school and society without parents, and committed the crime in the end. It clearly shows us the important role of parents.</SI3></BO3><CO>Parents cannot always give us the best directions and advises. They do make mistake as we do. <TR>However</TR>,they can teach us many consequence things when we're children. They are also our closest people who can give us essential advises and most importantly, let us know what love is.</CO>essential advises and most importantly, let us know what love is.</CO>
column23: This essay makes it seem like you haven't really thought about the subject. Your first two main paragraphs are very short with little to no evidence. Your third main paragraph doesn't really give us any substantial evidence, just an accusation that we have to take your word for. Finally, you don't really choose a side. You need to choose a side to write an essay like this. Consider these things and try again.

column1: 94&You have enough money to purchase either a house or a business. Which would you choose to buy? Give specific reasons to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>Whether purchasing a house or a business becomes very interesting issue among people. <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, I prefer buying a house. There are two reasons for this. A house is critical element in life and it is based on safe living.</TS></IN> <BO1><MI1><TR>Generally speaking</TR>, it is said that eating and housing are necessary to live basically in life.</MI1> <SI1>Both eating and clothes are bought a little money which we can earn on average. <TR>However</TR>, the price of house is so high. Thus many people would consider this problem. People often can borrow money to purchase house, and they are fastened in all life. This can cause people to advance financially. <TR>For example</TR>, the author of the book called ¡°Rich father, Poor father¡± said many people have been troubling with loan for house. If they want a lot of money, they must have their house by their own money. Requiring freedom of money is the most fast way in earning money.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> house is the place where people feel warm.</MI2> <SI2>People must go out to make money for their family, their dream, etc. Although it might bring much stress, the cause of their patience is in a their house in the background. Suppose you are not what you will come back. This is enough terrible only in thinking. My father used to said, ¡°even though I feel hard at working, I always think I come back home. How happy is this fancy!!¡±</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Above all</TR>, I argue buying house is prior rather than business. This is because house is the most important necessity and it provides people with peaceful place. If we have a house, we will go toward more successful business world and feel calm place where there are flowing beautiful electricity in the world.</CO>
column23: Your essay doesn't really support your idea, especially the first main paragraph. It's just a lot of talk with no support. Think of the reasons why you would rather have a house and then think of three support statements to show why this is good reasoning. Your writing must have a purpose.

column1: 95&It has recently been announced that a new movie theater may be built in your neighborhood. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Some people may think that building a new theater in their place is bed. <TS><TR>However</TR>, I think a new movie theater will increase one's intelligence and economy of the place.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, the new theater may help people to improve their intellet.</MI1> <SI1>This is because most movies have much information or instruction. <TR>Therefore</TR>, people can learn those by taking movies.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, the playhouse can cause economy of my place to be active.</MI2> <SI2>If the theater provide people to many interests, <TR>for example</TR>, people will consume their money. <TR>In addition</TR>, people can be employed to that. Eventually, those increase economic activity.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclution,</TR> I support a new playhouse is constructed in my neighbor, because it elevate economy of my place and intelligence of people. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, I hope such buildings are more built in my neighbor as restaurants, theaters.</CO>
column23: This is a pretty good essay. You can strengthen your thesis statement by making it into one strong sentence. Your first main point leaves me a little skeptical, but it is acceptable. You need to add some more support to your first and second main paragraphs.Finally, try not to rely on transitions too much - they can become distracting to the reader. Otherwise, good job!

column1: 96&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing games teaches us about life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Many people enjoy playing games. Some think that playing games is very helpful for learning life but others believe playing games is useless. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I believe playing games can teaches us about life because games can be mirror of our life.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Playing game allow us to know the happiness from success and the frustration from failure.</MI1> <SI1>Like games, life is filled with success and failure. The people who have already known the feeling of achievement probably try to do their best more because they want to feel the happiness from success. We, of course, can learn the way to response the results as well. If we fail, we have to get over it quickly and games help to overcome. This is because we can experience many failures by playing games. <EX>When I failed to get admission of university, I was depressed but soon I believed that life was similar to game and decided to try again.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>We can easily adjust to high competition and rules of society because games contain competition and rules.</MI1> <SI1>The understanding society helps us adapt to any situations. <EX>My mother used to worry about my little brother because he liked playing soccer and spent his almost time for soccer. <TR>However,</TR> my brother adapt well to school because he can apply the situations of soccer to those of school. He can know the way to lessen the stress of high competition and try to keep significant rules of schools. He can also understand the importance of teamwork.</EX> Games probably teach him about life.</SI1></BO2><CO>As I mention above, I agree the statement that we can learn life through playing games. Playing game lead us to realize the happiness or disappointment from the results of our life and to adjust high competition and rules of real life.</CO>
column23: An excellent essay! One suggestion: take the word "probably" out of the last sentence in your second paragraph. It weakens the point slightly.

column1: 97&(Some people think best way to learn life is to listen to advices. Others think best way to learn life is to have personal experience. Which way do you prefer?)
column3: <IN>People learn about life through a variety of ways. They often have help from the advice of their parents or teachers. If they follow the wise talking, they may be taught much without any error. <TS>In spite of this advantage, I personally like to learn through the experience in my life. That is mainly because I believe that learning by my experience will last long and deeply in my whole life.</TS> Through the use of a comparison with other way and a example, I will demonstrate why I prefer this way. </IN><BO1><MI1>These two ways, that is, the advice from someone and the personal experience have each merit.</MI1> <SI1><TR> First of all</TR>, without the advice, we might have trial and error in preparing or advancing something. <TR>Accordingly</TR>, we have to spend much time in learning. The sincere advice from someone who have a similar experience with me makes me learn fastly about life and help not to make much error. <TR>Meanwhile</TR>, knowledge obtained by the direct experience provides us with the most lively learning on account of the directness. <TR>Therefore</TR>, it is difficult to disappear in our memory, while the learning through the advice is easy to be forgotten.</SI1><SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>For this reason</MI2>, I prefer to be taught about life through my diverse experience.</MI2> <SI2>I would have a lot of trial and error, but the experience will give me a long-lasted knowledge about the world. <EX>My parents had given advice about the management of my weak body. <TR>Nonetheless</TR>, I didn¡¯t pay attention to their advice. <TR>Consequently</TR>, one day I was taken ill and regreted that I didn¡¯t listen to their advice. <TR>However,</TR> my experience of illness stimulated me to exercise every day. After exercising for several months, I could recover my health. My experience was beneficial for my willingness to exercise and recovery of my health.</EX></SI2></BO2> <CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I personally think that we can have a deep-rooted knowledge through personal experience in comparison with the advice from someone. <TR>Thus</TR>, I would like to have a great deal of experience. I am sure that these will teach me about a number of things.</CO>
column23: When you are writing an essay for a test, most of the time you need to choose a side of the argument and defend it. If they ask you, "Which do you prefer?", your best chance to get a good grade is to choose a side and then give reasons why the side you chose is the best side. You have chosen experiencec as the best option, so now you must defend your choice. Why is experience better? Be very clear about it. Also, you seem to rely on transitions a lot, but they can be distracting to the reader. Try to use fewer transitions.

column1: 98& think of the most interesting class you have ever taken. why did you enjoy this class so much? use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>I enjoyed both English conversation classes and German languauge classes.</TS> when I was a middle school student and high school student, I was happy with them. </IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I liked to learn many kinds of languages.</MI1> <SI1>among them, I liked English most. English lectures are various in my home country. I liked the conversation class among the lectures. because I like to talk with foreigners who come from English-spoken countries. it is very pleasent to me. and it makes me excited. so I could enjoy the class more than other students in same classroom. In my respect, I liked English conversation class because I like to talk in English.<SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, I liked German class too.M/MI2> <SI2>my major is german language and literature. but I'm not good at German. when I was a high school student, the germany teacher was excellent. she taught very well and she made us not to boring. so I became to enjoy the class more and more. that's what I chose my major. <TR>In my manner</TR>, I liked german class because of the teacher.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In my conclusion</TR>. from my experience, one's interest depends on their interest and the mood during the class. the others could say "it is not on me" but I wish to say "it may have many differences between ont to another" but I thought the English conversation and german were good for me and made me happy to learn.</CO>
column23: Your essay doesn't say very much, except that you like learning languages and liked your teachers. Why did you like your teachers? Why do you like learning languages? How did the teachers influence and encourage you to study languages? How has it helped you in life? Your essay needs more information and more structure. Also, I would suggest you write a different conclusion, because this one does not make very much sense.

column1: 99&Do you agree disagree? High schools should allow students to study the courses that students want to study.
column3: <IN>Some people say that high schools should not allow students to study the courses that students want to study for balanced intellectual growth. <TS><TR>However</TR>, I think that high schools should give students the freedom to choose some courses in that liberty of subject-choice can improve efficiency of studies and help them to decide on their ways.</TS> </IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, if students can freely choose some courses which they want to study, their efficiency of studies will be able to rise much more.</MI1> <SI1>Of course, I think that students have to take the basic lessons such as math, science, literature and so on. <TR>However</TR>, students don¡¯t need to take all other lessons except for some prerequisites because they can¡¯t understand all subjects. Besides they will be not interested in subjects which they dislike. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, if students take lessons which they choose for themselves, they will bend an ear to lessons and naturally school records will rise.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, giving students liberty to choose courses can help them to find a vocation appropriate to their aptitude and capability.</MI2> <SI2>This liberty of choice will instigate to find what their aptitude and capability are. Although high school students don¡¯t always have the mature judgment on the decisions, they will be able to gain the better results and improve independence by practicing this finding process. If high schools compel students to take already all decided lessons, students will learn only passive attitude</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I agree that high schools should allow students to choose the courses in that learning ability can be improved and they can find their ways more easily. Of course, they may need the guidance of experts in the field of education. <TR>However</TR>, they also need some freedom to follow their curiosity and individual interests. We will not have to see high school students as utterly immature and incomplete being</CO>
column23: A very good essay! You could make it even better by adding examples.

column1: 100&Do you agree or diagree with the following statement? Being happy with a job is more important than having a high salary. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Sometimes children or students say to their parents. " I like music/art! I love it! I want to be a musician/artist! " , but most parents only say that study is the most important thing. <TS>Yes, it is correct that study is very important. However, can we live happily although we have a high salary job that you don't like? I don't think so.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To start with</TR>, if we have a job that we don't like, our lives will be bad. Because, we have to do it although we hate that.</MI1> <SI1>For only high salary. More importantly, we had better live our lives happily. I know that having good jobs are hard, but if we have jobs that we like, although it gives a low salary we can live our lives happily! Isn't it more great than get a high salary? To illustrate, some people have high salary jobs and live unhappily although they like music or art more.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, If we get our jobs that we like, there is more effectiveness.</MI2> <SI2>What i mean is, if we like its jobs, we can get more high effectiveness.<TR> For example</TR>, people can do well and get more efectiveness if they like those works.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>For these reasons</TR>, I think that being happy job is more important than having a high salary. On the whole, i want people to get their correct jobs that they want.</CO>
column23: While I appreciate your enthusiasm, I think you need to approach this argument more stoically. Give some more examples and support. Pretend you are making your argument to a scientist.

column1: 101&government should not fund in art.
column3: <IN><TS>The reading passage contends that government should not fund a lot of money in art. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, the speaker bring up several points that contradict this argument.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, the lecturer argues that art plays a significan role in citizens¡¯ entertainment.</MI1> <SI1><TR>In other words</TR>, The art have to be shared by many people for their entertainment. It is obvious that people do not complain about the tax money caused by creating public parks. This means that people will actively participate in several art activities without any complaint. <TR>Thus</TR>, art will contribute to safe environment for people. This casts doubt on the reading, which states that the money which is spent on art activities or programs need to be used to better safeguard the nation.</BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, according to the speaker, censorship problem can be avoided by a panel system run by experts who are not involved in any political party.</MI2> <SI2> They grant awards or support artists accoring to their true talent. This refutes the reading passage¡¯s assertion that governments will make censorship for funding artists who has political philosophy that is related to the governments¡¯.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>The final point made by the lecturer is that companies do not fund in the art that is not profitable.</MI3> <SI3>Although many film industries are sponsorded by many advertisement enterprises, there are art fields that do not make a lot of money. <TR>Moreover</TR>, we need to keep in mind that art programs for children are necessary. Various kinds of art programs and activities will benefit children. This rebuffs the reading passage¡¯s argument that art can already funded by advertising industry, so it does not make sense.</BO3>
column23: This is an excellent essay! You have understood the passage very well, and your writing is eloquent. Nice work! Add a conclusion and it will be perfect!

column1: 102&Teachers should not make their social and political views known to students in the classroom.
column3: <IN>Some people say that teachers should not make their social and political views known to students in the classroom. <TS>But I disagree with the statement in that the teacher¡¯s opinion about the social and political situation can give the right point of views to the students and raise the degree of the attention by the classroom students.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, teacher¡¯s opinions about the specific social and political situation can bring up the student¡¯s awareness about their society.</MI1> <SI1>Since teachers already had lived longer than the students, they can tell the right thing about the societal situation and the specific political event. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, I read the report from Korea Education Development Institute which is about the relation between the teacher¡¯s private view saying about the certain political event and the student¡¯s right point of views about that event. The students had more accurate awareness about that political event if they heard the teacher¡¯s opinion about that.</EX></SI1><BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, if teachers speak to students their social and political views, the students would more concentrate on the class.</MI2> <SI2>This is because the textbook itself is largely boring and hard for students to study for a long without distracting their attention. In that situation, if teacher tell their views to the students they can focus on the textbook. <EX></TR>For example,</TR> when I was high school student, I hardly concentrate on the class while the teacher read the textbook. When teacher started to talk about his own view about the social and political event in those days such as voting for president, I could more attend the class. I heard later that was true with my classmates too.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, teacher¡¯s opinion about the social and political event can give the right point of views and raise the degree of the attention by students. In this regard, I disagree with statement that teachers should not make their social and political views known to students in the classroom.</CO>
column23: An excellent essay! Good work!

column1: 103&Government should spend more on improving the internet access instead of transportation for people.
column3: <IN>There has been debate on whether the government should invent more on the internet or public transportation. Using internet has been essential part of one¡¯s life. People use internet for study, work and play. Some people state that government should spend more money on improving internet environment instead of transportation. While the transportation is important for people,<TS> I agree that it is better for government to invest more on the internet. More people will take advantages from internet and it will highly improve efficiency in life.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, many people will obtain benefit from allowing more access to the internet.</MI1> <SI1>There are more people are using the internet than using public transportation. According to recent survey conducted by newspaper in Korea, majority of people responded that they can not live without internet. People found it very useful to search any information on the internet. Reading newspaper and watching audio clips are what people enjoy doing in their free time. This means that internet is more significant for people than public transportation nowadays Furthermore government should consider spending money very carefully and not waste invaluable taxes paid by people. Accordingly it allows government to invest money more effectively.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, using internet improve efficiency in work and study.</MI2> <SI2>Computer with internet is necessary for employees and students. Each employee is provided with personal computer to use internet in the workplace. They can communicate by e-mail and search for information on the internet. According to economist magazine in Korea, the company can save general expenses by using internet. It usually costs high in communicating with companies in overseas by telephone and post mail. This will lead to higher profits for company as well as employees. For students, they can search information by the internet. There is ample information available on the internet. Internet is highly recommended resource for studying. Therefore students can save their time for visiting library. Consequently improving more access to the internet will improve people¡¯s life.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, I believe that government should spend more on improving the internet access instead of transportation for people. Government have right to spend money effectively in the field where more people can obtain benefit from, which is the internet. Also it will improve people¡¯s life, as the using internet allows people to work and study efficiently.</CO>
column23: An excellent essay! Good work!

column1: 104&(It is better to be an employee in big companies than in small comapnies)
column3: <IN>Many people think large companies are much better than small ones because they offer more salary and opportunities to develop employees. <TR>On the contrary</TR>, other people argue that small companies is preferable to large ones. They believe that these companies usually pay attention to their workers more. <TS><TR>However</TR>,<TR> in my opinion</TR>, large companies is more effective approach for the bright future. This is because I don't need to be worried about losing my job as much as I am in small ones and there is greater opportunity to grow as an individual.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, as most of large companies have much more funds set aside in order to handle economic recession wisely, they normally provide better job security.</MI1> <SI1>One of recent studies conducted by the Ministry of Labor, when nation's economy was in slow, small corporations went out of the business three times higher than large ones. It demonstrate my opinion that workers in large ones can perform their duties with less concerns for loosing their jobs.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, there is more chances to grow as an individual.</MI2> <SI2>Large companies give labors incredibly variety investments including free tickets for gym, chance to go abroad and so on. Grasping these opportunities, they can upgrade their bodies, personalities and perspectives. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, my sister have been working for international company named samsung for over ten years. When she worked here for two years, the company send my sister to America for a year. With the help of her company, she developed language ability and broaden her perspectives. She became also more of cultural sensitive person. Finally, she got much more paid.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In brief</TR>, we cannot ignore the fact that large companies have capabilities that are really beneficial to us. So, I firmly believe that if we are given a chance to choose entering a large company or small company, we would decide to work at large ones.</CO>
column23: An excellent essay! Good work!

column1: 105&High schools should require all students to wear school uniforms.
column3: <IN>Many people believe that schools should allow students to choose what they want to wear to school in terms of respecting their personality. <TR>However</TR>, I disagree with the idea. <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, students should wear school uniforms in high schools because wearing uniforms is advantageous to their financial as well as learning.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, wearing uniforms helps students save a large amount of money.</MI1> <SI1>It is because they don't need to buy a variety of clothes. Especially, since teenagers are easily affected by friends and fashion, they would like to buy expensive clothes or brand new products. This will make students waste their money on buying useless clothes. <TR>Moreover,</TR> it would be heavy burden for poor students to buy several clothes and some students would feel a sense of incongruity. <EX>In my personal experience, I should have worn a school uniform for two years in high school. Since I spent most of my time on studying in school, I don't need other divers clothes but just a pair of school uniform and a spare one. When I was university students, I realized that wearing school uniforms was absolutely economical. Then, I should have spent a large amount of money on buying my clothes every season.</EX> This experience shows that wearing uniforms is helpful for household economy by decreasing expenditure for buying clothes.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR> putting on uniforms is a good way for students to concentrate on study.</MI2> <SI2>It is due to that they don't need to think about what to wear to school. This concern would make students spend much time on choosing their clothes everyday. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, some clothes may not be suitable when students study in class because too showy designs or colors would be many distractions for both other students and teachers. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, school uniforms tend to be designed considering calming and relaxing color. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> my younger sister go to a high school where allows students to wear what they want. She spend much time on choosing clothes in order to look better before going to school. Sometimes she used to be late for school when it takes far long time to pick her clothes. But, until last year when she went to a middle school wearing the school uniform, she rarely had been late for school.</EX> This illustration shows that wearing uniforms helps students to more focus on study than their appearance.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In brief</TR>, requiring school uniforms is more beneficial for students to save money and to study. It is because they don't need to buy many expensive clothes and worry about choosing their clothes. <TR>For these reasons</TR>, I believe that wearing school uniforms would be sensible choice for better education.</CO>
column23: An excellent essay! Good work!

column1: 106&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>Some people believe that TV makes family spend a time together and gave us great opportunity to communicate with our friends. <TR>However</TR>, </TR>in my opinion</TR>, <TS>TV makes our communication breake down. This is because we lost our time to talk with our family in front of TV and we can spend a time alone if we have TV.</TS></IN><BO1> <MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, TV prevent family to talk and concern each other.</MI1> <SI1>TV makes us focus on TV show and we just spend a time to watch the programs in TV, not to have a concern about family's conditions and life. <TR>For example</TR>, there is a study that is conducted by Seoul National University in 2000. There is two groups, the room where first group is has TV, the other group didn't have TV for 1 week. After 1 week, they have a interview and some quiz about their members who they live together for one week. The result is that first group couldn't answer question about the other member in their group whereas, second group could tell the right about their members. This study prove that TV makes people reduce their conversation and not have a focus on their family.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Furthermore</TR>, TV dimish desire to meet another people.</MI2> <SI2>Watching TV don't need to be with another person. We could be alone and people will not find a friend who can talk with and get rid of our loneness if we have TV. That makes people solitude from society. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, there is documentary about HIKICOMORI that means the person who don't want to come out to the world even their house yield and just stay in their room for a year or more years. They spend a lot of time in their room with their private computer and their TV. Some part of HIKICOMORI has problem with their mind illness but some part of them think they don't need a person and friends because they don't feel a loneness and boring with TV. </EX>Although it is a extremly example, we can understand and admit that TV contribute to make wall between person and person.</SI2></BO2><CO> <TR>To sum up</TR>, TV gives a damage to have a conversation between familys and makes person think like that they don't need connection and communication with friends and family. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I believe strongly TV is not helpful to maintain family's and friend's communication and relation at all.</CO>
column23: This is a very good essay! Nice work!

column1: 107&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? With the help of the Internet, students can learn more effectively. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>One of the most innovative technologies is the Internet in the twenty-first century. People can¡¯t think their daily lives without using the Internet nowadays. Although the use of Internet makes modern people convenient, it can¡¯t be convinced that the Internet is always helpful for their lives. <TS>Among the controversial issues with the technology, students¡¯ use for learning is a more serious problem because of unnecessarily enormous data and the seduction of entertainment with it.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, there is insignificant information to make decision hard.</MI1> <SI1>In the beginning of searching data, students are happy to get a lot of information from the Internet because it¡¯s accessible and massive. <TR>However</TR>, when the students start organizing with the data that found from the Internet, they would realize that it¡¯s not simple to cut down the waste of data and reconstitute the data to useful reports. Also, the reports that mainly based on the information from the Internet miss sometimes the core of the topic or include shallow depth of details. Most professors blame student¡¯s essays with similar information and express the difficulties of marking the stale reports. That is, the convenience of studying steals the opportunities of researching and thinking about the subject from the students.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, the Internet environment interferes with concentrating in study.</MI2> <SI2>Even though students access the Internet for the purpose of study, they can easily be tempted by entertainments such as games and web-surfing. One of popular methods of studying in the Internet is on-line education. <EX>In a survey, 85 percent of students who have had on-line classes couldn¡¯t focus on the study because they use the Internet for fun.</EX> The coincidence of studying and amusements are uncomfortable situations for long and deep concentration. To study with using the Internet, students should have a strong control in their act not to access it.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To summarize</TR>, the Internet could be poisonous of education since student have to fight against useless information and the enticement of amusement. People don¡¯t know how much time and energy they lose to use the Internet habitually. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, students who would like to achieve on their study think about the advantage and disadvantage of the Internet on studying, then use it properly.</CO>
column23: The bulk of your essay is very good. You make very good points, but your writing is on the verge of being unclear. Consider your word choice - is it as clear as it can be?

column1: 108&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is better to do one project completely and then begin to do another project than to do multiple projects simultaneously.
column3: <IN>An intriguing topic of discussion at hand is whether or not it is better to do one project totally and then start to do another project than to do multiple projects concurrently. This answer to this question can greatly vary depending on the individual perspectives. <TR>Thus</TR>, the jury may still be out, <TR>but as far as I am concerned</TR>, <TS>I firmly believe that doing multiple projects at the same time is better.</TS> In this essay, I will present two reasons supporting my standpoint as follows. <TR>First</TR>, one can save time by doing many projects at once. <TR>Second</TR>, people can widen view of their jobs.<IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, people can significantly reduce time by doing multiple projects concurrently.</MI1> <SI1>This is attributed to the fact that when people spend much of their time in doing a lot of projects simultaneously, people are likely to focus on their works. <TR>Moreover,</TR> concentrating on their works enhance one¡¯s work efficiency. <TR>For example</TR>, there had been a study conducted by Seoul National University in Korea. The researchers surveyed a thousand businessmen to see if doing several works at a time is effective. Of all, 86.2 percent of them stated that this practice is significantly advantageous because they can save a lot of time to work. <TR>For this reason</TR>, Samsung Company requires job candidates having the ability to do manifold projects simultaneously. The company argues that the ability gives employees and owner the chance to have more free time as well as enhance the profit of outputs. <TR>As a result</TR>, doing various projects concurrently is better for people as they can save a lot of time.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, doing manifold jobs concurrently allows one to broaden view of his or her careers.</MI2> <SI2>This is due to the fact that people have to search much information and meet many different people in order to process numerous works simultaneously. <TR>Moreover,</TR> these actions make them get much knowledge and enhance their own social skills, leading to be successful in their career life. According to an article, Alex Kim, the Sociology Professor at Harvard University in America claimed: ¡°In today¡¯s society, companies have to encourage their employees to do many projects at the same time. This is because when they do their many jobs concurrently, they can progress their ability to work. It is obvious that they essentially meet many experts and search much information. <TR>Thus</TR>, through these practice, job employees can have the chance to be promoted as well as widen view of their jobs.¡± <TR>Hence</TR>, it is helpful to do multiple works at once.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, processing numerous projects at the same time can improve work efficiency.</MI3> <SI3>This is due to the fact that processing just monotonous one project can wear people out of originality and drain enthusiasm. <TR>Thus</TR>, taking adequate amount of investing in doing manifold projects at a once can recharge energy and make them concentrating better on their tasks. <TR>For example</TR>, there had been a study by conducted by Columbia University in America. The researchers surveyed two thousands of professors who having jobs in America to see if doing several works concurrently is helpful. Of all, 87.2 percent of them stated that this action makes them more energetic and focus more on their tasks. This is because they continuously think about their projects and make profits, and then they do not have to need waste time on draining their enthusiasm. <TR>Therefore</TR>, doing various projects simultaneously is effective.</BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I strongly argue for my standpoint on account of the two of my rationales mentioned above. <TR>Once again</TR>, although the verdict may still be out, I personally believe that two of my standpoints above are sufficiently convincing enough to represent the viewpoint of a majority who are in favor of my claim.</CO>
column23: Another good essay. Your examples and support are very strong. As always, I encourage you to strengthen your thesis statement by making it into one strong sentence with your reasons, and I also encourage you to take out your jury/verdict lines. Watch your transitions. Finally, "manifold" is not really a clear word to use in this context - try "multiple".

column1: 109&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>In a society where education arouses never-before interest from teachers and parents alike, there are incessant debates on who is the best teacher to a child. <TS>I believe that parents are the best teachers and following are the reasons to support my opinion.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, unlike the past where teachers were the ultimate well-educated people in the past, the average academic qualifications of parents have risen in the past few decades.</MI1> <SI1>Parents are now equally knowledgeable and have as much access to plethora of information as the teachers when it comes to the child's education. Though experience and expertise are the differentiation factors of teachers, parents are no more negligible nor ignorant of what is good for their child.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, parents spend more time with their child than anybody else during the childhood.</MI2> <SI2>This makes parents the ultimate influencer during the crucial years of the child's development. The child, with innate tendency to mimic their parents' thoughts, words, actions and behavior, will naturally learn them from whoever they spend most time with.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Last</TR>, teachers do not exert as much influence as the parents do.</MI3> <SI3>Even with the increasing teacher to student ratio in class, it is not simple for the teachers to pay undivided, individual attention to each student. <TR>Additionally</TR>, the student's behavior may vastly differ in classroom to their normal behaviors outside. It it therefore crucial for the parents to observe their child and reprimand them whenever necessary.</SI3></BO3><CO>Hence I strongly believe that it is the role of the teachers when it comes to formal education, but it is the role of the parents to teach their child how to live their lives to the fullest.</CO>
column23: This is a really well-done essay. Nice job! A few suggestions: you can strengthen your thesis statement by adding your reasons to your thesis statement instead of saying "I will talk about my reasons below". Also, your main paragraphs are so good that I want to know more. Can you think of any examples or find any research to support what you are saying?

column1: 110&a teacher¡¯s ability to relate well with students is more important than the ability to give knowledge.
column3: <IN>Nowadays, many people think that student education is getting more important. For this reason, some people said that teacher¡¯s ability to give their knowledge to their student is good judge to teacher. <TS><TR>However</TR> I think that the ability of relationship with student is more important than just teaching them.</TS> There are several reasons, first, if teacher wants to make student absorbs all of knowledge which was given from teacher, there have to be basement of relationship. Also teacher teaches not only knowledge in the books but some invisible things such as friendship, love, brave, kind and so on. <TR>Therefore</TR> teacher needs to relate skill with student than to give their knowledge.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, teacher need relationship skill with student because, even though a teacher has perfect capacity of giving knowledge if the teacher is not friendly with student, student might feel uncomfortable so they could not get 100% of what teacher want to teach.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, when I was middle school student, my teacher was sick so another teacher came to my class. At that time, somehow I could not concentrate on his class because he did not really matter students characters so we could not make good relationship and neither I did not understand what he would like to teach.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, teacher can teach more in relationship than in a book.</MI2> <SI2>School is no longer just a teaching place. When we are getting old, we remember not what we learned but what we did. It means teacher¡¯s ability of relationship make students have much better experience which is not only good memory but good learning in life. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, my 6 grade elementary school teacher had huge enthusiasm and nice capacity of relationship with students. She would like to do activity with student like aerobic or art show. When we did that she made we get bonding and believing each other so obviously I never forget her in my tire life.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO>Our society is getting more changed that into informational society. Therefore teacher¡¯s ability to give knowledge is important. <TR>However</TR> without relate skill with student, I can say, their teaching ability is useless.</CO>
column23: This is a very good essay! It would be even better if you could strengthen your thesis statement and add a little more support to your argument (what you have is good, you just need more).

column1: 111&(Some people think individuals can do nothing about environmental issues. Do you agree with the idea?)
column3: <IN>An intriguing topic of discussion at hand is whether individuals can do nothing about environmental issues. The answer to this question can vary greatly depending on individual perspectives. <TR>Thus</TR> the jury may still be out,<TR> but as far as I am concerned</TR>, <TS>I agree with the given statement. </TS> In this essay, I will present two reasons supporting my standpoints as follows.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, it is so complicated that individuals can do nothing when it comes to environmental issues.</MI1> <SI1><TR>In other words</TR>, the issues are out of the field that a person can deal with. <EX><TR>For illustration</TR>, citing the most disastrous natural disaster happened in Haiti, when the tsunami hit Haiti, the people living there could not do anything about it. This is because, it, the disaster, was so enormous for individual or even people there to take care of. <TR>Therefore</TR>, they had no choice but asked for national wide helps.
