Sometimes, we have to complain the problems to makers, directors, and so on. <TS>In my opinion, if I have to complain some things, I would do through mail.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>We can express very complex problems more clearly if we use mail.</MI1> <SI1>Sometimes, we may face with problems which we can not describe in details by talking. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> suppose that you have problems at the engine of your car. Unless you know about that very well, it is very difficult to explain problems for that. In this case, if you use mail, we can get a lot of information for the engine from dictionary while you write mail. Then you can easily persuade your car maker.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Furthermore,</TR> when we have problems, we are nervous or irritated.</MI2> <SI2>This means that it is very difficult for us to control our mind. Under this mood, if we camplain directly, there are possibility to make problems more delicate. <TR>However,</TR> while writing mail, we may get time when our mind becomes stable. Therefore, we can describe problems more objectively.</SI2></BO2><CO>Of course, it takes more time to use mail until we get a reply from makers, directors and so on, compared to complaining directly. However, by using mail, we can express problems more clearly and objectively. Therefore, I will use mail to complain problems.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic issues, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 291&You have received a gift of money. The money is enough to buy either a piece of jewelry you like or tickets to a concert you want to attend. Which would you buy? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>In my case, I will buy jewelry with that money if somebody gives me a gift of money.</TS> Buying jewelry, I can remember the person who gave me money for a long time, whenever I look that jewelry. Also, usually, jewelry lasts longer than the concert tickets.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> I do not want to forget the person who gave me money ,as buying concert tickets.</MI1> <SI1>If I get the ticket to the concert with that money, I will forget the person as soon as the concert finishes. However, in the case of buying jewelry, whenever I wear that jewely I feel appreciation to him/her.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> besides not to forget the person who gave me money, to possess something long, I would like to choose jewerly.</MI2> <SI2>Although attending the concert bring me a joy, that is not permative. After watching it, I can not find more pleasure from it. In contrast, as long as I keep it safe, jewerly may give me happiness for a long time. In other words, that give me more satisfaction than temporary pleasure of watching the concert.</SI2></BO2><CO>Therefore, due to have feeling of appreciation and possess it for a long time, I would like to choose jewerly if somebody gives me enough money to buy.</CO>
column23: Support ideas were a little short and underdeveloped, but all the points were made and everything made sense, so it was a fine essay.

column1: 292&If you could invent something new, what product would you develop? use specific details to explain why this invention is needed.
column3: <IN>The invention of the microwaves have made it easier to prepare meal. Before it is invented, people could not heat the food, which is once preserved in the fringe, without the help of the gas range. So, it was a big revolution of the kitchen and eating habits in the 20th centuries. <TS>Then how about the cooking machine which makes food automatically instead of human using the materials of certain food that people put inside.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>This auto-cooking machine will serve the wholesome food within a short time.</MI1> <SI1><EX>Traditionally, for ordinary Korean wives, it takes long time to make some good foods for their families. Especially, in the morning, they should get up earlier than the other people in order to prepare breakfast although they want more sleep. In this case, this auto-cooking machine will solve the problem. They can make what people want to eat, so wives do not have to hurry in the morning as well as they can take more time on doing their personal works.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> we can taste every kind of food whenever we want to eat.</MI2> <SI2>Since it includes thousands of recipes, we are just supposed to put several buttons. For this reason, we need not go to expensive, fancy restaurants to eat delicious labster dishes. Furthermore, it is very easy to operate, so even the young child will be able to prepare their own dinner without any difficulties.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Consequently,</TR> this auto-cooking machine should be invented for the necessities of saving time and tasting almost all kinds of food with ease. This invention will make the great difference in the kitchen more than the microwaves which allowed us just to eat hot food whenever we want.</CO>
column23: In the first body paragraph, the support idea was really a specific example. There should have been more emphasis on universal application for everyone else.

column1: 293&People remember special gifts or presents that have received. Why? Use specific examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>People don¡¯t forget special gifts or presents. They remember when they¡¯ve received or who gave the things. It is natural because people want to receive love and appreciation. Presents and gifts mean ¡° I like you¡± or ¡°I thank you¡±.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Basically, I think presents means love and thanks.</MI1> <SI1>Therefore, people give gifts in special day such as birthday, teachers¡¯ day and parents¡¯ day for presenting their hearts. Especially special gifts are needed much efforts and time. So the man who receives the special gifts can feel sender¡¯s heart, such as congratulation, love. <EX><TR>For example, my friends and family gave a surprise party in my last birthday. They bought the book, which I want to read. For this surprise party, they met the last night and bought the gifts. I thought their efforts and don¡¯t forget these special gifts.</EX> </SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>What¡¯s more,</TR> special gifts can be not only stuff such as jewelry, book, and car but also spending time with favorite person and traveling with lovers.</MI2> <SI2>Such good memory has person remember that through photos and diary. <EX>My favorite movie ¡°For Love¡±, there was a man who ached by cancer. His last hope was to travel with the woman who he loves. Then, he went to travel with her. At last, he died and wearing the necklace, which bought at the place of travel.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO>Gift, this is told pleasant itself. In addition to, the things, which are contained person¡¯s love and special, and a good memory. This shouldn¡¯t be forgotten.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic issues, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 294&Some people trust their first impressions about a person's character because they believe these judgments are generally correct. Other peoplle not judge a person;s charcter quickly because they believe first impressions are often worng. Compare these two attitudes. Which attitude do ou agree with? Support your choice with specific esamples.
column3: <IN>Some people say that a person's character can be judged by his first impression. While others argue that the first impression about a man can't afford to explain his character. <TS>In my opinion, it only depends on the situation at which he has faced because of following three reasons.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> if you have an interview for your job or passing test, your face, body and even if fingers that the easiest part you have controlled must be sticked for being pressed by your neverous mind.</MI1> <SI1>It should make you be seen less intelligent . <TR>Furthermore</TR> you can not express what you are. You judged by first impression, they have a worng information of you.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> in those situations as mentioned above, if they get a good impression of someone, but really his character may not be the same as their thought.</MI2> <SI2>Because the interview time takes only a day or a few more, he can lie about himself with easy as if he is the right or smart man whom they find, if he is so cunning or has a boldness. Of course their judging is not correct.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Last,</TR> as far as meeting a new person is concerned, I have a preference of showing my kindness to him as time is passing.</MI3> <SI3>Most of my friends often say to me that I am more active than they think before. If they mind throwing away their first judgement of me, I can not have a good relationship with them.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conculusion,</TR> as seen above, if you trust your first impressions about someone, you may deprive him of the opportunity to express what he really is and you of the good chance to have a friend or to hire a proper employee. So I strongly recommand that you should not judge only by your first feeling of a new people and you must have a excellent judgement by which you can know someone's character.</CO>
column23: The support ideas really needed examples to flesh out the ideas.

column1: 295&If you could study a subject that you have never had the opportunity to study, what would you choose? Explain your choice, using specific reasons and details.
column3: <IN>Most people usually want to learn many subjects they have never had the opportunity to study. In really, there is little chance to learn subjects people want to learn too often. <TS>But, If I obtain the opportunity to study a subject, I would prefer to learn playing tennis because playing tennis allows me to obtain sound body and the good relationship with people.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> tennis is very helpful for me to maintain healthy body.</MI1> <SI1>I should train myself hard to play tennis well because it is not easy to play. To get into the University, We should study hard many subjects except physical education. So, I have had few chances to learn tennis since my middle school. In my opinion, I believe that Maintaining healthy body is the best important to live my full life because oftentimes being sick does not give me a concentration to study hard and being sick makes me feel unhappy</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> playing tennis let me make a good friendship with one of my friend whom I would like to be familiar with because tennis is a gentle game.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> I fought with a friend of mine a few days ago. But soon, I regretted that I couldn¡¯t make a good relationship with him so suggested him to play tennis with me in our university campus. After finished playing tennis, we could recover even more faithful relationship with each other.</EX> <TR>In addition,</TR> having a good interest such as playing tennis can give people the thought that they can make the friendship with each other easily. Also playing tennis can provide us with the confidence to make a fare play in competing with others.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> someone give me a chance to study a subject, I don¡¯t hesitate to choose tennis lesson. Playing tennis usually give me not only a healthy body but also a good relationship with my friends. If you have a problem with weak body and relationship with peers, I recommend you to oftentimes play tennis with people.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic issues, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 296&Is the ability to read and write more important today than in the past? Why or why not? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>To read, write, speak, and listen are important methods for saving knowledge and communicating. Among them, in my view, reading and writing are getting more essential than in the past because our society become information age and they do role to communicate.</TS> Through a couple of examples and explanation, I will demonstrate why I think above them.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> to read and write are important in information age.</MI1> <SI1>We have to know and learn enormous knowledge, since job settings and schools require us them. If someone doesn't keep in these phases, she or he is difficult in living. <EX>My grandmother didn't go to school because her father would think women didn't need to be taught. When she was young, she didn't have discomfort for ignoring. However, now a day, she frequently says that she should learn at early age.</EX> In this manner, I think the ability to read and write is more important today.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> the power to read and write is getting indispensable because of a communicating factor.</MI2> <SI2>We spend more time on communicating. Among several communicating ways, e-mail is common and useful method. <TR>Moreover,</TR> more people want to say and discuss by e-mail. <EX>When I was first semester, I knew e-mail. At that time, it wasn't easy to me and I didn't often use. However, because my friends and professors frequently used e-mail, I had to send e-mail.</EX> Accordingly, the capability to read and write is important by a communicating way.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> I think that the ability to read and write is a essential factor today, in terms of a information age and a communicating way. So we must try to have more good capability.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic issues, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 297&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People are never satisfied with what they have; they always want something more or something different. Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3: <IN>The world is changing consistently, because people exploit nature and employ the environment to develop. So some people think that people are never satisfied with what they have; they always want something more or something different. <TS><TR>However,</TR> I disagree with the statement that human beings are never satisfied with their state, because there are some people who satisfied with their current condition because of their conviction or religious belief and some people who sacrifice themselves for other people's happiness.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> there are some people who satisfied with their current condition because of their convict of religious belief.</MI1> <SI1>These people never desire or envy physical wealth or money while they want to achieve highly moral values such as faith, love, humanity, or tolerance. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> The Indians, even untouchables, never complain with their situation and they feel happy because they believe that they could be in better condition in after-life.</EX> As seen above example, some people feel happy even though they are in bad condition owing to their convict or religious belief.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> there are some people who sacrifice themselves for other people.</MI2> <SI2>When we look around our neighborhood, we could find some people who volunteer for other people¡¯s well being. These people feel happy when they could help others. <EX><TR>To illustrate,</TR> Mother Theresa worked on for the poor and the patient for her whole life. She always with them and try to make better their situations. <TR>Furthermore,</TR> she contributed to change the views of other people who didn't care much about the poor. Finally, she awarded Novel prize for her contributions.</EX> In this respect, we could easily find people who work for other people's happiness.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I am against the statement that people are never satisfied what they have, rather I think people could do. That's because we could easily find some people who hold their moral values instead of ceaseless desire and some people who sacrifice themselves for other people's better life. I have every confidence that these people could make our life better and these people are the real driving force that develops the world.</CO>
column23: The examples cited, because they described a broad subject, probably could have used citations and statistics to back up the assertions. But otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 298&Some people are always in a hurry to go places and get things done. Other people prefer to take their time and live life a slower pace. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Some people are always in a hurry to go places and get things done while other people prefer to take their time and live life a slower pace. Both of all have their merits because individual has his own life style. <TS>But, in my opinion, I think that making haste usually benefits more than wasting my time in most of things.</TS> Being always in a hurry not only gives me much time to do something else but also make me to be advanced in many fields including academics with doing more works than others.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> I can save much time to do something else by making haste.</MI1> <SI1>I can study subjects I really want to learn, make a lucrative hobby, <EX><TR>for example,</TR> collecting stamps,</EX> and have time to stay with my family in home by using saved time. To be able to save time in everything, I may learn the way to use the time efficiently and this leads me to be diligent in my life.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> I can use the saved time in improvement of my capacity.</MI2> <SI2><EX>When I was a undergraduate student, I saw that many peers of mine usually lacked of time to study many subjects in course work. But, I have sufficient time to do it because I could save much time by always making haste. In results, I obtained a better grade than my peers in most of subjects. In addition, I have a more healthy body when compared with my friends. It is because my peers oftentimes wasted a lot of time in the bed before attended a class while I played tennis with my father in every morning. Therefore, until now, I have maintained a good condition in health and this profitable hobby also has made my whole life to be prosperous more and more.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I would prefer to be always in a hurry to go somewhere and get things done. I can save our limited time rigorously and use it in making a individual advancement. Of course, I can have a sufficient time to take easy in home during the saved time. Shortly, if people use their own time efficiently, they can have numerous time to enjoy their life as well as they can do their best in all their affairs.</CO>

column1: 299&You have enough money to purchase either a house or a business. Which would you choose to buy? Give specific reasons to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>Some people argue that purchase of a real estate is a good investment for future income, while others maintain that opportunity of managing a promising business is prefered than any other investment. <TS>In my opinion, managing a business has many advantages over a purchase of house because the former has higher expected return and more opportunities for future growth.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place,</TR> business can bring higher expected return than just puachasing of real estate.</MI1> <SI1>If working capital is used to buy a house, rent or lease fee can be achieved through by holding a house. However, its amount is small in spite of a characteristic of stability. <EX>Thirteen years ago, my cousin bought several houses to manage a real estate business but switched to internet solution business. He was greatly content with his decision.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>The main reason that I want to emphasize on is opportunities for future growth.</MI2> <SI2>As I mentioned above, just holding a house can be less risky. Furthermore it produces more stable income. In contrast to its advantages, there is few possibility for future prospect. <EX>When I was sophomore in graduate school, I was endowed with two scholarship fund. At that time, I decided to invest on venture M&A consulting firm because of future growth possibility. I have managed the business until now.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I do insist that managing a business can not only enhance the expected return of investment but also give more opportunities for future growth. Moreover, business is consistent to my characteristic of activeness and challenge. I think that uncertainty of future surroundings is attractive to business people.</CO>
column23: The two main ideas were very similar, and probably could have been combined into one large paragraph. The example in the first body paragraph needed further explanation. It doesn't quite tie into the support idea enough to make it seem like a universal idea, the way it's written it just says that your cousin made this decision and it was right for him. There needs to be further elaboration as to why that principle should also apply to everyone.

column1: 300&if you could invent somthing new, what product would you develop? Use specific details to explain why this invention in needed.
column3: <IN>If I could invent something new, I would like to product something that is useful. I think that something sould have a good purpose to use. I want to product a searcher. The searcher that I want to invent is about school text books. <TS>For example, I want to make a searcher of Biology book.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> the searcher of Biology book helps me to find something in the book.</MI1> <SI1>I take Biology this year at school. I often need to find something that is somewhere in the book. I do not have enogh time to find it, but I need find it as fast as I can. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> I want to know a meaning of 'adortion'. But i do not know what page is it in the Biology book. When something happens me like this case, I will use the searcher. So I can find the meaning of 'adortion' as fast as I can.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> I can use this for my open book test.</MI2> <SI2>When I take a open book test, it takes long time. So I can not finish the test. If I use the searcher that I want to invent, I can find answers quickly on time. I am sure that I can not use this searcher, when i take a open book test at school. But teachers sometimes allow to bring home to take the open book test. So I can use this searcher when I can bring the open book test to my home. If I use the searcher, I can find answer quickly, and i can also find answers that is close to right answers.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I want to invent a searcher of one of my text book if I have an opportunity to invent something new. Because the searcher helps to find something in my text book quickly. I think something that i invent should be useful for me. So I want to invent a searcher of one of my text book.</CO>
column23: The man issues with grammar, semantics, and vocabulary made this essay difficult to follow and understand.

column1: 301&You have enough money to purchase either a house or a business. Which would you choose to buy? Give specific reasons to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>Admittedly, the value of tangible asset, such as house, is less influenced by economy cycle. For that reason, some people may prefer to buy a house instead of a business, when they have enough money to buy only one. <TS>In my case, I would choose a business because not only it has possibilty to bring more profit but also it can be beneficial to a lot of people related to the business.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> owning a business has a potential for big money.</MI1> <SI1>If a business is well managed, it can grow fast not only in size but also in value. Therefore, owning a business can yield a greater amount of money compared to keeping a house. <EX><TR>For example, my brother had an offer to buy either a house or a small business from his close friend. He chose the business. It stared as a small sports marketing firm, but it bacame one of the renowned firm in its field.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> a good business can be favorable to every stakeholders.</MI2> <SI2>It can influence the owners, workers and the society it is doing the business in. Buying a house and owning it may be beneficial to the owner, but can it be favorable to other people? I do not think so. But, managing a good business can be helpful to owner as well as the workers and the society.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Consequently,</TR> owning a business has a potential for greater value and can do good to a lot of people around it. For those reasons, I would buy a business instead of a house, which has a limited potentail and is favorable only to myself.</CO>
column23: The second support idea was not as developed as the first one, and could have benefitted with more information.

column1: 302&A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3: <IN>It becomes sometimes an interesting issue among people that build a large factory near our community. <TS>Some people agree that build a large factory while others disagree that build a large factory. In my opinion, however, I agree that build a large factory.</TS> To illustrate why I convince my point, I treat only a few significant reasons with my vivid experiences here.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>On the negative side,</TR> a factory gives a variety of environmental pollution; air, noise, water pollution, and housing problem, and be an harmful to animal, tree.</MI1> These drawbacks must be weighed, however, against the possible positive impact of the planned factory on the community.</BO1><BO2>MI2><TR>First,</TR> it has a important advantage that build a large factory near our community.</MI2> <SI2>It could make us to be employed because factory have a variety of jobs, and would be an important source of tax revenue. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when I was a fifteen-years old, not until factory was constructed on my town did not my father have regular job. So, our family was so very poor that sustain to live properly. However, when factory was constructed in my town, my father could get a job from that factory. So, we could live more richer than past.</EX> Providing those advantages may be a essential on the rest of the community.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Consequently,</TR> I have no choice but to agree that build a large factory in my community. Because building a large factory could be a burden to my community in some ways, but it has a variety of other advantages in many ways. So it is very attractive choice to any community in my country. The reason why I think like this is because not only the factory gives us an opportunity to get a job, but the factory also could be an important source of tax revenue.</CO>
column23: The second body paragraph was written well. The first one however was completely lacking in any supporting ideas. The second sentence was more of a segueway into the second body paragraph. Supporting ideas and examples would have helped.

column1: 303&What are the some important qualities of a good supervisor(boss)? Use specific details and examples to explain why these qualities are important.
column3: <IN>I always think about this issue because i have a lot of subordinates in my office. <TS>From my experiences, most important qualities of a good boss are the leadership and the acceptability.</TS> So i will demonstrate the reason why these virtues are important for a good boss.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place,</TR> the main quality is leadership.</MI1> <SI1>When the division in a company makes a choice that is relevant to the stratege of the company, many people have a difficult in choosing a good decision. But the division that have a good boss whose quality is admired by many people and whose leadership is powerful can easily choose more developed decition, because that boss control the controversy conversation that can be found during discussion.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In the second place,</TR> the acceptability is also important.</MI2> <SI2><EX>In my office, there are a person named `il-jung kim` who can be easily in any other office and who is typical among the business men. However, there are always so many people near him. Moreover whenever he choose some decision, many people agree with him. In these days, i finally knew the reason why so many people like him. He has the acceptability. He always helps to troublesome people and likes to listen to the problem of other people.</EX> That quality attract a lot of people.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> these two virtues - the leadership and the acceptability - are the most important things that must have a good boss. Thuse, from now on i will develope myselp to be a good boss and to be a CEO like them that cited above.</CO>
column23: I'm really not sure what "acceptability" means. In the first body paragraph, it doesn't really define what "leadership" entails.

column1: 304&What is the most important animal in your country? Why is the animal important? Use reasons and specific details to explain your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>People have various opinions about important animals in my country, such as the dog, the pig, the horse, or the cow, which have their own values. Among thses, I consider the dog as the most important animal in my country.</TS> There are a coulple of reasons why I think of the dog as the most important animinal in my counry: the dog can be a good friend of lonely people and can be a faithful guarde of the blind.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>The first reason</TR> that I think that the dog is the most important animal in my country is that the dog can be a good friend of lonely people.</MI1> <SI1>Today, there are many people who live alone and they often feel lonely. However, they can's find anybody who can be thier invariable friend because other people busy with their own business. For these lonely people, dog can be a best friend at any time. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> my grandmother has lived alone since my grandfather passed away. My family wanted to live with her in Seoul, the biggest city in Korea, but she did not leave her home in rural area. So we decided give her a puppy, named Merry. Since then, my grandmother has said she is not lonely anymore because Merry could be her friend. And she says that she feel happy just like bring up a dauther.</EX> As seen above example, the dog can reduce people's loneliness by becoming their best friend.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>The another reason</TR> that dog can be a most significant animal in my country is that the dog can be a faithful guard of the blind.</MI2> <SI2>Well trained dogs can be a most reliable guider for blind people. They direct and conduct their host in the safe way. Besides, they can save their host's life. <EX><TR>To illustrate,</TR> I watched a television program about the Golden Retriever, the speciallized breed for blind people. When there was fire in a blind person's house who lived only with his dog, Golden Retriever, the dog rushed neighbor's house and barked so that the the neighbor knew the blind person was in danger. The neighbor chased the dog and rescued the blind person's life.</EX> In this respect, the dog could be a man's faithful guard especially for the blind.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> If someone ask me what is the most important animal in my country, I would answer that is the dog. That's because the dog not only could relive people's loneliness but also could guide and guard the blind people. Any other animal could not play an important roles as the dog has.</CO>
column23: The TV program in the second body paragraph should be clarified. If it was a documentary about dogs and their roles in society that would be one thing. But if this was a fictional TV show, that probably would not qualify as a good example, since someone just made it up. Otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 305&children should be required to help with household tasks as soon as they are able to do so. agrre or disagree ? use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Some people think that children should be required to help with household tasks while other people disagree with it. <TS>In my opinion, I believe that working household tasks is profitable to children in that they can help their mother and farther with small affairs and from doing that they can learn the cooperation with others.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> for children doing small household task is helpful to their mother and farther.</MI1> <SI1>When finished their work out and come back home, their parents easily feel tired. But mother usually should prepare the dinner for her family and father should oftentimes repair his car and others. If children help them do their affairs, all of them can take easy and have a much time to talk with each other.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> children may learn the cooperation with people in their society.</MI2> <SI2>If parents have given their children amount of share to be done, <EX>for example watering in the garden,</EX> since their childhood, children may learn the responsibility with their work and this leads them the advanced intelligent people who can cooperate well with anyone else.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> having helped their parents with household task since their childhood benefits for the all family. It is not only helpful to mother and farther of children but also make children to be people whom their society needs.</CO>
column23: The support ideas could have been developed deeper but it covered all the points.

column1: 306& Some people think that they can learn better by themselves than with a teacher. Others think that it is always better to have a teacher. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons to develop your essay.
column3: <IN><TS>Reading this question, "What do you think between that you can learn better by yourselves and that it is always better to have a teacher", I'd like to tell you that I perfer to have a teacher.</TS> I want to tell you some of the reasons why I choose the latter.</IN><BO1><MI1>Teachers is like shortcut, namely they show what the content is.</MI1> <SI1>If there is no light, even though there is a road, we can't find the right way. If you find the right road, it will be very difficult and also cost a lot and much expenses named time and endeavor.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>And teacher always answer us about something we don't know as we feel itchy on the back we need someone to scratch it.</MI2> <SI2>Even though we have in trouble solving qustions, if we have teacher in the reached area we can put down the whole load on our shoulder. Teacher is like an elevator when we are in the slump.</SI2><CO><TR>In concluison,</TR> teacher is like the shortcut and light to all students. Teacher is not only the person who teach us some contents but also give us some wise like the wick of the candle. So I can say that teacher is my past and present and lead us to our future.</CO>
column23: The support ideas really needed examples or statistics. Lack of transitions made the essay seem a little muddy.

column1: 307&During this century, opportunities for communication have changed greatly because of technological inventions such as the radio, telephone, computer, fax machine, and telex machine. Choose one of these inventions, or any other that you think is important, and dicuss its effect on communication between people or between nations. Use concrete examples in your discussion.
column3: <IN><TS>There has been many inventions such as telephone, fax, e-mail etc. And I think cellphone plays a important role in our lives.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>first,</TR> cellphone is very easy to use and convient.</MI1> <SI1>many people have cellphone communicating each other. And people use it every day because it is very simple to communicate. If you know the number of your friend's house, than you can call anytime anywhere except certain area. Also people can let each other know imformation faster than sending mail.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>second,</TR> cellphone has many special features which people want.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> my father's cellphone has feature of diary which you can make a note. And it is very useful.</EX> Not only that, but now people can access imformation from cell phone internet. you can email to your friend or check the weather.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>in conclusion,</TR> I believe cellphone is needed in our lives as telephone in these day because of convience and many special feature. And cellphone can be essential to every person in the future.</CO>
column23: Many grammar and format errors made it difficult to follow sometimes. The ideas in the essay overall were fine, they just needed to be communicated better. More explanation in the intro would have helped as well.

column1: 308& (Some people prefer living in small town while others prefer living in big city. Which do you prefer?)
column3: <IN>One of the most important ways to decide where to live is to know what kind of a person you are. Some people would prefer to live in a big city while other people love to live in a small city. <TS>In my case, I have found that I prefer to live in a big city because I can use a big library to lend books near home and a big city has a many adequate places for me to take a rest.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>The first reason I like to live in a big city is</TR> that I can go to lend books from a big library in a few minutes.</MI1> <SI1>A small city usually doesn¡¯t have a big library. Even though there is a big library in a small city, it is remote from my home. But, in a big city, library is always available, so I can lend books I want to read. <TR>In addition,</TR> I can also use a computer in a big library. Therefore, I can do my homework quickly and easily in a library and this will even give me more chances to study other subjects I want to learn.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>The second reason I would like to live in a big city is</TR> that a big city has many things for me to use to take a rest.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> I can go to a movie with a friend of mine, a department store to have a shopping with family, and museums that make me to be excited with various artifacts.</EX> <TR>Moreover,</TR> with having a rest in these places at a weekend, I can study on my course work more efficiently in weeks.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I would like to choose a big city as a place I prefer to live in because a big city usually has an accessible library near home and allows me to use many adequate places to take a rest easily. I believe that most of university students also prefer to live in a big city for these two reasons. Living a big city eventually helps us students to make an efficient life too often.</CO>
column23: There were a lot of grammar and semantic issues but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 309&What do you think is the most important animal in your country? Why?
column3: <IN><TS>The question of what is the most important animal in my country is a very difficult one for me. Although I love most of animals in my country, if I should choose only one, I would like to talk about a tiger.</TS> The importance of a tiger lies not only in mental aspects of Korean but also in the fact that tiger is the extinctive animal in Korea.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>The first reason</TR> a tiger is the most important animal in Korea is that our ancients considered a tiger as the most brilliant animal that inspires the army to fight bravely in order to keep national territory from enemies.</MI1> <SI1><EX>Many soldiers who wanted to be bold in wars hunted a tiger and drank his blood because they believed drinking a blood of a tiger made them real fighters. Until now, a tiger has had an important meaning to mental aspects of Korean army because of its bravery.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Another reason</TR> I think a tiger is the most important animal in Korea is that a tiger is almost an expired species in Korea.</MI2> <SI2>A century ago, there were over one hundred of thousand tigers in my country. However, because of many industries in anywhere and reduction of forest thereof, most of tigers lost their home and disappear recently. Now, even though we go out far from city, there is little chance for us to find a tiger in Korea. <TR>Moreover,</TR> a tiger is a very rare animal in the world as well as in Korea. Therefore, we should keep tigers from being killed and, as a result, being extinct.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I would like to choose a tiger as the most important animal in Korea because a tiger has given us a significant meaning in mental aspects and, a tiger is one of the extinctive animals in the world. I believe that most of Korean even adore a tiger as a benevolent animal and want a tiger to be popular again in Korea.</CO>
column23: All the bases were covered so it was a fine essay, but the support ideas really could have used more information including hard data from research.

column1: 310&Some young children spend a great amount of their time practicing sports. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>It is very important to practice sports during adolescence.</TS> Some people think that children spend more time to practice sports while others argue that a great amount of their time practicing sports have some dangerous aspects. In my opinion, spending more time to practice sports has advantages because of developing their health during adolescence and contributing to make many friends, but has disadvantages due to disinterest another field except sports and reduce their time with family.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> Sports practicing enables children to develop their health and to enhance their sociabilty.</MI1> <SI1>During adolescence, the muscle and height are almost completed. If they only focus on their studys such as mathematics and physics in home, they would have no chance to enhance their muscle and height. In modern life, the healthful body is more attractive factor than knowledge. <TR>Also,</TR> the sports make a connection with friends. <TR>Therefore,</TR> children should intensify their sociabilty though sports. In this manner, Spending more time to practing sports help them to make a good health and many fiends.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> Sports practicing is possible to disinterest studies in another field and reduce their time with family.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> wasting a entire time to enjoy sports each day, children have no longer time to accumulate knowledge in basic field such as mathematics and physics which is basis on making their analytic thinking.</EX> Furthermore, due to excessive time to enjoy sports, children would loss a time to talk with family which help them developing their intuition during adolescense. By investigation, the 70 percent of children with poor chance to meet family would make a social criminal when they are adult. Thus excessive time consuming for practicing sport cause them to judicious thought and prevent them from developing ingenuity.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> it is a indispensable factor to enhance childrens body and to make friends in modern life. However, if children excessively spends a great amount of their time practicing sports, they would not like another study and lose a enjoyable life with their family.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and formatting errors, but otherwise this is a good essay.

column1: 311&Plants can provide food, shelter, clothing, or medicine. What is one kind of plant that is important to you or the people in your country? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>In Korea, many kinds of plant are considered importantly to peoples in that provide food, shelter, clothing, or medicine. <TS>Among many kinds of plants, I think that pine tree is the most important plant because it provides timber and prevent flood due to storing water.</TS> Through the use of two examples and specific explanation, I will demonstrate why I think pine tree is the most important plant.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> the fine tree supply large amount of timber that is used for making houses, paper, and construction materials.</MI1> <SI1>Actually, the 70% of Korea is consisted of mountain area and 70% of the tree consisting forest is pine tree. Therefore, pine tree can supply ample natural resources.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> owing to the high portion of pine tree, the mountain is mainly filled with pine tree.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Consequently,</TR> pine tree must do important role to prevent flood. This year, we suffered big flood because of large typhoon and tremendous flood swept all of the country. The areas filled with pine tree have little damage, however, the area having low pine tree density have big damage.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary,</TR> pine tree play important roles that provide timber and hinder flood. To conserve the advantage, we have to plant more pine tree. I think that pine tree is the most important plant in our country</CO>
column23: The support ideas really needed much more information. The essay felt very underdeveloped.

column1: 312&People do many different things to stay healthy. What do you do for good health? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>I always think about this issue. Most important reasons that i want to tell are these habits:regular exercise and possitive thinking.</TS> Accodingly i will describe why these habits help you to improve your health.</IN><BO1><MI1>My main reason is regular exercise.</MI1> <SI1>In these days, i am swimming and jogging in the gym. These activities make me feel good and result in concentrating my job. <EX><TR>Moreover,</TR> before starting swimming, i suffered from the illness that relevant to skin. Now, i could cure it for myself.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In the second place,</TR> possitive thinking makes you healthy.</MI2> <SI2>The daily newspaper say that the modern people working in the office can be caught a cold more frequently than the ordinary people because of some stress and that if he can escape from the stress, he will live longer. I agree with the issue in that the stress force you not to think in a possitive way. Please try out! If you think every thing in a possitive way, you can do something easily that you consider to feel difficult. Also your health will be improved.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> you can be heathy person if you follow me. Thuse as far as i am concerned that both activities are most important thing to be healthy for me.</CO>
column23: The thesis was not very strong and didn't seem to provide a definitive answer directly to the question. The support ideas really needed to be developed further.

column1: 313&What are some of the qualities of a good parent? Use specific details and examples to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>There are many values to evaluate the qualities of a good parent in the countries. Some people think good parent has a responsibility of offspring, while others believe good parent has an ability to buy or educate them. <TS>In my opinion, the qualities of good parent are love and life's examples to their son and daughter.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> one of the qualities of good parent is love for their child.</MI1> <SI1>Most of people spent much time with parent from birth to death. Also, during the time, we learn how to love people throughout parent's affection. In a research of Chosunilbo, one of newspapers in Korea, children who don't receive sufficient love from parent are higher percent of committing crime than those of accepting love from parent. As seen above the result of research, Parent's affection has an influence to children for their life.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second of all,</TR> good parent in many qualities of parent give life's examples to children.</MI2> <SI2>People first meet parent from birth and parent grow up their child. During child's growth, children learn a lot of behavior, customes and rule from parent. Therefore, parent's behavior is very important to children. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> I learned responsibility and the sprit of save from my parent who keeps their rule as people must make an effort to their position and save resources.</EX> In this aspect, excellent parent's life is the most sample in children's life.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> If I choose the factors of excellent parent, I want to say that the requesting items for becoming excellent parent show children to love and sample through their life. Parent has an important effect to their offspring in life and parent's roles are becoming increasely important.</CO>
column23: There were some grammar and semantic issues but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 314&Plants can provide food, shelter, clothing, or medicine. What is one kind of plant that is important to your or the people in your country? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice
column3: <IN>people have an opinion about important plants in my country. such as tomato, ginseng, pine tree which have its own values. <TS>among these I consider the toamto is the most important plant in my country.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>to begin with.</TR> toamto is one of we can meet easily in korea.</MI1> <SI1>tomato contains a lot of nutriment such as vitamin E, Vitamin C which improve body condition. <EX>when I exhusted I used to drink a juice made of tomato, it get rid of fatigue of my body.</EX></SI1><BO1><MI2><TR>to be countinue ,</TR> tomato is very useful in cooking.</MI2> <SI2>we can see when people eat a food add toamto source because it has a unique taste .<EX><TR>for example</TR> my mom put tomato in food to make its taste good and to look so good.</EX> toamto can be add to any food like fries, noodle and meat cooking helping to improve quality of food.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>third,</TR> if he/ she who wants rise something at limited place, he/ she will rise one easily.</MI3> <SI3><EX>I live in apartment, my dad likes plants all kinds. he always wanna get some plant,someday my dad got a stem of tomato tree. we had thought that is going to die soon. but it grow up and yeild its fruit.</EX></SI3></BO3><CO><TR>in conclusion</TR> someone asks me what is the most plant in my county I would say that is tomato. that is because the toamto not only improve our health but also give us pleasure to rise something which have life.</CO>
column23: The formatting, grammar, and spelling had many problems which made the essay hard to follow sometimes. The support ideas really needed far more development, especially with the examples.

column1: 315&People do many different things to stay healthy. What do you do for good health? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Health is everything. Wealth without health can never bring you any meanings for your life. Today's societies are more exposed in a variety of contaminants and different new deseases are emerging continualy. For these reasons, the imporatance of health is increasing ; People do many different things to stay healthy. <TS>As for me, there are four things for my health : the two related to exercise and another two close to a folk remedy. The first ways are exercise and walking , and the latter is a kind of Korean traditional medical treatment, called Sujichim and relaxing through the sauna.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Undoubtedly, I think one of the best ways is regulary exercise.</MI1> <SI1>In fact , I have been exercising in the health club near my house since the beginning of the last year . So busy as I was , at that time , I was willing to make time for an exercise. Although I 'm fed up with , light exercise helps me feel better. Above all , while I'm doing on a running machine , I can reflect on that day wholly. Also , I'm habituated to walk at other times. I think that brisk walking also stimulates the circulation. Sometimes this is better, when I cannot afford to make time for exercise because it takes less time than in the gym. Besides, whenever time is given to me, I prevent any symtomes with Sujichim ,which takes potential effects because it helps the circulation in the body . As a matter of fact, I believe that it also makes the pimples on my face alleviated as well as relieved of my fatigue.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2></TR>Additionally,</TR> I enjoy special bathing , which is also Korean strong sauna than common ways you think.</MI2> <SI2>Through that , a lot of amount of perspiration with waste matters from my body comes out, and then I feel refresh. This also helps us have a good circulation</SI2></BO2><CO>Basically, our traditional medical field beleives that our human body system need to circulate altogether without any interference, not separately. In these ways, It seems that it is effective enough in the long view for me to keep in a good shape.</CO>
column23: The second supporting idea really lacked substance, especially as compared to the first. More description on how it helps would have helped the essay.

column1: 316&WHAT DO YOU DO TO STAY HEALTHY?
column3: <IN>As the quality of life is getting better generally, people's concern about their health is increasing. There are lots of things that help you to stay fit, such as jogging, swimming and mountain climbing. <TS>In my case, I play golf for the following reasons; one is that I do a lot of walking on field and the other is that golf courses are placed in country side where the air is very clean and fresh.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> it takes about 5 hours to finish the whole round, therefore, playing golf helps my physical health to stay strong.</MI1> <SI1>A long walk on grass field is not only helpful for the basic health, but also for the heart. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> in a survey held in the last edition of Korean magazine 'Health', golf was ranked in top as the best favorable sports for heart.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> country clubs are usually located in the rural areas, where there are plenty of trees and clean surroundings.</MI2> <SI2>In Seoul, the city I live in, it is very difficult to be exposed to fresh air. Therefore, the freshness of air is a crucial reason for me to play golf.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Consequently,</TR> I play golf to stay in shape, because it requires a long walk in a clean environment. Moreover, I can have a friendly chat and stay connected with my family who I usually play the game with. If someone consults me with his/her health problem, I would not hesitate to say that playing golf is the best way to stay healthy.</CO>
column23: The support ideas needed to be developed further, especially the second one.

column1: 317&Some people believe that the Earth is being harmed (damaged) by human activity. Others feel that human activity makes the Earth a better place to live. What is your opinion? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>There are varied opinions whether human activity causes a damage or a better place to live to Earth. Some peoples think the Earth is harmed by human due to destruct ecosystem while others argue that human activity makes the earth a better place to live. <TS>In my opinion, I think human activity make great hamful effects to Earth because of destruction of food-chain and possibility of disaster.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> the excessive human activity destruct a food-chain and cause the food lackness of human being.</MI1> <SI1>Accoding to progress Industial Revolution, people constucted many buildings and factories in agricultual place. For example, the fog could not find their food in disappeared agricultual place. The result cause to deaden the snake. Finally Cows and pigs, who are main food to keep human's health, could not live in this place. In this manner, human lose their food because aggresive cultivation.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> the excessive human being cause disaster because of destruction of natural system.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> We cut trees in field to build a factory. When the big rain fall into the field, the many dose of rain cannot be prevented without existing tree. In this result, we would loss the habitat and somtimes human's lives.</EX> As seen the above example, human activity result in disaster and cause the unfortune of human being.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I think that people should maintain the nature of Earth because the aggressive human activity finally cause the loss of human's food and disaster we never expect.</CO>
column23: In the first body paragraph, what exactly progress Industrial Revolution is should be specified. Is it a magazine? A tv show? Not everyone will know what that is. Otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 318&What are some of the qualities of a good parent? Use specific details and examples to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>As a human being, after being born in this world, someday we become a parent. To become a good parent, some people say we should have much money to support their children's request; while, other people declare it's necessary to have aggressiveness to lead children to have an active life. <TS><TR>However,</TR> if I am asked of what are the qualities of a good parent, I will suggest deep love for children and generosity.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> deep love is one of the most important qualities to become a good parent.</MI1> <SI1>In this world, the very special relationship between people is made by the bridge, 'love'. While, it is never deniable most of the relation between people is based on their object and not so intimate. Still, the parent's deep love for our children makes their relationship much different from it. Deep love enables off-springs to not only endure much hardship during life and but also know how to love other people. Thus, deep love for children should be ranked as the first value.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second of all,</TR> generosity is also a vital virtue as a good parent.</MI2> <SI2>Growing children have a tendency to make many mistakes or behave wrong. At this time, if a parent spanks or scold children every time they make mistakes, children might not learn well about what aspect they did wrong, but be dreadful for only being reproached. On the other hand, if child is taught by their parent what should be corrected from their wrong behavior, they would know their flaw and be a more righteous person. Therefore, generosity makes children better educated.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary,</TR> by above-mentioned reasons and examples, I strongly insist on that deep love and generosity are the most indispensable factors to be a good parent. The relationship linked by genuine love and generosity makes itself the greatest one in this world, giving rise to make children become more suitable persons in our society.</CO>
column23: Some of the connections between the supporting ideas and conclusions were ambiguous. For example, in the first body paragraph it says "Deep love enables off-springs to not only endure much hardship during life and but also know how to love other people." There should be a further explanation on how exactly that happens, why one will somehow lead to the other.

column1: 319&What do you do to stay health?
column3: <IN>there are lots of people concern about their health through all over the world. to improve and to keep their health people take nurishmenting food which made of something special or do some sports in the morning such as jogging, tennis, swimming. <TS>everybody have each good way to stay their health in my case, I play jogging and tennis to stay my health.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>first of all,</TR> whenever an opportunity comes to me I try to run around my apartment in the morning.</MI1> <SI1>fresh air makes my lungs strong, increased jogging distance gives me some accomplishment. according to reslut of experiment, running is the best way to remove a flesh of our waist. as we know, to remove a flesh of waist keep our health from the threat of desease.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>second,</TR> tennis increase the power of muscle of our whloe body as well as give us quick in action.</MI2> <SI2>then this is a sports, not enjoy alone, which can take a pleasure with my partner. I used to talk about my partner that helps me to solve some kinds of matters and I sometimes be free from stresses. I think that to free from stress secure our health.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> though there are a lot of ways to stay health , I think what the best way to keep our health find what is the most comportable sports to me and enjoy it ceaseless instead of rely on some foods or drugs.</CO>
column23: A lot of grammar, formatting, and spelling problems. This kind of topic really would have benefitted from scientific research data about the effects of the exercises you wrote about.

column1: 320&Some items (such as clothes or furniture) can be made by hand or by machine. Which do you prefer ?items made by hand or items made by machine? Use reasons and specific examples to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>In these days, lots of goods are manufacutured from factories. Despite to that, there are still some hand-made items. Some people prefer those things because of specialties of those. Others preper the things made by machine because of it's cheap price. <TS>If I have to choose one thing from those two, I will chose the thing made by hand.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> items which are made by hand have high quilities.</MI1> <SI1>That is because, they are made with the special efforts to make them best by the maker. <EX>We know about the famous watches made in Swissland. They are mostly made by hand and, therefore, so famous in the world about their delicate designs. They are usually sold in very high price. Because most people knows their high quilities, they think their high price have worth to pay.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> those items have usually some special properties of their own which are impossible for the things made by machine.</MI2> <SI2>Almost all items manufactured by machine have same quilities and same properties, so it is hard to differentiate one from others. <EX>A tailor usually makes only one clothe with same design. There is no clothe same to that in the world. Opposite to that, the clothes made by machine have much of same designs. How do you feel when you find the man who wears same clothe to you on the street?</EX> That is why I prefer the item made by hand.</SI2></BO2><CO>There are a plenty of mass producted things around us. Most of them have same quilities and same properies. It is difficult to find any speacilties on that. From that reason, I prefer the hand made items.</CO>
column23: There were many grammar and spelling problems, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 321& Some people prefer to live in a small town. Others prefer to live in a big city. Which place would you prefer to live in? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer
column3: <IN><TS>Some people think that living in a big city isn't benefits. unfortunately, people who believe this to be true don't understand various advantages in a big city. In fact, I have lived in a big city of Seoul since 17 years ago. I also lived in a small town for 13 years. from my experiences,I prefer to live in a big city for following three reasons.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> there are a number of large and small companies in a big city.</MI1> <SI1>Those companies need much more employees than a small town. Therefore, people who live in a big city have more chance to get the jop than anyone who live in a small town. As a matter of fact, unployment rate in a small town is quite high and there are only few type of jop opennings.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Another reasnon that I prefer to live in a big city is</TR> to use the convenient transportation networks.</MI1><SI2><EX><TR>for example,</TR> subway network, various bus line, and numerous taxis can cover almost area of them.In my case, when I plan to go somewhere whthin a big city, I can seldom experience any discomfort.</EX>In contrary, I can't go anyplace, whenever I want, whthout my own vehicles.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>finally,</TR> people can easy get something unique from large shopping centers in a big city.</MI3> <SI3>In big city,There are many types of shopping centers such as department stores, shopping mall, and discount store.with its abundant shopping centers, people can get almost whatever they want to buy at a relatively cheap price.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> the life in a big city is more favority for me because of its employment opportunities,accessibility on transportation, and various shopping networs. Enjoying such advantages, our lives can live more qulity in a big city. </CO>
column23: Many grammar, formatting, and spelling errors that made the essay difficult to follow at times. The first and third body paragraphs would have benefitted from examples. The second body paragraph would have benefitted from an additional sentence or two that explained the examples.

column1: 322&What are some of the qualities of a good parent? Use specific details and examples to explain your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>There are many factors to evaluate the qualities of a good parent. I think that the most important factors are the responsibility, the love, and the financial ability to grow the children up.</TS> First of all, let's find the meaning of each item with some examples in detail in below.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> the love can easily be mapped to the best friendship between the children and the parents.</MI1> <SI1>That is to say, when the children are very confused and wandered just like in the age of puberty, mom and daddy can play roles as the best partners to speak their mind and truth. In this point, we can say that the love of the parent is equivalent to the true friendship.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> like the preceding, the parent with a strong sense of responsibility can also be compared to the respectable teacher.</MI2> <SI2>The teacher can guide the children to find what they want to be in the future and to develop their potential for themselves. The parents know much more about their children than the teacher and spend much time with their son and daughter. Mom and daddy can perform the above duties as a respectable teacher very well.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Last,</TR> the financial ability of the parent is very important element and can be said as 911 Rescue corps metaphorically.</MI3> <SI3>Money is not all in the life, but when you have no or only small money, you must be miss many good opportunities to experience something (e.g. education, leisure, travel and so on) and sometimes fall into a lot of difficulties. The financial ability of the parent can be a solid background to support and guard the children anytime like 911 Rescue corps.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> the above described each factor is very important to evaluate the qualities of a good parent, but it alone cannot explain a good parent sufficiently well. Therefore these must be mutually combined to evaluate a good parent rationally. Good parents must have the love just like the best friendship for their children and the responsibility of the respectable teacher, and with the solid financial ability like 911 Rescue corps.</CO>
column23: "First of all" was unnecessary in the last sentence of the essay. The support ideas really needed some researched data or at least examples so it doesn't sound like just opinion.

column1: 323&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A person's childhood years (the time from birth to twelve years of age) are the most important years of a person's life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>People take several steps such as childhood years and old stage. Among them, some say that adult period is most important. <TS><TR>However,</TR> in my opinion, a person's childhood years are most essential year of a person's life, because of social development and mental growth.</TS> Through the use of a couple of examples and specific explanation, I will demonstrate why I think above them.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> a reason of importance of childhood years is their social development.</MI1> <SI1>During young age, children make their social ability. Moreover, it influence on their whole life. According to the Korean society of psychology, it is patent that children take love by their parents and build trust relationship. If they haven't done them, it would be difficult that they make good life. Therefore, childhood years are most important of their life.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> I think that childhood years give children mental growth.</MI2> <SI2>Human's brain become well growth at young age. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> I know a person who has a talent to play piano. She was my friend that started learning piano playing when she was three years. Also, I know another person who is learning piano playing and started it at high school stage. Compare with two persons, they learned for same years, yet their ability for playing piano is very different and first woman is more capable than later. Accordingly, young age is important in their mental growth.</EX></SI2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> I think that a person's childhood years are the most important year of their life for children's social and mental development. If they have fully these developing chances, they become more successful people.</CO>
column23: The second supporting idea could have used some more information to apply it to everyone, because right now it sounds like an isolated case. Otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 324& A company has announced that it wishes to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community. Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3: <IN>Nowadays, our community people say that they want to have more convenient traffic and are fed up with many people's unemployment in our area. In this situation, some people are against building a large factory because it would cause the traffic congestion to be more increased ; while, other people are favorable for the plan because it will give our community more chance to get a job. <TS>As far as I'm concerned, I support the plan because I believe reducing unemployment is the most urgent problem in our habitat.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>On the one hand,<TR> building a large factory in our community has an advantage in that it allows us more profession opportunity.</MI1> <SI1>According to a recent survey about the rate of unemployment, it shows 23 percent of unemployment; very severe compared with normal area. High unemployment not only causes frozen local economy but also multiplies crime rate such as murder and shoplift. Nonetheless, if a large factory is constructed, it would provide many people with opportunity to get a walk of life and reduce the delinquency rate. Therefore, building a big factory would be so beneficial for our community.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> construction of a big factory in our community would give rise to more traffic congestion.</MI2> <SI2>Above-mentioned, our province people have had much difficulty in using traffic facility. We do not have frequent community buses nor sufficient road. <TR>In addition,</TR> if a great factory is made, the traffic jam problem would be more worse. Even though a new plan to enlarge the roads might be made, it would be so hard to execute it because of unbelievable cost and protest of resident near the road because they have little money to move somewhere else. Thus, building a large workplace cannot refrain from resulting in more severe traffic congestion.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary,</TR> being a big factory in our community would be helpful for increasing more vocation opportunity and harmful in that traffic would become more inconvenient. None the less, I support the plan of building a large factory because reducing unemployment rate is more imminent than any other problem in our community. Besides, when we see in long term view, extending road would also be possible after making our province more wealthy.</CO>
column23: The second supporting idea would have been stronger with some data just as was provided in the first paragraph. But otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 325&The government has announced that it plans to build a new university. Some people think that your community would be a good place to locate the university. Compare the advantages and disadvantages of establishing a new university in your community. Use specific details in your discussion.
column3: <IN><TS>If another university is built in our community, it could cause some advantages and disadantages.</TS> To discuss the advantages and disadvantages, I might need to introduce our community in advance. Our community already has a state university, and actually our town has started to develope after the university opened. Establishing another university could bring futher advance to our town, but might give by-products as well.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> a new university could lead ecnomic devlopement.</MI1> <SI1>In fact, nowadays our town is in stagnation, and many people cannot find their occupations. Students and staffs of a new university would need more facilities, shops and so on, and could be good consumers, and it might make more job supply. New university could make our dorment society vivid.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> the extention programs and a lot of facilities like libraries could enrich the life on this town.</MI2> <SI2>In the other hand, a new university could cause some bad effects. Traffic jam and other problems concerning transportation might arise. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> last year, the rate of traffic accident was risen in accordance with the increased number of students. If the population get bigger because of a new university, there could be much more troubles. Besides, the lack of parking space and the inflation of rental fee of apartment would make worse the living condition of our community.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> to start a new university could present the renasance of economy to our town and offer various opportunities and facilities. In contrast, it could cause some traffic problems and increase of living cost. Detailed invastigation and planning of the government are needed.</CO>
column23: For a topic like this, the support idea could have greatly benefitted from researched data about the needs and interests of the community and projections on what would happen.

column1: 326&How do movies or television influence people's behavior? Use reasons and specific examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>What if movies or television are not in our life? Concentrating on this question, we can derive the process how movies and television influence people's behavior. <TS>As far as I'm concerned, movies or television have an effect on people's behavior by having them imitate the celebrity's action in those and behave feeling as if they act seen by audience.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> movies or television have an impact on people's behavior by making people imitate the celebrity's performance in movies or television.</MI1> <SI1>Usually many people have some fancy to take after their favorite entertainer such as a singer, a movie star, or supermodel. <EX>If a famous comedian make an interesting dance in television, it is not usually difficult to see some people, especially teenagers, dancing in the street. In addition, after 'Titanic' was seen in many theaters, we could see many couples making similar performance here and there with man grabbing woman's waist behind her and woman standing her arms stretched.</EX> <TR>Therefore,</TR> movies or television make people mimic the entertainer's action.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second of all,</TR> people have a tendency to behave hypothesizing they are real actor or celebrity before audience.</MI2> <SI2>Sometimes they are confused as though they are making movie or television program as a hero. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> a few monthes ago, there occured an accident that a seconday school student killed his classmate because of being despised and segregated by him. He just imitated the action performed by Donggeon, Jang in a Korean movie, 'Friend' killing his classmate with knife. After he was caught to the police, he confessed that he did that delinquency thinking the cruel scene of 'Friend' and regreted his crime.</EX> Thus, movies or a television make people confused between reality and plot of movies or television.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> movies or television have influence on people's behavior by making them mimic the celebrity and hypothesize as if they are real actor or entertainer. On the one hand, it gives us fun things we can share; however, it also cause us not to distinguish between reality and hypothesis.</CO>
column23: Some grammar issues but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 327&Neighbors are the people who live near us. In your opinion, what are the qualities of a good neighbor? Use specific details and examples in your answer.
column3: <IN>According to a Korean proverb, neighbors who live in near me may be much better than relatives who live in far away. That is to say, neighbors can help me in many daily difficult situations. This proverb assumes basically that these neighbors have good qualities. <TS>Then, what are good qualities? I think that it is to consider others carefully just like the member of their family.</TS></IN><BO1>To clarify this concept, I'll introduce a story of my neighbor with good qualities. <SI1><EX>I traveled Cheju_island for a week with my family in last summer. During the period of my travel, milk and newspaper were delivered and accumulated everyday in front of the main entrance because there was nobody else in my house. These accumulated milk and newspaper might be a good symbol to notify a burglar that nobody else was in. But, my neighbor removed them everyday of his own accord not to notify a burglar the status of my home. When I knew the fact at the end of travel, I realized that he was a really good neighbor. He considered me carefully just like the member of his family. </EX><TR>On the contrary,</TR> if there is no consideration in neighborhood, many problems may be happened. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> many people fight often one another due to noise in the apartment house without a soundproof wall.</EX></SI1> <MI1>If they consider carefully other people, these troubles may be not happened.</MI1></BO1><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I think that the most important quality of a good neighbor is consideration for others. According to circumstances, it is either easy or hard for you to consider other people carefully in your everyday conduct.
