But if you give a consideration to other people, many people including you may be happy and you will be a good neighbor.</CO>
column23: The essay was good for what it was, however it did not follow the I/B/C format. All of the stuff between the intro and the conclusion was basically just one Body paragraph and one main idea, it just illustrated two sides of it.

column1: 328&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Universities should give the same amount of money to their students¡¯ sports activities as they give to their university libraries. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>Nowadays, concern about sports activities is increasing in university due to growing interest in health and extra curricular activities. <TS>It might be true that sports activities are helpful for strengthening university students' health and providing them refreshing time from hard work, however, I do not agree with the above statement that universities should give the same amount of money to their students' sports activities because the libraries functions as the heart of the university and excessive investment on sports activities might be harmful for universities students' study.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place,</TR> libraries should get as much money as possible from limited university budget because they are the heart of university.</MI1> <SI1>In these days, the function of libraries are becoming wider. Providing students with not only opportunity to refer to huge amount of books and thesis but also self studying place, libraries help the students' study. By giving convenience for students to study like these, libraries functions as the heart of universities. Therefore, libraries should take the most money from the limited one.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In the second place,</TR> excessive spending in students' sports activities is more or less harmful to their study.</MI2> <SI2>The main purpose of university is to promote students to improve their ability in their major, finally to contribute our society and nation with the developed capability. It might not be deniable that sports activities allow students to release their stress from their homework and examination; still, if they excessively concentrate on sports activities, they cannot spend time enough to catch up with their study. Thus, it is not desirable to use the same money in sports activities as to do in libraries.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To summarize,</TR> giving the same amount of money to students' sports activities as to university libraries should be denied because of libraries' function as the heart of universities and possibility of being hazardous to students' study. Sports activities are just meaningful when they function helpfully to students' study with proper amount; if excessive, it would be rather hurtful.</CO>
column23: This was a fine essay, but in the second body paragraph, it was not a strong connection between giving sports programs more money and it distracting students. Would the sports having more money somehow cause students to spend more time on it? That sort of thing should have been clarified better.

column1: 329&You have enough money to purchase either a house or a business. Which would you choose to buy? Give specific reasons to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>Some people like to have a house rather than a business because they can live conveniently and peacefully without much concern about the bankruptcy of a business. <TS><TR>However,</TR> if I have enough money to purchase either a house or a business, I would choose the latter without any hesitation because I can manage my own work and it gives more opportunity to earn much money.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place,</TR> buying a business allows me to manage my own work.</MI1> <SI1>There goes a saying, "Rolling stone gathers no moss," Having my own business would provide me with many challenge to resolve. <EX>To get most profit from the market, I should survey peoples' taste and make some strategy to make my business superior to many competitor.</EX> It might be true that I can get some stress from it but I can really enjoy challengable life from it. With aggressive enterprise, I am assuredly sure that I can manage my company well making my life more happy one.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In the second place,</TR> having a business gives me more chances to earn much money.</MI2> <SI2>Even though I just had extra money except the business itself at the start of managing it, I can enlarge my capital by getting interest from the business. Developing my business, I can extend it to several area or even to foreign country. By expanding my business, I could make much money. While, if I have just a house, I would not be able to multiply my money because I cannot invest on anything. Money cannot be earned without an effort.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To summarize,</TR> on condition that a chance to get either a house or a business is allowed to me, I will start my business in next to no time because I want to live a challengeable life and I can make much money. As for me, the mean of being alive is both to challenge for the world and to use the most of my ablilty, earning much money as well.</CO>
column23: Some grammar issues but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 330&Many people visit museums when they travel to new places. Why do you think people visit museums? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>What do you do in your spare time? Many people may answer to this question, ¡°I use to travel to new places¡±. Where do you go there? Most people may answer to this question, ¡°Museums¡±. <TS>Why do they visit museum when they travel to new places? I believe they go museums for two reasons: to get great opportunities to see strange and spectacle things and to provide instructive facts for children.</TS></IN><BO1><SI1>Do you live in city? Then, you must see a tall building, a steal car and a cool road at everyday. Or do you live in the countryside? Then, you will be fully surrounded with trees and soils. In order to escape the routine life, sometimes we take a trip. Then, where will you want to go at first? Museum, a place in where many interesting and strange things were displayed, is just there. There are all kinds of museum with various things such as dolls, reptiles, computers, clocks, flowers and even living human organs.</SI1> <MI1>In other words, at museums, we can have spectacle experiences that we be never able to get at our hometown.</MI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> at museum, children are able to get various knowledge that don¡¯t learn at school.</MI2> <SI2><EX>When I was an elementary student, my father and I visited a museum in Jeju island where various marine animals were displayed. Because I have lived in city all the time, there was not any opportunity that I could see live marine animals. I got many knowledge about from invertebrates such as jelly fishes, periwinkles and bivalves to vertebrates containing colorful fishes. The visit was very encouraging for me to learn nature.</EX> </SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I think that museums give me opportunities to see strange things and to provide instructive information to children. If you plan to take a next vacation to new site, go to museums. Surprising experiences may wait for you. What a wonderful trip!</CO>
column23: The first body paragraph took a little bit to understand but ultimately it makes sense. In the second body paragraph, the supporting idea is just an example. There should have been more information there to apply the principles universally rather than to just that example.

column1: 331&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teacher. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Most people were influenced by many different people a lot, such as parents, teachers, friends, and so on, when they were young and still now. For instance, my parents taught me many things like acting and avoiding something. <TS>In fact, every single person can be a teacher but I think the best teacher not only has good teaching skills but also can treat children or students well.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> teachers in the school can be the best teacher because they have a lot of good knowledge that their students can make themselves much better than before so effectively.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example,</TR> when I was in elementary school, my teacher not only loved her students so much, but she taught my friends and me so well. Moreover, she had much information like math, English, politics, and so which could help me develop myself so well.</EX> Therefore I, still now, respect her so much because she is one of the best teachers I¡¯ve ever met.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second of all,</TR> parents can also be the best teacher when their children are juvenile.</MI2> <SI2>No child can decide what they want to do, and neither can judge something good or bad. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when I was young, I was told by my mother that I was not supposed to follow some people whom I had never met before because it was too dangerous to follow such people. In addition, she helped me solve my assignment, so I could absolutely understand what I learned in my class because I, at that time, was too young to understand everything.</EX></SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Lately,</TR> there is some limit for parents to teach their children.</MI3> <SI3>If I enter high school or university, my parents may not be able to teach me anymore because I study totally different things from what they studied before. In addition, the world education system moves too fast to learn everything. Nevertheless, it does not mean that my parents are not the best teacher because they always try to support me even if they have some problem. Also, they always focus on my life. <EX><TR>To illustrate,</TR> they worry about my studying, my health and so on. Actually, I am, nowadays, applying to IU for a bachelor degree. However, the tuition is much more expensive than that of Korean universities. Nevertheless, my parents never told me about this problem because they don¡¯t want me to worry about it but they want me to study as hard as I can.</EX> /SI3></BO3><BO4><MI4><TR>Lately,</TR> parents can sometimes read my mind though I don¡¯t even describe my situation.</MI4> <SI4>Because my parents and I have been together for more than 22 years, they can imagine my thought. Nobody else can do that because they are not my own family. As a result, they can give really good advice whenever I face some problem.</SI4></BO4><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> not only are my parents the best teacher but also they are my good assistants. They want me to gain as much knowledge as I can and they support me all the time. Furthermore, they don¡¯t want think of themselves but only of me. As a result, I feel that they are the best teachers in my life and I will respect them forever.</CO>
column23: The question was whether you disagree or not with the statement, and that wasn't really clarified until the second half of the essay. The intro, thesis, and the first body paragraph had little to do with that topic. "Lately" is not really a transition, at least not in the context that it was used. The last body paragraph really needed much more information.

column1: 332&Imagine that you are preparing for a trip. You plan to be away from your home for a year. In addition to clothing and personal care items, you can take one additional thing. What would you take and why? Use specific reasons and details to support your choice.
column3: <IN>Traveling is the good opportunity to be able to experience the different people, food, culture, and nature. Also the period of a year is never short time and it is rather sufficiently long period for me to know other nation and culture in detail. <TS>To make my travel for a year efficient and valuable, I want to take a traveler¡¯s guidebook in my native language, which is attached a map.</TS> I will describe the reasons and examples to explain why I take it.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> the guidebook lists up the good places, which are recommended to visit by native people and has a sufficient explanation in my native language about that places.</MI1> <SI1>This list makes the traveler¡¯s schedule efficient without killing time. <EX>When I traveled in Guam last summer for a week, I could make an efficient sightseeing due to the guidebook. If I had not that book, I had probably worried about the sightseeing schedule everyday.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> that guidebook is attached a map in my native language.</MI2> <SI2>Even if I decide to visit a sight spot today, I can never reach that place without a kind of indication just like a map. In this case, the guidebook is very useful and I can visit sights without problems. </SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> traveler¡¯s guidebook describes briefly the special culture of that nation (e.g. the common sense, greeting, and the unique etiquette and so on).</MI3> <SI3>This may be trivial but unless I follow the culture in that nation, I commit a breach of etiquette and many peoples including me will be very much displeased. Consequently, my travel will be a mess probably.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> if I have a trip for a year, I would like to take a traveler¡¯s guidebook in my native language in addition to clothing and personal care items. It must be able to make the travel more interesting and effective. Also, it can help me to experience and follow faultlessly the different culture with ours.</CO>
column23: The second and third body paragraph would have greatly benefitted from examples, just as was used in the first body paragraph.

column1: 333&Imagine that you are preparing for a trip. You plan to be away from your home for a year. In addition to clothing and personal care items, you can take one additional thing. What would you take and why? Use specific reasons and details to support your choice.
column3: <IN>Traveling gives me the good opportunity to be able to experience many new culture, people, food, and nature. Also the period of a year is sufficiently long time, it needs to save the memories on the spot not to forget exciting experiences in other country. <TS><TR>Therefore</TR> I want to take my notebook computer to take a picture by pc-camera, to write my travel sketches everyday, and send e-mail attached many interesting pictures to my family and friends.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> A pc-camera in my notebook computer is just a kind of the digital camera.</MI1> <SI1>It can take many pictures with higher resolution than the general film camera and the total number of picture taken is regarded as infinite, because the pictures are saved in hard diskette in notebook computer on the spot. Therefore I can take exciting images in the other country as many as I like during my travel.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> I can write a travel scratches everyday using MS-word program installed in my notebook computer before I forget the specific items of many interesting events.</MI2> <SI2>According to a proverb, the forgetting is one of the main characteristics of man. Therefore it needs specifically to record the events and cultures experienced.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> I can send my friends, family, and co-workers e-mail to notify my conditions using my notebook computer.</MI3> <SI3>Of course, I can send them my daily travel scratches and pictures promptly and they must be able to experience indirectly everything that I already had done. Even if I am far away from them, I can feel just like that I am close with them.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> if I have a travel away from my home for a year, I would like to take a notebook computer, which I take a picture by a pc-camera, write travel sketches everyday, and send my family and friends e-mail frequently. I think that the notebook computer can help me live a vibrant and active life in other country without homesickness.</CO>
column23: This was a fine essay. The support ideas were a little short, but then the topic didn't lend itself to a lot of depth anyways.

column1: 334&In some countries, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. Do you think this is a good idea? Support your opinion by using specific reasons and details.
column3: <IN>In some countries, teenagers take part time jobs while they are still students. About this fact, some people say that students would do various experiments and it is good for them. <TS><TR>However,</TR> in my opinion, it isn't reasonable that teenagers have jobs during schooling since they must do other many tasks such as studying, playing and making relationship and job settings aren't safe.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> I think that teenagers should spend time on their learning and other performances.</MI1> <SI1>While they take studying, they learn what need their whole life. They are mental abilities, friendship and reverence. If they have jobs while they are still students, they would have time earn money. It makes them more cold people. <TR>Moreover,</TR> before they become adults, teenagers would know their world. It isn't good to teenagers. Therefore, teenagers shouldn't have jobs.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> if teenagers have some kinds of vocations, nobody is sure that they are safe.</MI2> <SI2>Job's environments may be harm to teenagers. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> one of my friends had jobs at high school. While he delivered Korean food, he is burn because of a fire accident. He must take medical treatment for long time. <TR>Furthermore</TR> he couldn't take exam for entering a university.</EX> Accordingly, having jobs while teenagers are students is dangerous.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> I think that teenagers have jobs at student's period isn't good because they have other many performance and job settings aren't safe. I want that teenagers do various experiments before they become adults and feel many values without money.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic errors, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 335&Some people say that physical exercise should be a required part of every school day. Other people believe that students should spend the whole school day on academic studies. Which opinion do you agree with? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>There are various opinions which education should be need for student in the whole school day. Some people think that students should learn physical exercise to cultivate their health others people argue that students should study the academic field. <TS><TR>In my opinion,</TR> I agree with that the physical exercise should be need for student because keep their healthy and a spirit of cooperation.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Fist,</TR> During school age, the physical exercise is one of the most important educations because their body is completed in this age and heath is basis for studing.</MI1> <SI1><TR>For instance,</TR> if student focuse on the academic studies and do not take care their heath, the student take a long time for studing due to lack of health. Also, small body would loss the capabilith of competition when they become a adult as social member.</EX> In this manner, I agree with that the physical exercise should be required part of every school day.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> student could learn a spirit of cooperation though physical exercise.</MI2> <EX><TR>For example,</TR> students should cooperate to achieve thier victory in the sccocer game. If a student play in personal manner which did not consider other players, as a result, the cooperation would be collasped. Addtionally, if all students would try to get a goal for your reputatioin, there are no students for defense to protect from player opposited team. Finally, the team would never get a victory in sccocer game.</EX> In this manner they would learn a spirit and method of cooperation for the sccocer.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conculsion,</TR> if I have a chance to choose one method of education, I do not hasitate to select physical exercise for cultivating student's health and enhancing a spirit of cooperation. The healthy student would become a good social member with considering other wokers.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and spelling problems, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 336& Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Teachers should be paid according to how much their students learn. Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>There are some arguements whether teachers should be evaluated or not by students. Some people say that teacher should be paid accoding to a number of student admitted by top university other people argue that the method of teaching should be protected by the opinion of parents. <TS>In my opinion, I am opposed to be paid according to how much their students learn because the method of teaching is very difficult to evaluate with the student's marks and it cause misleading in teaching method.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> I am opposed to the plan about the evaluation of teacher because it is not easy to evaluate how much their students learn.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example,</TR> if a student give up his final exam to help a person in difficult situation, the school administation should give him a fail degree. However, as a result of his failure, the tearcher should not be blamed because the student is well educated considering with other people.</EX> Also any standard criterion for evaluation has not beeb built until now due to difficulty. Therefore, in my opinion, I could not agree that the teaching method is evaluated by student and parents.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> I am opposed to evaluate the teacher by the grade of students.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For instance,</TR> if teacher only try to increase the number of student enrolled by top university, they should focuse on the text book. However, learning text book is not whole thing of education. That is, the education should include cultivating student's emotion, enhancing their health, etc.</EX> In this manner, the evaluating teacher with student's marks could mislead the direction of education.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> if teachers are paid according to a number of permitted students by university, the good teacher might be disappeared because the wrong method for evaluation. Also they do not lead their student in right way of education</CO>
column23: Some grammar issues made it difficult to understand sometimes, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 337&The government has announced that it plans to build a new university. Some people think that your community would be a good place to locate the university. Compare the advantages and disadvantages of establishing a new university in your community. Use specific details in your discussion.
column3: <IN>Some people said that building a new university is good for one¡¯s community. Building a new university will give advantages like higher education and many kinds of accommodations, but disadvantages like noises and traffic jam. <TS>However, I think that building a new university is good for the village.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> village can receive some advantages.</MI1> <SI1>Because of a new university, many people or student will come to village. If many people come to village, economy of the village will thrive. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> student will search a house where they can live, so the price of house will increase.</EX> The other merit is education. The students who live in the village do not have to go far away for their education. Therefore, student can go university without split with their family.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> situating a new university will give disadvantages.</MI2> <SI2>If many people come to the village, the roads will crammed with transportations. Because of these traffics, people who live in this village will be damaged by traffic jam and dirty air.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In shortly,</TR> situating a new university give some merits like education and accommodations, but some disadvantages like traffic jam and dirty air. In my opinion, building a new university is good for the village because those advantages can be recovered by people¡¯s effort like making more roads or using public transpotation.</CO>
column23: The second supporting idea really needed some data or examples to illustrate the effect beyond just opinionated predictions of what might happen.

column1: 338&When people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in person. Which way do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>People might have done poor service or a product. In this case, they would complain about them through several ways such as writing or speaking in person. Among them, I prefer to represent my opinion in writing because it make me more well complain my idea and do carefully.</TS> Through the use of a couple of examples and specific explanation, I will demonstrate why I think above them.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> I think complaining in writing makes it possible for me to represent fully.</MI1> <SI1>I can tell my discomfort or dissatisfaction by writing. If I complain in person, I feel anger and will not fully complain my thought. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> my mother had to repair electric hairdryer. She took discomfort for malfunction of service center. She complained in person. However, she was so anger that she didn't complain.</EX> In this manner, complaining in writing is more appropriate.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> representing consumer's opinion in writing prevents them from mistaking.</MI2> <SI2>Talking may be misunderstood. <EX>When I went to high school, I could buy personal computer that I wanted. In some day, it didn't work and I need to fix it. I visited service center. However, they would misunderstand and didn't visit my house. I should send e-mail and my computer could be repaired.</EX> Accordingly, writing complaining can do not mistake.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> I think to complain in writing is more effective way since it gives us methods that well represent my idea and prevent from misunderstanding. I will use writing when I need to complain and believe that it makes more prosperous life.</CO>
column23: The essay was complete and fulfilled all the requests, but the grammar issues made it difficult to understand with some sentences just not making sense at all. Had I not known the context, I would not have been able to tell what they mean.

column1: 339&The government has announced that it plans to build a new university. Some people think that your community would be a good place to locate the university. Compare the advantages and disadvantages of establishing a new university in your community. Use specific details in your discussion.
column3: <IN>Somepeople say that building a new university give the advantages. However others think that it makes the disadvantages.<TS>I believe, to build a new university in my community provides the advantages much more than the disadvantages.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> this is good for community economy.</MI1> <SI1>Many students would need a lots of things, if a new school built there, such as foods, house, and so on. The students are going to big costumer to community stores. <EX>In America, there are appropriate example which is developed with university and villiage like Harverd. The community is supported by students, besides get a good image because of the university.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR>the school infuences good mood to the community.</MI2> <SI2>In the university always over fills such a energetic students for knowledge and life. They ofen try to experient study for more advanced life. This young and powerful engery will bear to the villiage. Forthermore, if resides had a youth who is going to enter the university or college, he or she could get indirect experience beside his or her house.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> it can be safely say that a new university near my community provides advantages, like economical and possitive enviorment way.</CO>
column23: The support ideas needed to be developed better. Right now the arguments are oversimplified without full and logical lines from theory to conclusion.

column1: 340&What is the most intersting class you have ever taken?
column3: <IN><TS>The most interesting class I have ever taken was "Introduction to linguistics". The reasons why I so enjoyed the class are that the course was fun, related to my major, and the teaching style of the professor.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>The class was so fun.</MI1> <SI1>The textbook has really interesting subjects in every chapter and handouts which we were supposed to read as assignments were full of exciting stories. <TR>Furthermore,</TR> the professors lead us to passionate discussions based on the textbooks and handouts. It was the most amazing experience that I look forward to going to the class.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Not only was the class fun, but also the class was really informative.</MI2> <SI2>The class let me know how babies learn their native language, what are the universal systems in all the language and in which process a language develope or disappear. Languages are the most important means of life for all of us and we are eager to learn more languages. As a student who were majoring in Teaching English as a Secold Language and a second language learner, the class gave me great background information for my major as well as fulfill my naturall intellectual curiosity.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> I liked the teaching style of the professor so much.</MI3> <SI3>He exlained every terms and phenomena so clearly using clear definitions and good examples that I, a foreign student, understand what he is trying to say. And he proveided us with appropriate readings and quiz after finishing every chapter.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In summary,</TR> I really enjoyed the "Introduction to Linguistics class because the class was interesting, gave me a lot of information and I liked the teachong style.</CO>
column23: The very first body paragraph was not very good. There wasn't much structure to it.

column1: 341&When famous people such as actors, athletes and rock stars give their opinions, many people listen. Do you think we should pay attention to these opinions? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Famous people have strong impact on our lives. Therefore, many people have interested in their options. <TS>Although they have powerful effect on people, I don't view that we should pay attention to these options. In my opinion, they are just professional to their field and their talks are generally related to commerce.</TS> Through the use of two specific examples, I will demonstrate my viewing points.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> famous peoples doesn't good at other fields that they didn't take part in.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example,</TR> famous Korean actors usually attended many quiz programs. Generally, I always get a good score than they do since they are poor at ordinary knowledge of our lives.</EX> In this manner, we don't need to listen their options.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> The suggestions of famous peoples are related with money.</MI2> <SI2>Famous actors, athletes and rockers are supported by many companies. It is common that they always concern about how make large money. Strictly speaking, about 90% of the opinions of famous peoples are to advertising some products. <TR>Consequently,</TR> There is no use of following the idea of famous peoples in the field that they didn't attend in.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary,</TR> I have an option that we shouldn't pay attention to these thoughts of famous people. There are two reason; They haven't sufficient knowledge of other fields. Moreover, their main concern is money. The famous people just famous and good at their field not all fields.</CO>
column23: The support ideas were primarily dependent on examples. More information that analyzes the examples would have helped. Otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 342&When famous people such as actors, athletes and rock stars give their opinions, many people listen. Do you think we should pay attention to these opinions? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>As mass media develope, nowadays, peple often watch famous people, so called stars, in a television and hear their speech and opnions. Some say that their opinions are just for earning money and are useless because most of them are not true. <TS>But I think that their opinions are useful because they get a success and sometimes are very unique.</TS> Through a use of a couple of explanations and specific examples, I will explain why we should pay attention to these opinions.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> many of famous people are a successful ones in their life.</MI1> <SI1>A number of difficulties in process of success were most likely to impede them and they must overcome those difficulties. If they talk abot their life, many valuable words would be included in their speech. <EX><TR>For instances,</TR> Chan-ho Park, who is the first Korean majorleaguer in a pitcher position, talked about his adversity and its overcoming in one talkshow program. He said he could get a success through fails. Many people were encouraged by that word.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Next.</TR> some stars have unique life style and thought in their life.</MI2> <SI2>Their behavior or opinions is so distinctive, so those distinctions give us fun, attention and sometimes inspiration. <EX>In early 1990's, I liked Kurt Cobain, who was a member of an alternative rock band 'NIRVANA'. had a unique thought about his music and life. He denied commercial music style, but he could get a love of the young in the world because his thought and opinions was very free and special. Although he was died, I cannot forget his valuable words yet.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In sum up,</TR> as above mentioned, opinions of famous people are able to affect us positively. Although some stars give us useless opinions for getting popularity, I strongly believe that opinions of a lot of famous stars are very valuable in our life and people should listen carefully to their opinions. If fortunate, we can have a maxim in our lives.</CO>
column23: Grammar and semantic issues made it difficult to read at times, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 343&Some people believe that the best way of learning about life is by listening to the advice of family and friends. Other people believe that the best way of learning about life is through personal experience. Compare the advantages of these two different ways of learning about life. Which do you think is preferable? Use specific examples to support your preference.
column3: <IN>Learning is an important part of most people's lives. Some people may think that listening to the advices of their family and wise friends is best way of learning about life. Others like to learn through personal experience rather than listening. <TS>Depending on a person's needs, both preference have advantages.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>On the one hand,</TR> with the advice, a person can avoid the predictable risk.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example,</TR> if a child listen to his parents carefully, he can know that the snakes are very dangerous without being hurt. In addition, when a student listens to the advice of his teacher in order to find the solution of the problem, he can save time without the trial and error.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> learning from individual experience has several advantages.</MI2> <SI2>real experiences make us obtain and memorize our knowhow well. In fact, It is very difficult that we obtain the professional knowhow by listening to family and friends. Especially, In the fields such as science and high technology, we can't make advanced research results without practical activities.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary,</TR> I think that both ways of learning stated above are indispensible in our life. In my opinion, learning by listening to family and closed friends is more important In one's childhood. He can save time and avoid the risk by learning from his seniors and wise friends when faced with the problem of unknown world. But, when he becomes a adult and he know already essential information for living a life, I believe, he should make his own experiences and get a his own knowhow. Making a his original experience in all his life may lead him to advanced informations. If a person is a scientist or researcher, he can also earn much money with loyalty for his patents in advanced technology.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas were lacking. The first should have had more analysis of the example to make the message more universal, and the second one could have used examples or data.

column1: 344&Some people believe that the best way of learning about life is by listening to the advice of family and friends. Other people believe that the best way of learning about life is through personal experience. (Compare advantages, preference)
column3: <IN>Some people believe that the best way of learning about life is by listening to the advice of family and friends, while other people believe that the best way of learning about life is through personal experience. <TS>I am sure that some people can learn about life easily and indirectly by advice from others, and some can learn about life impressively and directly through their own experience. Both of all have advantages, but I prefer the way of learning about life through personal experience.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Usually, when people encounter some problems, they listen to the advice of their families or friends.</MI1> <SI1>It is indirect and easy way to learning life. <EX><TR>In my case,</TR> because I admire my mother and trust her, I listen to her opinion when I have to decide something. When I chose my university and my company, I followed my mother¡¯s opinion. This way is very safe and easy.</EX> <TR>However,</TR> I regret that I counted on others too much to think about my future seriously.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> if some people use their real experience when they decide to choose important things, the percentage of failure will be lower.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> my best friend lived in America for one year when she was high school. Her experience made her know the importance of learning a foreign language. After came back to Korea, she studied English hard, and she got excellent score in English.</EX> <TR>Therefore,</TR> I strongly suggest that people should learn their life by getting their direct experience. </SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> people can get some important things of their life by others advices or through personal experience, but I assert that the best way of learning about life is through their own experience.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic errors, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 345&Some people believe that the Earth is being harmed (damaged) by human activity. Others feel that human activity makes the Earth a better place to live. What is your opinion? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Some people think that after the Industrial Revolution, the increased human activity has significantly damaged the earth. Others argue that human activity has made the earth a better place. Undoubtedtly, both of their opinions may be right in some kind of view. <TS><TR>However,</TR> through showing some examples, I will demonstrate that human activity is damaging the Earth.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> many polutions are generated and harming the Earth.</MI1> <SI1>After the Industrial Revolution, the using amount of fossil fuel such as coal and oil was increased compared with the age before the Industrial Revolution. As a result, this induced the increase of emission of the poluting materials, which damage the Earth.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> as the human activity has been increased, the need of natural matrials has also been increased, and this made the Earth destroied.</MI2> <SI2>After the Revolution, many industries need more natural materials such as wood. Therefore, they should destroy the woods, and this resulted into the decrease of the habites of wild animals. In addition, this made the weather changed. As a result, the Earth was harmed.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> only for a century, the Earth has been changed so dramatically by the activity of the human beings. This change may be advantageous or disadvantageous to the Earth. Besides of some advantages, human activity induced many disadvantages to the Earth such as destruction and contamination of it. Finally, this made the Earth worse place to live. I think that we should pay more attention to the nature of the Earth to make it a better place to live.</CO>
column23: Support ideas were a little underdeveloped but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 346& Some people prefer to work for a large company. Others prefer to work for a small company. Which would you prefer? Use specific reasons and details to support your choice.
column3: <IN>A Large company and a small company have their own characteristics. And it is sometimes estimated along to kind of the company. <TS>In my case, working at architectural design office in Seoul, I prefer to practice at a small company.</TS></IN><BO1>I have worked at HDEC(Hyundai Engineering & Construction) after my graduation of university, and it was one of the largest company in Seoul;8000 employee, tens of department, hundreds of construction sites. So, I could experience many of projects, and it was helpful to my career because everybody who I met knew my company, and with the name-value of the HDEC, they estimated me as a elite in our society. <MI1>But after 2 years being employed by the big-business, I came to find myself not improving the inner abillity as a professionalist, but just spending the time for one month salery. It was not what I wanted at my entering point to the society.</MI1></BO1><BO2>And I transfered to the Korean branch of IAI, my current work place. Three of the members-including me- started the company making;searching for office building, co-workers, clients, and purchasing infras for design works. <MI2>It was not in comfort with the preparation comparing with the life at HDEC, but I could really work harder continuously and deciplined myself all day long.</MI2></BO2><BO3>Now, the members increased to seven, and every staff became to work easier but to experience greater quality of the design than the results at the pre work place. <MI3>I think the decision for transferation was so good for me.</MI3></BO3><CO>With these reasons, I prefer to work in small company, and I will make more of great examples for insisting the idea, with my company</CO>
column23: This wasn't really an I/B/C essay that described the benefits of small companies so much as just a story of how you came to work at a small company. There was mentioned some reasons that a small company is preferable, but no real evidence showing that a small company is actually better at those things.

column1: 347&A university plans to develop a new research center in your country. Some people want a center for business research. Other people want a center for research in agriculture (farming). Which of these two kinds of research centers do you recommend for your country? Use specific reasons in your recommendation.
column3: <IN>It is debatable whether a center for agriculture should be built or a center for business should be built. Some people argue that a center for business is more necessary because the business is the 21st prospect job. <TS>I partly believe that building a center for business research may be a good idea. However, I would recommend that a center for research should be built for my country, because it can makes environment cleaner, and it also can help people more healthy.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Above all,</TR> a center for research in agriculture can makes environment cleaner.</MI1> <SI1>Today¡¯s methods of agriculture are somewhat harmful to the earth. They are now polluting land with a lot of pesticide and other noxious chemicals. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> It is reported that some parts around Amazon river in south America are deforested and incinerated by the farmers who want the land where they can cultivate. So, the soil pollution in that place became serious. It is not only the case of them but also the case of us.</EX> If a center for research in agriculture is built, the environmental problem would be lessened to convert the old harmful method into the new environmental-friendly one.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>More over,</TR> a center for research in agriculture can help people more healthy.</MI2> <SI2>Recently, more and more people are interested in their health and eventually in their diet which is closely related to the health. <EX><TR>To be specific,</TR> now many food companies are marketing their product by high-quality products. They try to research into agriculture so that people may buy their products, because their products are good for their health.</EX> What can be learned from this fact indicates that food is related to the people¡¯s health and research for agriculture can help people more healthy.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Consequently,</TR> the advantage in a center for research in agriculture far outweighs those of a center for business research. A center for research in agriculture can makes environment cleaner, and it also can help people more healthy. Thus, I would recommend for our country to build a center for research in agriculture.</CO>
column23: Some grammar issues but otherwise this was a very good essay.

column1: 348&do you agree or disagree with the following statement? teachers should make learning enjoyable and fun for their students. Use reasons and specific examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN><TS>I do strongly support the idea that teachers should make learning enjoyable and fun for the students.</TS> This I support with the following reasons.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR> let us take the psychological component of a student. A child or student will be more receptive, to anything including studies, if the subject matter is presented in an interesting and enjoyable manner.</MI1> <SI1>If not there is every likelihood that the student will be unwilling or will reject the mater presented as he considers studying is a burden on him.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>My second point is</TR> that the present say student faces tremendous amount of distractions such as interesing television programs, drugs, distraction from opposite sexes and many more.</MI2> <SI2>To get the students away from all these and to get him interested in studies there is obviously no other way than to make learning interesting.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>The present day students are also pressured with tremendous amount of competition from other students.</MI3> <SI3>With this mounting pressure on them coupledwith the high expectation of the parents it will lighten the burden on the young students with a more acceptable form of presentation that is in an enjoyable and fum manner.</SI3></BO3><BO4><MI4>It can also be said that the present day communication system is so advanced and there are ample teaching aids and techniques to make teaching fun and enjoyable.</MI4> <SI4>so why not utilize the opportunities to the full so that the student at the receiving end can benefit to the full. </SI4></BO4><BO5><MI5><TR>Last but not least</TR> I wish to say that by making teaching fun and enjoyable the life expectancy of both the students and the teacher can be extended.</MI5></BO5>
column23: There was no conclusion. The supporting ideas were very weak. There really needed to be more explanations, rather than just a sentence or two stating the main idea. Examples or research would have greatly helped.

column1: 349&It is better for children to grow up in the countryside than in a big city. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to develop your essay.
column3: <IN><TS>I generally disagree with the view that it is better for children to grow up in the countryside than in a big city.</TS> The main point of this issue is lots of advantages in city life for children.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> education is the most important thing for a child. In cities, they have better educational enviorenments than countryside.</MI1> <SI1>Children and their parents can have wide range of choice among various kinds of schools and private educational institutions.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Cultural advantages in city are also important thing to children. Children who live in cities are easier to take a chance to experience cultural events and performances than children in countryside.</MI2> <SI2>That will help a child to be a fully-developed person with regard to personality and sociality.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> children can meet new and high tide of techical change.</MI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> it is better for children to grow up in a big city than in the countryside.</CO>
column23: The support ideas really needed to be developed further. They really were short and didn't have much information beyond a simple commentary about it. Examples or data would have helped as well.

column1: 350& People attend University and College for what reason?
column3: <IN>Most high school graduate students in my country, Korea, attend university and college. Most parents make their kids attend academy when their kids are only 5 years old, because they start competing with other students when they enter elementary school to get into college and university. <TS>Why are Korean students so eager to get into university and college? I will explain the obvious reasons why they are eager to get into university and have to compete with each other from competition like fierce battle.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Korean society tends to predetermine the future of individuals by it¡¯s academic background.</MI1> <SI1>That means one¡¯s ability doesn¡¯t really matter getting a good job but one¡¯s college or university¡¯s diploma does. Even if one get into place of work with out graduating from college and university, it¡¯s hard to get a promotion. Additionally the high school graduate would get lower salary than undergraduate students. Therefore many kids have to start going academy even before start learning mother tongue language. They would have to survive in keen competition to enter college and university.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR> reason why people go to college is to major in whatever they are talented or interested in.</MI2> <SI2>You have to study 13~15 subjects in general highs school. So you don¡¯t have time to study what you are mostly interested or talented in. One would be just busy studying 13~15 subjects that one has no interest in it to survive in fierce competition to enter university and college. So many students are willing to go college and university to study whatever they wanted to before or learn more about it from professor.</SI2></BO2><CO>I have explained about why people in Korea are so eager to go college or university. Probably there would be more various reasons people go college and university, but the two reasons I explained are most typical reasons.</CO>
column23: The thesis was ok. It set up the essay fine, but it also left things a little ambiguous. The supporting ideas would have benefitted from examples or data.

column1: 351&Some students prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>The present students have tremendous amount of subjects to study. Therefore, they should study more efficiently to get a good result. <TS>To take good grade, I prefer to study with a group of students.</TS> There are two reasons to support my viewing points. The one is that group studying keeps your mind to study hard. The other is that student can teach each other.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> these days, students are under the stress of studying that they have to. For that reason, they sometimes lose their paces of studying.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>In my case,</TR> although I want to play with a friend of mine, group studying make me attend the study meeting regularly.</EX> On the behalf of this manner, I always keep top grade of my class.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> when you joined the studying group, you can easily get a lot of information.</MI2> <SI2>Nowadays information is regard as the most important property. You are able to take the information of test. Moreover, each student can teach and learn each other. When you teach other student, you can summary your idea of the subjects.</SI2></BO2><CO>As mentioned above, I strongly support that studying with a group of students have merits because that help maintaining their studying pace and support each other. Group studying is not only improving your knowledge but also teaching cooperation.</CO>
column23: The first main idea was ambiguous. It was not entirely clear what it's trying to say. Both support ideas needed further elaboration.

column1: 352&Is the ability to read and write more important today than in the past? Why or why not? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>It is an important ability to read and write something. Some people say that it is more crucial ability in these days than in the past; others say that it is more important in the past rather than at resent. <TS>I believe that it is more important today than in the past because of advanced education and communication method of nowadays.</TS></IN><BO><MI1><TR>The first reason is</TR> that the educational level of nowadays is superior to that in the past.</MI1> <SI1>So many people can learn more sophisticated knowledge as well as a simple skill to read and write. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> one person cannot read or write, he or she will not be survived.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>The important reason, however, is that in these days many people converse with others by indirect ways.</MI2> <SI2>They talk to others by the mass media such as a computer. If one who cannot read receives an important e-mail from his friend, he cannot only read the mail but also write a reply letter.</SI2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> the skills of reading and writing are more important ability at present than in the past because our educational stage is higher than that in the past and communication style of today is different from in the past.</CO>
column23: The support ideas needed to be further developed. They established conclusions without explanations. For example, in the first body paragraph's example, it says that if one cannot read or write, they cannot survive. There should have been more explanation how and why that is.

column1: 353&People remember special gifts or presents that they have received. Why? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>What makes people remember something they have received from others before? <TS>In my case, I remember two things that I have received for my presents, and sometimes, these make me smile with the remembrance about the past. Through showing my examples, I will demonstrate why people remember special gifts that they received before.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> I think this is because gifts are linked with their own good old memories.</MI1> <SI1><EX>As I mentioned above, I remember two gifts, and one of these is the fluorescence pants. I have received it on my birthday party from my friends. They asked me to wear it right there. Therefore, I wore it, and they turned off the light. We all laughed for the word," I love you", on the pants. Sometimes, I remember the fluorescence pants, and I think this is because the pants is connected with my remembrance about the time I had with my good friends.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> I think that the presents have their own meanings to the people who have received them, so they remember them.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>Here, I will show another example</TR> about the present I have recieved from my wife. She gave me a gold medal with a remark that the medal meant the love between us. The love between us is really important to me. Therefore, I always remember and recall the meaning of the medal which she gave to me.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In concluson,</TR> I think that people remember special gifts or presents because they are connected with remembrances about the past or have important meanings.</CO>
column23: There was no definitive statement made that really qualifies as a strong thesis. The supporting ideas were entirely made up of the examples. Additional sentences to explain the universal application of the ideas would have helped.

column1: 354&what is the most important in your country? Why is the animal important? Use reasons and specific details to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>I suppose there can be varied ideas about the most importanct animal in my country. <TS>As a matter of fact, I believe that a dog is the most significant in my nation.</TS> In my view, there are two reasons for this. We can learn social skills and we can use social benefits from dogs.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> We can easily see and get along with dogs.</MI1> <SI1>Dogs has been very friendly and sweet animal in my country. we can learn social skill through dogs. <EX><TR>For instance,</TR> when I was young, I reared a dog. At that time I have to give a meal and take a shower for my dog. I can learn responsibility with rearing a dog. <TR>In addition to this,</TR> I did not feel lonely because I can get along with my dog all the time.</EX> Therefore, I can learn responsibility with my dog keeping.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> dogs are very useful animal and we can get social benefits from them.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</EX> we can use a dog for searching a dope. Dogs have a special and distinguished sense of smell and this can very useful for noticing a bad material like a dope. And with the help of eye dogs, blind people can get a help from dogs.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO>Generally, different people have different attitudes regarding thinking of the most important animals. In my perspective, however, dogs are the most important animal in my country. This is because maintaining of social skills and using social benefits from dogs. Therefore, it is impossible to overstate the importance of dogs.</CO>
column23: In the first body paragraph, the final sentence talks about responsibility, although the main idea is about getting along easily, so it was a little confusing. The second paragraph could have used more general information in addition to the examples.

column1: 355&Do you agree or sidagree with the following statement? parents are the best teachers. use specific reasons and examples to suport your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>I do quite advocate the opinion that parents are the best teachers.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Parents take care of their children and watch what their children do in a close distance.</MI1> <SI1>If they find that children are in a difficult situation, they encourage their children to think and act in a way that is considered right. This kind of help not only influences children's thoughts but also helps children's behaviors more than any other people.</SI1></BO1><BO2><EX><TR>Here is an example.</EX> Edison, one of the greatest inventors in the world, was the case that one of his parents was the best teacher. One day he was so curious a fact that chicken could be hatched out by human activity. It was considered ridiculous and brainless by people at that time. So his friends and teachers teased his trial when he put the egg under his bottom. But his mother was different form them. She was a type of person who is open-minded and warm-hearted. She encouraged him to try it though it seemed to be strange. On the base of this kind of mental support, at last, he could succeed in his works. Because of his mother's help now, we can use very wonderful and useful inventions.</EX></BO2><CO>As you read, parents can be the best teachers with a little concern toward their children. What if parents try to help children more than a little? It will result great consequences.</CO>
column23: Essay structure was not followed. The body paragraph was just an example, and it didn't have much to do with the first body paragraph, so it was confusing as to what was being communicated. It was not a very cohesive essay.

column1: 356&Some people say that physical exercise should be a required part of every school day. Other people believe that students should spend the whole school day on academic studies. Which opinion do you agree with? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>I agree that physical exercise should be required part of every school day.</TS> The reasons why I choose to agree are the effect of good health on study, the improvement of sociality, and the decrease of stress.let me explain the reasons and details to advocate my opinion.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> children can obtain good health by excising regularily and good health help improve the ability of studing.</MI1> <SI1><EX>when preparing for chemistry test, For example, I could do my best after physical excise.</EX> Physical excise is really keeping me the good condition. </SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> when excising with their friends, they can be more familiar with each other.</MI2> <SI2>The more they can be familiar, the more they can have the improvement. I made many friends through excising.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Third,</TR> excise can remove stress from studying children are in so much stressful situations.</MI3> <SI3>Only the excise can help get rid of the stress.<EX>in my case,I feel happiness after excising.</EX></SI3><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I absolutely agree with the opinion for above reasons. The excising should be a mandatory part of the school lives.because its beneficial aspects to children can not be ignored.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas were not very strong. There really needed to be more explanations for the things that were stated. For example, the first body paragraph didn't explain how it is that good health helps studying, the second body paragraph didn't explain what "improvement" is referred to, and the third body paragraph didn't explain why exercise was the only, or even the best, way to get rid of stress.

column1: 357&Some people believe that a college or university education should be available to all students. Others believe that higher education should be available only to good students.
column3: <IN><TS>While some people believe that a college or university education should be available only to good students, I strongly believe that all students should get opportunities of higher educations.</TS> To support my opinion, I cannot avoid mentioning that most students, even people who do not like study, have their dreams to reach in the future and students can learn something more than only knowledge through higher educations.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> I would like to say something about students¡¯ dreams. I know that most people especially students have their dreams to establish in the future.</MI1> <SI1>The best way to reach their destinations is that students get knowledge about their area, about which they concern, through higher educations. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> my younger sister wanted to be a hair designer when she was a student of high school. Although she wanted to work as an assistant at hair shop to learn techniques about it, I let her attend a college which had a course of hair designer. After graduating, my sister could get a job as a hair designer immediately.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> let¡¯s think about excellent experiences which students can get by attending colleges or universities.</MI2> <SI2>I am convinced that students learn not only knowledge about their majors, but also interpersonal skills and communication skills. All students should get opportunities to learn these skills. I was too introvert to continue a good relationship with my friends, but I changed my characteristic a lot while attending my university.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I am sure that higher education such as a college or university should be available to all students because students can establish their dreams and learn good interpersonal skiLls through higher educations.</CO>
column23: The essay was overall good, but it did not quite fully address the question. The ideas explained why education would benefit everyone, but didn't really explain why everyone should be entitled to it.

column1: 358&Some people choose friends who are different from themselves. Others choose friends who are similar to themselves. Compare the advantages of having friends who are different from you with the advantages of having friends who are similar to you. Which kind of friend do you prefer for yourself? Why?
column3: <IN>Friends usually give an important effect on our behavior. Therefore, people say that having good friends can be considered by successful life. <TS>Generally speaking, people can choose largely two kinds of friends. One is that friends have similar properties. The other is that friends have different properties. In my case, I prefer the friends who have similar characteristic.</TS> The merits are not only enjoying sports together but also understanding my thoughts.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>On one hand,</TR> If you have the friends who have similar to yourself, you can playing some sports with your friend, and the friend is willing to hear your idea.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>In my case,</TR> the closest friends of mine like playing ski very much, therefore, every winter, we always go to ski park during weekend. The other merit is that similar friend easily understands my thought, and is good at giving solution.</EX> For that reasons, I like that kind of friend.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> when I have friend having different properties, they can give me an advise that what I have to change, and show me another viewing point about the our life.</MI2> <SI2><EX>Actually, I have some friends having a part character. When I have some troubles, he can give me particular advice due to holding different viewing points. Friend who didn't go to university tells me somewhat different life style.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> although different friends have some good points as mentioned above, I have preference on choosing friend having similar aspects. In my thought, the most precise point of friend is making me comfortable when I meet them. Consequently, I want to spend my spare time with those friends on playing ski that we really like sports.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic issues but overall this was a good essay.

column1: 359&Do you agree or disagree with the following tatement? The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>Some people think that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. However, I strongly disagree with that idea.</TS> There are two reasons that convinced me to think that way.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> I can enjoy more freedom by traveling alone.</MI1> <SI1>If I travel in a group of people with a tour guide, I would have to follow the tour guide no matter what I really want to do. In the other hand, if I travel by myself, I would do what I feel like to do, go where I want to go. I can concentrate only on myself by traveling without a tour guide.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR> I can experience more about the culture of the place where I would travel.</MI2> <SI2>When we go travel a new place, our purpose is not only to enjoy the sightseeing, but also to feel the culture and people living in that region. It would not be easy if I'm led by a tour guide because the tour guide would explain to me about the superficial informations about the place and lead me to another place.</SI2></BO2><CO>Traveling alone gives you more freedom and vivid experiences. Those are what you cannot acquire if you just follow the tour guide. So I think traveling by myself is much better than traveling with a bunch of people led by a tour guide.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas could have been developed in a little more detail, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 360&In general, people are living longer now. Discuss the causes of this phenomenon. Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3: <IN><TS>Yesterday, I saw an article in the newspaper which old people over sixty five year old increased more 15 percent than that of before five year. This phenomenon is general in the modern because of developing medical system, and increasing promotion of health.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> medial system is to be remarkable developed by lots of people.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example,</TR> in the past, when we revoked the plague especially pest, most people did not know how to treat and prevent, so a lot of people died. However, an doctor invented special medicine and preventing treatment, so life of people could save since that. By the time, their treatment method was very simple, but they could not realize about it until the inventor said to announce people. Just that was people ate after boiling water and every kinds of fool. After the invention, we take a vaccine related the disease every year.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> most people's life is getting better than that in the past, so they want to keep sturdy their health during their life.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For instance,</TR> my father has usually exercised regularly every morning since he admitted a hospital because of lung Ca. When he admitted, his weight was less than me. Nevertheless, after he started exercise, his condition was more improved, his weight also increased. Right now, his weight is double more than that of me.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO>As mentioned above, in these days, developing of new medication, and improvement of people's life give many change in our life. Inventing of new medication is important to prevent our disease especially vaccine. Most people take the vaccine to prevent the special disease. Also, their need to keep strong their health receive to stimulate keeping their sound health. Therefore, I strongly assert inventing new medication and changing people's desire can be kept more their healthier.</CO>
column23: The support ideas were taken up entirely by examples. As such there was little explanation on the actual principle of the support idea, which made it a little confusing. More explanations that explain the principals that are being showcased in the examples would have helped.

column1: 361&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A person's childhood years (the time from birth to twelve years of age) are the most important years of a person's life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer
column3: <IN>People learned many things for childhood years. Due to the reason, some people insist that the childhood years be the most important years of a person's life, while other people support that adults years is more important than any the other. <TS><TR>In my case.</TR> I support the opinion that childhood years are the most important years of a person's life because the personality is decided and the basic intelligence is formed during the seasons.</TS> </IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> during childhood years, we compose our personality.</MI1> <SI1>in normal, when people grew up in good condition for childhood, we can see that they live well with good personality. <EX>when I see people around me, I could feel that the childhood years is important. Between my two cousins, one cousin has raised in good circumstance under kind and lovely parents, while the other has raised in worse condition such as their parents are divorced when he was six years old. when they was 16 years old, I could perceive the difference of their personality.</EX> Therefore, childhood years is the most important because most of personality was formed.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> as we can learn the basic knowledge for the season, the childhood years is the important.</MI2> <SI2>We acquire the method and understanding ability such as reading , writing and calculating. In elementary school, we learn the above ability or before entering the school, we do from our parents. if we imagine the situation without learning basic knowledge during childhood years, actually we must not accomplish formal educational course. although trying to follow the course later, it is very hard and we may give up it. then we can not learn it eternally. because of the reason, childhood years is the most important.</SI2></BO2><CO>In brief, I support the opinion that the childhood years is the most important years of a person's life because we can learn the basic knowledge and form our personality during the seasons. Due to the importance of this term, we must make a good environment for our children to grow up well.</CO>
column23: Grammar and semantic errors made the essay difficult to understand at times, but overall this was a good essay.

column1: 362&Playing games teaches us about life. Agree or disagree?
column3: <IN><TS>Whereas many people seem to believe that playing games teaches us about life, I strongly assert that playing games gives a couple of negative effects to the people who play.</TS> To support my opinion, I cannot avoid mentioning the two negative such things as addiction and selfishness.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> let¡¯s think about something about that people who play games continuously tend to be addicted.</MI1> <SI1>I can easily find children who are addicted a computer game. <EX>When John, my neighbor, comes back home from his school, he sits down front of his computer to start on-line game. Although his mother calls him at dinner time, he does not answer her and plays a computer game on and on.</EX> Because it is very difficult to escape from addicted condition, I am sure that playing games absolutely dose not teach us anything.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> I would like to say that because most people want to win games, they seem to be selfish.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> in my country, we have a traditional game which people play with all relatives on the first day of a new year. When we play this game, we consequently used to get tense each other because all players want to win the game. In other words, they at first begin the game for joy, but they are getting be selfish while the game.</EX> Playing game sometimes extremely makes people struggle each other.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I believe that playing games gives more negative effects to people than positive things. It gives people who play addictive and selfish minds. I have seen many people who fought friends or relatives by playing games. Therefore, I really disagree that playing games teaches us about life.</CO>
column23: Grammar and semantic errors made the essay difficult to understand at times, but overall this was a good essay.

column1: 363&Some people prefer to spend time with one or two close friends. Others choose to spend time with a large number of friends. Compare the advantages of each choice. Which of these two ways of spending time do you prefer? Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>The matter which is better between spending our time alone and spending our time with friends is difficult to define clearly. The reason is that the point of view of each person toward the issue, according to his experiences, is totally different. But in my case I prefer to spend my time with my friends.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>There are many merits that we can get through spending our time with friends such as helping someone who is in problem, sharing feelings, having fun together, and so on.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>Here is an example that I experienced before. </TR>I remember last winter. I was so anxious and serious that I could not fall asleep for a couple of days. I worried about what I should do for my future. During the time of insomnia, I realized that studying abroad is the thing that I have really wanted. But a lot of troubles such as financial problem, insufficient English and lack of confidence which is the most important there are on it. Despite I faced with these kind of problems, the reason that I determined to achieve my dream was from one of my friend's encouragement containing words that I am patient enough to come true my plan. He spent a lot of time together with me and observed what I did so that he could not only give me advice but also encourage me.</EX></BO1><CO>As you read, I could be released from a great concern by friend who had been together with me for so long. What if I spent my time alone could I get the same thing? I think no way. So, I am more favorable to having a good time and making a good relationship with my friends for my entire life.</CO>
column23: The essay was supposed to compare the advantages of both, rather than describe the advantages of just one. In the thesis, it was ambiguous as to what choice was made, as "I prefer to spend time with my friends" could mean both a small group and a large group. The structure of the essay was not followed, as there was really only one idea and a large example. All of that really should have constituted just one paragraph.

column1: 364&parents are the best teachers. agree or disagree?
column3: <IN>When children confront a trouble , they first look for their parents to ask them help or advice. for this reason. some people believe that the parents are the best teachers for the children, while other people say that it is not overstated. <TS>In my case, I agree the opinion that the best teacher of childern is their parents because their parent know about them best and parent basing on full experience have an ability to grant children advice.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>first,</TR> as parent know their children, they can care for them well when they have the trouble.</MI1> <SI1>in normal, children spend much time with their parents.
