Through this time, parent could have more understanding than any other. <EX><TR>In my case,</TR> when I have something difficult, without hesitating, I rush my parents. while I talk with them, I could deal with the problem except background situation because they knew it well.</EX> as it was, parents grant their children a help with full of understanding.</SI1></BO2><MI2><TR>second,</TR> as parent have full of experience. they can give their children advice.</MI2> <SI2>while we grow up from child to adult. we may experience similar process parent did. so they predict child' problem. and try to care for their children. <EX><TR>for example, when we fall in love. first we embarrassed its state. and we do not know how to solve or develop it. however, because our parent experieced it, they can show a good route.</EX> therefore, due to this reason, parent can be the best teacher of children.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In brief,</TR> parent can give their children good advice and show right route of life. due to these reasons, I can support and emphasize the opinion that parents are the best teacher.</CO>
column23: Numerous grammar, spelling, and formatting issues made it difficult to follow sometimes, but otherwise this was a good essay, just needed to be communicated better.

column1: 365&nowadays, food has become easier to prepare. has this change improved this way people live ? use specific reasons and examples to support you answer.
column3: <IN><TS>we sometimes go to eat food in restaurant ,or when we do not have enough time, we eat in snack bar or Mcdonald. In case of eating there, we do not need to prepare the food or wash the dishes after eating. Due to this, some people believe that this change improve the way people live. However, In my opinion, I disagree the above opinion because the fast or ordered food is not good for body due to worse nutrition and we spend more time although saving time for preparing or cleaning such as time on the road while going to restaurant.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> Due to worse nutrition, this change do not help way of our life improve.</MI1> <SI1>when we see the food prepared or the process of cook in restaurant, we are uncomfortable. <EX><TR>in my case,</TR> I saw the stages of cooking the pizza. pizza is composed of the gradient of high fat. because many pizzas are prepared in a short time, the process is not clean, likewise, this change is not only good for improving our way of life.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>second,</TR> we spend much time meaninglessly on the street while going to eat in restaurant.</MI2> <SI2>if it is in the worst traffic, Although our purpose is that time is saved or we plan to enjoy food in good mood. we will spend meaningless time. and we may be angry. as we see this case, this method has also demerit.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In brief,</TR> new change is not only advantageous of development of our life. it sometimes has inconvience as well as worse nutrition.</CO>
column23: Many grammar and formatting issues made the essay difficult to follow sometimes. I think the essay might have been off-topic; I think the question dealt more with food being easier to prepare for yourself, not easier to prepare at restaurants. I graded the essay giving the benefit of the doubt that restaurants are an acceptable topic for this essay. If not, then the "topic" and "coherency" scores should be much lower.

column1: 366&Some students prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Everyone may have the different preferences for a studying methodology. Some students prefer to study alone, others prefer to study with a group of students. <TS>I prefer fully to study with a group of students.</TS> I will state what the advantages of a group studying are in the following order: Firstly, I may experience the different viewpoints from mine. ; Secondly, I may solve the difficult problems through other person¡¯s assistance. ; Finally, I may be encouraging by other students when I am in a slump.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> I may experience the different viewpoints from mine when I study with a group of students.</MI1> <SI1>That is, when I can view only one side about the importance of an event, other students can make open my eyes to be able to view other sides.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> I may solve the difficult problems through other person¡¯s assistance.</MI2> <SI2><EX>Mathematics is my weakest subject and science is the strongest. Therefore, I can support other students who are poor in science and other students who are good in Mathematics can help me solve the difficult equation.</EX></SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> I may be encouraging by other students when I am in a slump.</MI3> <SI3><EX>When I fail the examination and drop in a slump, other students in a studying group can cheer for me to try the test again.</EX></SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> the advantages of a group studying are (1) the experience of the different viewpoints from mine, (2) the solving the problems beyond me, (3) cheering for each other when students drop in a slump. Futhermore, a group studying can make not only know a lot of knowledge, but also awaken students how to live with many people altogether.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas really needed to be developed further. There was very little explanation on the ideas, and could have used further elaboration and examples. The ones with examples could have used more explanations to make the ideas applicable to more than just the examples.

column1: 367&What do you consider to be the most important room in a house? Why is this room more important to you than any other room? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>There are many capacities in a house and the members of my family may have different considerations about the important room for them. <TS>I think that the kitchen is the most important in my house.</TS> I will state the importance of the kitchen in the following order: Firstly, there are many delicious foods. ; Secondly, all the member of my family visits in that capacity at least one time a day. ; Finally, It is a very convenient room for talking about a daily event with one another.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> there are many delicious foods in a refrigerator.</MI1> <SI1>The eating is the important action for a person and the food, which is whether delicious or not is saved in a refrigerator in the kitchen. Therefore I think that the kitchen has the equivalent and important value to the action of eating for a person.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Next,</TR> all the member of my family visits in that capacity at least one time a day.</MI2> <SI2>Nowadays, the members of my family are very busy and it is difficult even to meet one another. But, they must visit the kitchen at least one time a day whether to have a meal or to have an orange juice. Therefore when I want to meet my sister, who is always extremely busy, there is every probability that I can meet her if I wait for her in the kitchen.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> a kitchen is a very convenient room to talk about a daily event with one another.</MI3> <SI3>When I come back home after school, there are my mom and my grandmother in a house. What subject can I talk to them? That is not fixed and secret. It can rather be daily everything. I think that the most proper capacity to talk about those daily events is not mom¡¯s room or grandmother¡¯s room, but the kitchen.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> the reasons about why the kitchen is the most important room in my house are (1) many delicious foods in a refrigerator in a kitchen, (2) the visitation in that of all family members at least one time a day, (3) the most convenient capacity for a small talk with one another. Furthermore, the kitchen can make me a lot of memories about my family than any other room in a house because my family spends many times altogether in the kitchen than in any other room.</CO>
column23: The support ideas could have been developed better, specifically with the use of examples, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 368&In the future, students may have the choice of studying at home by using technology such as computers or television or of studying at traditional schools. Which would you prefer? Use reasons and specific details to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>In the future technology might make our life easier to live in many different ways. For instance, robots could do house chores. Even students may have a choice of studying at home by using technology or studying at traditional schools. <TS>I would prefer to study at a traditional school in that students can meet their friends and have physical education classes.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To start off,</TR> important thing for students is their sociability and their personality.</MI1> <SI1>If they use computers or televisions for their studying, they don't need to go to school. However, studentss can meet their friends in school if they study at traditional schools. According to some psychologists, human's sociablilty grows especially when they are in high school and middle school. Plus, the best way to build it is meeting friends and learing how to gain better relationships with other people. From my perspective, schools are a profitable place for students to grow their sociability. <EX><TR>To exemplify,</TR> one of my friends who is a high school dropout,has hard time to build his right sociability to have a job. He told me that he had no place to learn to build his sociability after he drop out of high school.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Not only is student's sociability important while they are growing</TR> but physical education classes that they have in school are also important.</MI2> <SI2>Most people would experience physical education classes when they are in high school. <TR>In addition,</TR> most of them feel that P.E classes is the only way to relieve their stress that they receive from their hard work, studying. It is true that the cost of sports clubs such as health clubs and tennis classes are extremely high for students who cannot earn money. Thus, I think it's good for studetns to have enough physical education classes to relieve their stress in traditional schools.</SI2></BO2><CO>Taking all this into consideration, Even though there are a lot of changes in the future, I think students' way of studying should not change. Due to the fact that, students can meet their friends to build their sociability and have physical education classes to relieve their stress that they receive while they are studying. I believe that students should study at traditional schools.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic issues but overall this was a good essay.

column1: 369&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Children should begin learning a foreign language as soon as they start school. Use specific reasons and examples to support your position.
column3: <IN>Todays, technology is developing so fast that world is shrinking. Therefore, all countries that exist in the world can be visited in a day, as a result , contact with foreigner is certainly increasing. So, learning a foreign laguage is needed more and more. <TS>In these days, many people assert that children should begin learning a foreign language as soon as they start school. I agree that opinion because studying foreign language is too hard for adult to learn perfectly, include that learning culture that language is used and may be needed to study other subjects.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> learning other language for adult is too hard to study perfectly because their brain structure is fixed for their mother language.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Therefore,</TR> their progression in other languages are not only slow but also incorrect. What is more, they may be able to read and write foreign language, however, they may not be able to listen perfectly. In contrast, if they learn foreign language more earlier, they will use other language more perfectly.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Language includes culture that are used.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example,</TR> English includes American cluture, Korean includes Korean culture and Japanese includes their culture. Therefore, when we learn foreign language, we can learn their culture as well as language.</EX> By the way, learning other cultures is good as soon as possible because it could promote culture shock if we learn ohter language when we are adult.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> learning foriegn language earlier is needed to study other subjects.</MI3> <SI3>When we are studying some subjects, which are not languages, we need foreign language sometimes. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when we study engineering mathmatics in university, we use books written by English in spite of that we are Korean.</EX> Therefore, we have to stdy foreign language more earlier than now.</SI3></BO3><CO>It has many advantages that learning a foreign language as soon as children start school. Foreign language could be more easily studied when they are young than when they are adult, could study other culture that include in language and could help studying other subjects which are not language. In these reason, I believe that learning a foreign language as soon as children start school make sense these days.</CO>
column23: There was some grammar errors, and the supporting ideas could have had a little bit more objective information, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 370&(What are qualities of good supervisor? support your idea with one specific example.)
column3: <IN>There are many qualities of a good supervisor. Some people think a responsibility is the most important quality, while the others maintain that he needs a work commitment. <TS>Above arguments are reasonable, but, in my opinion, thinking of the well-rounded relationship between a boss and employees, consideration for his employees and leadership skills are the most important qualities.</TS> </IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> a good supervisor should try to put himself in a subordinator¡¯s shoes.</MI1> <SI1>Some supervisors always blame their subordinators without consideration. It could cause a rebellion of subordinator, who is suffered from a stress of their harsh work and boss¡¯s order. <EX><TR>As an example of this,</TR> when I worked in a military office, my supervisor always ask us to work more than assigned time. Therefore, we sometimes used to miss our mill plan. We really disliked him and didn¡¯t want to follow his order because he didn¡¯t consider our hard situation.</EX> </SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> leadership skills are significant point of a good supervisor.</MI2> <SI2>While working busy, employees could sometimes feel confused what they have to do, and they might hesitate to their decision of assignments. In this case, a supervisor, who has leadership skills, should help them and need to control their atmosphere. By a supervisor¡¯s progressive act, employees could do their work well without chaos.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> for the prosperity of company, a supervisor needs to consider in the view of subordinator and have progressive skills that could make his employees lead to do their work well. With a supervisor who has the above skills, there is no one who doesn¡¯t want to work with him.</CO>
column23: The second main idea was a little ambiguous. "Leadership skills" could really mean a lot of things, and could encompass a lot of what was discussed in the rest of the essay. More elaboration on what exactly "leadership skills" means would have helped.

column1: 371&Your school has enough money to purchase either computers for students or books for the library. Which should your school choose to buy - computers or books? Use specific reasons and examples to support your recommendation.
column3: <IN>There are a lot of equipments demanded for many students to study more efficiently in the school. I think that the computer and the books among them are the most beneficial and commonly useful to most students with many kinds of skills and gifts. <TS>But if the school must select the only one item to buy, I would like to recommend fully the computer to buy.</TS> Because the society strongly demands a prospective employee to have the computer operating skill and the students can have many information through the Internet. Also the computer can support the students many kinds of contents.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> the students are the prospective employees and the computer is one of the most important tools in the social activities.</MI1> <SI1>Actually, many various tasks in the company are conducted by using the computer. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> the documents and the materials for the presentation are drawn up by MS-Office software program and most many software programmers develop the software by using the program language Visual C++ or JAVA. Therefore the students must learn in advance how to use various computer programs for the future.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> the computer can present the students the useful information beyond the books.</MI2> <SI2>Nowadays, the network service among the computers is rapidly developed and it introduces the new Internet web service. Its concept is simply described that many information in all the computers on the world are held in common among one another and can be accessed by all the people. Therefore the students may be able to contact much more information than through the books in the library. <TR>Moreover</TR> the books in the library are also published in the electronic form and many students can access them without going to the library.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally,</TR> the computer can support many kinds of entertainments besides the articles, the papers, and the e-books for studying.</MI3> <SI3>There are many services and contents to enjoy and refresh; <EX><TR>For example,</TR> the music files in the form of MP3, the movie, games, and so on. Therefore if you want to listen to music of X-Japan, you do not need to go to the musix shop to buy the album of X-Japan. You can find and listen the MP3 music files in the Internet.</EX></SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> the computer must be very useful equipment for the student¡¯s school life. It can support the students to prepare the future, to access many kinds of information and entertainments. Furthermore, The computer can save time for the students to find those contests and therefore the students can use the saved time to invest in their hobby and study.</CO>
column23: Some grammar and semantic issues but overall this was a good essay.

column1: 372&When people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in person. Which way do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>These days, service marketing is a very significant point of profits. Many businesses are trying to do their best on service. Nevertheless, we can meet some unsatisfied products or poor service. In that case, we can express our dissatisfaction by diverse ways. <TS>Between complaining in writing and complaining in person, in my case, I prefer to complain in writing due to controlling our mind and getting more effective reaction.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> if we complain about products or poor service in writing, we can control our mind.</MI1> <SI1>When we are upset, it is very difficult to deliver our thought in person. When we offer to them, we may forget important things because our opinion is not organized exactly. However, through writing complain, we can organize our thought certainly and won't miss our point. We should control our mind and then point out some negative aspects to them.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> if we complain about products or poor service in writing, it enables us to get more efficient results.</MI2> <SI2>When we complain in writing, our complaint will deliver to customer service department. They will try to solve the problems and apologize to us. I think this is better than we make controversy with clerks or poor severs. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> some time ago, I bought hair clipper in the mall, and when I tried to use it in my house, it was not working. Then I wanted to refund that, but they declined that because I lost my receipt. I didn't want to make trouble with clerks, so I wrote a letter to customer department, and then couple days later, they send me a new one.</EX> In this manner, writing complain is more effective than having a quarrel with person.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> although complaining in person is the reasonable way in some situations, I prefer that writing complain to their charge because I can relieve my upset mind down and deliver my thought exactly. Besides I can get more convenient respond.</CO>
column23: The first body paragraph would have benefitted from an example. Otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 373&Some people believe that the earth is being harmed (damaged) by human activity. Others feel that human activity makes the Earth a better place to live. What is your opinion? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>As human beings have developed our civilization, the Earth has been changed too. Some people say the Earth is being harmed by human activity, while others believe that human activity makes the Earth a better place to live. <TS>In my case, I believe that human beings have damaged the Earth, especially due to the extinction of wild animals and environmental pollution.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> humans have made wild animals extinct and threatened.</MI1> <SI1>For the purpose of exploitation, we have destroyed the places where wild animals lived, so they had to run away from human. Also, human have killed many rare animals for food, medicines, clothes and so on. I remember some articles that I read. They stated that humans killed 10,000 crocodiles per year for women¡¯s bags. In this manner, we cannot say we have not damaged our Earth.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> the pollution that humans generate is damaging our environment.</MI2> <SI2><EX>We have built too many factories and buildings. They used to burn fossil fuels, causing the to be polluted. Also, due to some spoiled sewage of factory rivers are contaminated, and we cannot avoid acid rain.</EX> Therefore, human activities have brought about the huge contamination of our only own livable planet in the universe.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To conclude,</TR> I maintain that humans have destroyed the Earth and are still damaging the nature. Exploitations for our convenience have ruined the eco-system, contaminated the air and rivers, and are even threatening our health. We should think about these problems seriously.</CO>
column23: The first paragraph would have benefitted from specific examples or stats. Other than that this was a good essay.

column1: 374&Some people think governments should spend as much money as possible exploring outer space (for example, traveling to the Moon and to other planets). Other people disagree and think governments should spend this money for our basic needs on Earth. Which of these two opinions do you agree with? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>The population of the world increasing, and the apace on Earth is getting smaller and smaller. Thus, some people say governments should spend as much money as possible exploring outer space, while other people maintain that governments should spend money for our basic needs on Earth. <TS>Although above arguments are reasonable, I believe that we have to invest in the Earth at first, because we still have many unsolved problems and exploring outer space is too expensive to carry out.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> we should consider about our facing problems such as environmental pollutions, starving and famines in poverty area,</MI1> <SI1>If we spend our money on the environment, we can drink water and breath air without any concern. Besides, we should help some people who live in poverty with their development. We can invest our assets in the undeveloped areas for both our and their benefits. Similarly we have to give priority to the problems that are now being faced on Earth.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> the exploration of outer space has a big problem in terms of finance.</MI2> <SI2>I know that experiments for outer space have high failure rates. It means that there might be success next time, but I don¡¯t think we need to spend a lot of money for that. We still can live on Earth. Although we may move to outer space through technological development, it may be possible after I die. I don¡¯t want to spend my money for a non-transparent future.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I disagree with the idea that the government should make an effort to investigate outer space. Thinking about finances view and our present problems, we should endeavor to make our Earth better.</CO>
column23: The support ideas really needed research. For example more indepth discussion about the problems facing the planet and how money could fix it in the first body paragraph, or dollar figures for the cost of space exploration in the second body paragraph.

column1: 375&In some countries, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. Do you think that is a good idea? Support your opinion by using specific reasons and details.
column3: <IN>Students are susceptible to the temptation that they can make money while attending school. Some people say that working could be good for them to gain responsibility and learn independence. <TS>Although this argument is reasonable, thinking of the students¡¯ study and family relationship, I don¡¯t think it is a good idea for teenager to have jobs while they are still students.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else,</TR> jobs prevent students from concentrating on their studies.</MI1> <SI1>Because the period of student is the most important time in their lives, they can gain much knowledge during that time. When they grow up, they won¡¯t have any time to study because they had suffered from their hard work. Therefore they should study for their futures. <TR>In addition to this,</TR> earning money might be exciting to teenagers, so students may lose interest in studying.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover,</TR> jobs reduce the communication time with family, and if this continues, the relationship with family will become intensified.</MI2> <SI2>In other words, because students spend most of time studying at school or working else, they might be indifferent to their family. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> when I had a part-time job, I couldn¡¯t have conversation time with my parents, so I didn¡¯t know what kind of problems they had. My parents had financial problems, but I spent a lot of money everyday, because I didn¡¯t know that. Therefore, my parents always blamed me, and I avoid them. As a result, there are no problems right now, but it was a big mistake for me to work at that time. I really needed conversation with my family.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> due to the negative influences on their learning and family communication, I disagree with the idea of teenagers¡¯ having jobs. Wise students know how bad jobs are for these reasons.</CO>
column23: The first body paragraph would have benefitted from an example. Otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 376&Many people have a close relationship with their pets. These people treat their birds, cats, or other animals as members of their family. In your opinion, are such relation ships good? Why or why not? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Today, many people have pets such as dogs, birds, and cats and so on. Many people think pets are one of their family members, so they treat them as human beings. However some people don't like to treat them like this way because too much affection can bring about social relationship problems or some kinds of disease. <TS>In my case, although bringing pets have some problems, I want to get good relationship with pets because we can relieve stress and learn respect of living things.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> by treating pets closely, we can relieve stress from tedious day to day.</MI1> <SI1>Sometimes pet can be considered as a best friend or little child. Thus, when people want to talk a lot without any respond, pet can be a good partner. Also, most pets are very cute (only except snakes or iguanas). We can be pleasure and released from stress by just looking them.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> we can learn respect of living things.</MI2> <SI2>Some people think only human beings are unique life in the world. Yet, there are many things to be considered significantly as human beings .By bringing pets, some people who don¡¯t think that animals¡¯ lives are precious can be changed. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> my little brother was very merciless, when he treated some animals. He didn¡¯t even know animals could feel pain. Thus, I decided to buy him a pretty dog. My brother became known about living thing, and sometimes he told his dog like ¡° I love u¡±. I think it was great decision that I bought a dog for him because he realized values of living things except human beings.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I prefer that treating pets as family members because we can be so pleased with pets that we relieve our stress. In addition, last but not least, we can realize how animals¡¯ lives are precious in that we can respect humans¡¯ lives too.</CO>
column23: The first body paragraph would have benefitted from an example. Otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 377&You have decided to give several hours of your time each month to improve the community where you live. What is the one thing you will do improve your community? Why? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>In my community, there are many things to be improved. Some people believe we should plant trees in our park, while others say that we should take care of some silver-age people who live in our neighborhood. <TS>Although above arguments are reasonable, but if I can have a chance to improve our community by spending several hours per month, I would like to teach English for children.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Initially,</TR> if I spend my time to teach English for children, it will be very interesting and helpful to them.</MI1> <SI1>I have studying English very hard since last year, and sometimes I really felt difficult to study English by myself, because my community is in the rural districts. However some of my neighbor who are older than me and study at university helped me to study English well. Thus, I could be interested in English, and their endeavor was greatly efficient to me. In this manner, I want to give my hand to our neighbor by teaching some skills that I learned.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> by teaching English for youngster, reputation of our community will increase more than now.</MI2> <SI2>If some people who don't live in our community hear about this, they may want to attend my class. Everyone who lives in our neighborhood may be self-confident, so my small activity would blow vigor to my neighbor, and by Interaction between our community and outside neighbor, our community will be a vigorous country.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> if I can have a chance to improve our community by spending several hours, I would like to teach English for my neighbor. By teaching English, not only can I reward with my neighbor¡¯s favor, but also I can give assistance to young students. In addition, our community will be more energetic by increasing reputation.</CO>
column23: "Initially" is not a good transition unless the paragraphs are describing things in chronological order. The two body paragraphs really needed examples to illustrate their points.

column1: 378& Some people enjoy change, and they look forward to new experiences. Others like their lives to stay the same, and they do not change their usual habits. Compare these two approaches to life. Which approach do you prefer? Explain why.
column3: <IN>People are always facing new changes in life. Some people like new experiences, while others prefer their lives to stay the same, and they don't even want to change their usual habits. <TS>Although the above arguments have their own advantages and disadvantages, for comfortable life and correct prediction for their future, I prefer to stay the same.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> people who don't want to change can predict their future easily.</MI1> <SI1>When meeting hard situations or new changes, they can imagine and predict the future easily. They still have their habits and will use it for their new situations. They are more predictable than people who want new experiences. Moreover, people are always stressed from life. They think society has changed quickly, so it is very difficult to catch up in the flow of generation. Thus, some people who don't like changing usually make little mistakes. It makes them calm and peaceful. They can enjoy their life without confronting any dangerous situation.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand,</TR> some people really enjoy new experiences.</MI2> <SI2>They have some benefits such as gaining new knowledge. They can develop their life by learning diverse knowledge and be more knowledgeable than other stubborn people. In addition, enjoying new experiences avoids tedious and boring life. Usually, people get bored from monotonous things from day to day. That is why some people want to travel or perform new things never tried. It will give them such satisfaction as accomplishment and achievement.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> two different ways to approach life have their own positive and negative. In my case, I would like to live like people who remain the same as their habits. Thus, I can enjoy my life comfortably without confronting any danger and foretell my future with experiences.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas really needed examples to solidify the ideas into something relatable. Otherwise it was just theoretical ideas that doesn't mean much to the reader.

column1: 379&some people believes that students should be given one long vacation each year. Others believe that students should have several short vacations throughout the year. Which viewpoint do you agree with? Use specific reasons and examples to support your choice.
column3: <IN>Vacations supply various chances to student. Therefore, during the vacation, they can try many tasks that they really want to. <TS>In this concept, I support that students should be given one long vacation.</TS> There are two reasons to support my viewing points. One is that long vacation can give a chance to go abroad to study English or to learn other culture. The other is that long vacation makes it possible to get a job to make money or to get a experience.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> when students have one long vacation, they can visit abroad.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>In my case,</TR> when I was university student, I went to Europe to see different culture. At that time, there are many students coming from all over the world. I made friends who have various culture styles, and they could teach me about their country.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> during long vacation, students can get jobs that they want to join.</MI2> <SI2>This chance should give an important experience of the fields, and they can learn the difficulty of making money. <EX>My friend also had this kind of experience. He majored physics, however, during the vacation, he joined company for the internet. Now, he changed the major to computer science. Moreover, He has got good results in that field.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary,</TR> I strongly support that students have to be allowed one long vacation. This is not only traveling abroad but also having chance to get jobs. It is the only one opportunity that people can travel abroad as well as they can take part in various jobs.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas were almost entirely taken up by examples. Additional sentences which explains the concepts to be gleaned from the examples would have helped.

column1: 380&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? High schools should allow students to study the courses that students want to study. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>High school is considered as the preparation step for the education of university. <TS>In this concept, I disagree that high school student can choose the subjects that they want to study.</TS> I have two reasons to demonstrate my viewing points. One is that high school student have to know the basic of all subject. The other is that studying all subject helps them finding their aptitude.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> high school students should know the basic of all subjects.</MI1> <SI1><EX>In my case, when I was high school student, I didn't learn chemistry class. however, I have many troubles to learn my major subjects. Therefore, I have to study again, during university student.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> learning all subjects will give an advice to find their aptitude.</MI2> <SI2>There are many kinds of subjects that students must study. Neverthness, the subjects that they have advantage on others are just some subjects. Consequently, during high school, they have to find out their aptitude studying various items.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>In summary,</TR> I strongly support that high school students should learn all course. After that, they can know their aptitude and good preparation for university study. It is not needed that high school student are good at all subjects. They just have the basic concept of the courses.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas were not very strong, as they left themselves open to flaws. For example, there was no explanation as to WHY a student has to learn all the different subjects during high school or later in college. Chemistry for example is something that has no effect at all on many careers. Or in the second paragraph, there was no explanation as to why learning all the subjects has to take place in high school rather than college.

column1: 381&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teacher. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>There are so many kinds of teachers in today¡¯s society. Most of parents let their children go institutes for studying, so teachers in the institutes have become very important in children¡¯s education. <TS>Although teacher¡¯s roles are so important, I think parents are the best teacher for children throughout their life.</TS> Because many characteristics are formed in early stage of children, and parents educate their children with love, parents are best teacher for children.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR> throughout one human¡¯s life, most things of one¡¯s characteristics such as humanity, modesty, kindness, etc, are made in the early stage of one¡¯s life.</MI1> <SI1>Because these characteristics are inevitably completed in the early stage, it goes without saying that parents¡¯ roles are incredibly important. Also, it cannot be substituted to another people. Therefore early education of children is so important.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> when most teachers teach their students, they teach students with no love.</MI2> <SI2>There relationship is no more than a teacher-student relationship. However, in education, love is very important factors. Furthermore, if their parents teach children with love, this love encourages children.</SI2></BO2><CO>In fact, more and more parents substitute their roles to teachers of institute. It¡¯s not a good phenomenon. If this phenomenon continues longer, at last, our society would be filled with crime, and there would be many people who are not psychologically immatured.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas would have benefitted from examples or data to solidify the factuality of the claims.

column1: 382&People attend college or university for many different reasons (for example, new experiences, career preparation, increased knowledge). Why do you think people attend college or university? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>I suppose there can be varied ideas about the reasons why people attend college or university, which are essential in new experiences, career preparation, increased knowlege. <TS>As matter of fact, I believe that people attend university to improve their ability.</TS> there are two reasons: people attend university to gain a good job and get a professional education for future employment. In my essay, I describe why I think of the reasons.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place,</TR> I think of that people attend university to gain a good job.</MI1> <SI1>Bechelor's degree is important factor to gain a good job. This is because most of company offering a good job want to people who have bechelor's degree. In korea, education is one of the most inportant element to gain a good job. moreover, It is difficult to get merried for people who does not have the degree. I am confident that whether having the degree or not determine the degree of a good job.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>What's sequence, people attend university to get a professional education for futuer employment.</MI2> <SI2>It is true that if you want to have professional job such as a medical doctor, professor and so on, you have to learn the subjet which is related with the job. For example, If you want to be medical dotor, you have to attend medical college. This is because the college offer profesonal enducation to be doctor, and also give you license of a medical doctor.</SI2></BO2><CO>Generally, differnt people have different attitude regarding attending uninersity. In my perspective, however, attending uninversity has been personally as the most important for these resons: to gain a good job and have profesonal vocation. Therefore, It is imposible to overstate the importance of degree in university.</CO>
column23: The first and second main points were basically the same thing.

column1: 383&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Universities should give the same amount of money to their students¡¯ sports activities as they give to their university libraries. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>Many universities make their plans for using their money for several activites. <TS>Some people insist that the universities should spend the same amount of money for their students' sports activities as they spend for their libraries. I fully agree with their insistance, and through showing two specific reasons, I will demonstrate why I agree with their statement.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> students' sports activities are important for their mental health.</MI1> <SI1>Recently, it was reported in "The Journal of Health Science" that sports activity is very helpful for getting rid of stress. Because of heavy homeworks and course works, they may be mentally tired and much stressed. If universities actively support their students' sports activities, this would result in helping them relax and be mentally healthy.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition,</TR> universities should pay attention to the welfare of their students.</MI2> <SI2>During their leisure time, many students spend their time on sports activities such as tennis, basketball, and soccer. If universities support them through improving their gym and exchanging their old sports instruments, this leads to the improvment of students' welfare.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> with two reasons such as students' mental health and welfare, I think that universities should pay more attention to students' sports activities and invest in them as they do in their libraries. Universities must make plans well to give same amount of money to both students' sports activities and their libraries.</CO>
column23: The second body paragraph was not very strong. Some statistics or examples could have helped establish the connection between sports and students' welfare.

column1: 384&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>I disagree with this attitude that parent are the best teachers. As matter of fact, I make my conviction that parent are not always best teacher.</TS> There are two reasons to surpport my viewing aspect. This is because parent too close to their children emotionally and parents expect their children to be similar to their own. In my essay, I describe why i think parent are not best teacher.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place,</TR> I think of that parent are too emotinal to their children.</MI1> <SI1>It is difficult for parents to teach them rightly. they may always see their children through eyes of protector. <EX><TR>For example.</TR> If children wanted to travel to unfamiliar place, parent would prevent children from going the place because they worry about safe. However, thachers or brothers recommend him to travel to the place, since the trip could give him a new experient.</EX> I am confident that too much emothinol attraction to their children give them rather bad results.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>What's suquence, parents expect their children's interast to be similar to their own.</MI2> <SI2>Largely, parent dose not think that their children are seperated from themselve. the things in which they have interast is also what their offering have interast in, <EX><TR>For example</TR> if the parent wanted to be a medical doctor in their young ages, they might force their children to be the doctor as their future vocation. However, what if their child's true dreme is an artist or an author and so on.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO><TR>consequntly,</TR> I am of position that parent can not be best teacher. For concreting, there are two reason: parent are too close to their children emotionally and dose not think that they are being who is seperated from themseves. It is impossible to overstate that parent could give bad influence on their child by excessively loving their children.</CO>
column23: "What's sequence" is not a transition. There were numerous grammar, formatting, and spelling errors which made the essay difficult to read at times. The content was fine though.

column1: 385&poor service complain method between writing in complain and complain in person.
column3: <IN>Modern people bought many items by internet or getting after seeing it directly. Actually both of two have each merit. If I were in same situation, I would select the method which is complain in writing in because this method is advantageous of expressing my dissatisfaction precisely and made catalogues by many consumers is helpful for other consumers.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> when people express their complaint by writing in, they could convey their problem precisely.</MI1> <SI1>In the case of writing, it is usually useful for expressing self-thinking. Due to this merit, If people have to tell someone their situation precisely, they select wring. <EX><TR>In my case,</TR> I have experienced same case. I bought micro-computer from IBM company. column23: There were numerous grammar, spelling, and formatting errors. The support ideas were not very strong. In the first body paragraph, the example did not establish how that experience was different from how it would have been had you just called. The second body paragraph didn't have an example at all, and would have benefitted from one.

column1: 386&You have been told that dormitory rooms at your university must be shared by two students. Would you rather have the university assign a student to share a room with you, or would you rather choose your own roommate? Use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>Those who are to go to study abroad like to live in dormitory not in the other kinds of house such apratments, a private house and so on taking everything into consideration. In living in dormitory, there are two ways to find roommate - which is to be assigned by school and the other is to choose my roommate by myself. <TS>I think that it will bring about more benefits to live with a new roommmate school assign than my friend.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> we can save efforts and time in case I rely on school to find my roommate.</MI1> <SI1>It is reaquired to investigate lots of time and efforts to find a new roommate suiting me well in every conditions. It needs many steps - for example, adverstising, asking the other friends, meeting candidates for my roommmates, adjusting each other's wants and so on. Furthermore, if we aren't satisfied with each other after meeting directly, I have to get through the same step until I find a roommate. Especially, we have to save my time for it's the time when we prepare lots of stuff for study in the new environment where everything is different from my country.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR> a new roommate can keep my privacy as I respect her privacy.</MI2> <SI2>If I use the room with my friend, we may feel comfortable each other and spend lots of time together. In result, it is also likely that we interrupt each other's privacy life though we won't intend. On the other hand, I would consider new roommates' status, not require lots of things and not know the details about her because I feel uncomfortable until we're familiar. It's not easy to share the living room with others who has lived in different ways. Hence, to keep the privacy is one of the most essencial elements to live with others.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Above all,</TR> I've been dreaming to live with a foreign friend who has a different background.</MI3> <SI3>Naturally, I like to challenge new things and am boring often in the same environments. Furthermore, as I have not been to the other country, I am much curious about the cultures out of my country. If I have a chance to use the dormitory with a foreign friend, I would not only know from a trival living habits to mental world but also introduce mine.</SI3></BO3><CO>To have roommate being assingned enables to save time and efforts, keep privacy and experience the new culture. However, the most important thing is that we must take care of each other whomever we share the room with.</CO>
column23: The second body paragraph would have benefitted from an example of something that would have been ok with a stranger roommate and not with a friend.

column1: 387&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Attending a live performance(for example, a play ,a concert ,or sporting event) is more enjoyable than watching the same event on television. Use specific reasons and examples to support you opinion.
column3: <IN>Some peaple like to go live performance. They like atmosphere in there. Other like to stay home and watch on the television because they can see more close. <TS>I prefer to watch television.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly,</TR>It's free to watch television home.</MI1> <SI1>If I want to go to play or concert,I should afford to that. Its cost is usually over 20000 Won. Wathching television is cheaper than attending performance.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR>surrounding is more comfortable than seat in performance hall.</MI2> <SI2><EX>When I see a baseball, I sit in the couch ,straight my legs and put my legs on the other small couch. Sometime I eat something during watching baseball game. </EX></SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Third,</TR> I do see a actor or a player big and in detail.</MI3> <SI3><EX>Went to concert I wanted to take a picture but I couldn't because stage was far from my seat. Even if I couldn't see his face.</EX></SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> form the reasons mentioned above , the best way of seeing performance is watching television. It offer more comportable ,economical and practical atmosphere.</CO>
column23: "Firstly" is not a word; simply using "First" would have been correct. The body paragraphs were all extremely simple and could have been much better developed, although it did cover all the points needed to communicate the ideas.

column1: 388&Some people believe that a college or university education should be available to all students. Other people believe that higher education should be available only to good students. Discuss these views. Which view do you agree with ? Explain why?
column3: <IN>Unlike before, these days people who get a higher education is encreasing. As industry is developed rapidly, people become to live in high technology society, and they would pursue the better life style. As a result ,actually, the level of their education is getting higher. Then, is it necessary that all the people need the higher education ?</IN><BO1><MI1>Some people believe that a college or university education should be available.</MI1> <SI1>What we learn through the higher education is very important to live in modern society in that what our society needs is getting diverse and we would always have multiful choice in any cases. When we face these problem, the more knowledge or recognition we have , the better results we can make. That is why we can require ability to represent their own opinions and to judge through the prompt consideration as well as the logical sense in college or university. Besides , modern society want specialization in their fields. So whatever we hope to be we should be specialized in the field, is as it a little work. It is the very competitiveness and we can get it through the major of university.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Others believe that higher education should be available only to good students.</MI2> <SI2>As a matter of fact, what we acquire through middle and high schooling can cover what we need to live basically. In addition , it would be wasting time when they study in a college or university ,not helpful to accomplish. <EX><TR>For example , all the people don¡¯t have need of getting knowledge about something like a law or medical. As it were, it would be necessary for a cook to acquire experiences rather than get knowledge through the books.</EX></SI2></BO2><CO>Education through a college or university would be helpful to people living in modern society in that they have a life with awakening in the mutiple. <TS>So, I think that higher education need to many people as possible ,only not to specific people.</TS> It can have an influence in improving our life as well as getting rich to our whole society.</CO>
column23: Many grammar and formatting issues made the essay difficult to follow sometimes. But overall it was a good essay. The first body paragraph would have benefitted from some examples.

column1: 389&some people believes that students should be given one long vacation each year. Others believe that students should have several short vacations throughout the year. Which viewpoint do you agree with? Use specific reasons and examples to support your choice.
column3: <IN><TS>Some people seem to believe that students have several short vations through the year. However, I give a preferance to have a long vacation each year.</TS> This is because a long vacation give a oppurtunity for us to take a long trip and we can learn a new one which we take an interest in long vacation. In this essay, I will demonstrate the reasons why I agree with having a long vacation.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Fist of all,</TR> the long vacacation gives me a good chance to take a trip.</MI1> <SI1><EX>When I was a university student I went to Erope with my friends for a month. It was the first time that I leave my house for a long time without my parent's care. Formally, I never think about the importance of my house and my family. During the trip, I have to dicide not only eating food but also the youthhostel where we take a rest. As time gose on, I took a unexpected situation.</EX> If I had a short vacation, I would have experianced such a unexpected thing.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> we can learn a new one which we have an interest for a long time.</MI2> <SI2>People have hobby which they like such as piano, compurter design, and so on. In order to learn a new field, the period for prepaing and practicing is needed. long vactione can be a good period for student to learn new field in school days. There is a korean proverb that having a hobby makes the life affluent. It means that people have to learn forever. I think Long vaction in school days can be a good period to learn new field.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I prefer to have a long vacation in comparision with several short vacations. because long vacation gives a oppurtunity to take a long trip. In addition we can learn new one in long vaction.</CO>
column23: There were numerous grammar, spelling, and formatting errors, but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 390&Some people believe that a college or university education should be available to all students. Others believe that higher education should be available only to good students. Discuss these views. Which view do you agree with? Explain why.
column3: <IN><TS>The education of university is somewhat special and specific. Therefore, people usually think that only good students can afford to take the education. However, I disagree this viewing point.</TS> There are two reasons that support my opinion. One is that all people who want to attend university have opportunity to study what they want to. The other is that people can find out their aptitude during university education.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> the chance of education is opened to all students whether they are good students or bad ones.</MI1> <SI1>In Korea, the standard of good student for university is that they get high score on several subjects, such as English, Math, Korean. Actually, these subjects cannot represent the quality of student. Consequently, the chance of education must be given to students who are poor at those subjects.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> It also ample cases that student accidentally know their aptitude while they are university students.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>In my case,</TR> I didn't get good grade in high school. However, the major matched with my aptitude. For that reason, I can graduate the top position of the department. Now, to get a Ph. D degree, I am trying to study abroad.</EX></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> I strongly support that all student could have chance to attend the university education. For their equality of learning and searching their merits, university will be exposed to all applicants.</CO>
column23: The support ideas were not very strong. In the first body paragraph, it says that these subjects cannot represent the quality of a student. There is no explanation as to why that is or what DOES represent the quality of a student. The second example shows why it applied to you, but there is no real indication that the principle would apply to everyone or anyone else.

column1: 391&Some people choose friends who are different from themselves. Others choose friends who are similar to themselves. Compare the advantages of having friends who are different from you with the advantages of having friends who are similar to you. Which kind of friend do you prefer for yourself? Why?
column3: <IN>As a human beings, we try to have many friends as a company in our life. <TS>About this, some people prefer to have friends who are similar to themselves; while other people would like to have ones who are different from themselves. These two types of friends have their own advantages. However, if I choose one type of friends, I will select similar friends with myself because I can feel that I'm respected from other people in my life.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First,</TR> similar friends make us feel comfortable and gives us respection.</MI1> <SI1>Usually we do not have special relation with most of people we face every day. <EX>We sometimes have meeting with other people for our study or work. It is just for our interest in our jobs; not for pleasure. In the meeting like this, we are hardly able to relax or relase our stress from daily work. However, friends who are similar with myself can understand my mental state just by having a conversation through telephone or seeing my face and give me emotional support. They try to listen to my problems as theirs making me feel I'm not alone and I'm respected from someone.</EX> Therefore, the value of similar friends is great.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second,</TR> friends who are different from ourselves make our horizon widen.</MI2> <SI2>Above-mentioned, people differ from one another; they have differnt hobbies, interest, education, and viewpoint. If we have a friend who have different taste about these, we can get some valuable knowledge or wisdom. <EX><TR>For example</TR> if we have a friend who likes hiking a mountain, we can be recommended to hike mountains for our health. While, if a shy man hesitate to ask a woman he likes to go out together, an active friend can help the man by encouraging him to dash the woman and giving some strategy to amuse her.</EX> Therefore, having different friends are very fruitful.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> friends similar with ourselves and ones different from ourselves have their own merits. Similar friends give us emotional support; while different ones can make our horizon widen. However, I prefer friends similar with myself because I can get vital energy from them by sharing my problems and feeling being respected. Besides my family, friends similar with myself are the most important beings for me in this world.</CO>
column23: "First and "Second" are probably not the best choices for transitions in a compare & contrast essay. Otherwise this was a fine essay.

column1: 392&Some people enjoy change and others like their ilves to stay the same. Compare these two approaches to life.Which do you prefer?
column3: <IN>Some people welcome changes in their lives ,while others prefer a stable,more unchanging lives.Each has its own advantages.<TS>Personally,I would much rather have a more changing life than one that stay the same all the time.</TS> </IN><BO1><MI1>Those people who enjoy change find many benefits in constantly having new experiences.</MI1><SI1>Since they look forward to the excitement and challenges that new experience brings, they can not only broaden and enrich the fields of their knowledge when it comes to life ,but also build their capacities to adapt themselves to new environment.In other words,they can have abilities to decide what to do and solve challenging problems immediatly that they face, Moreover, they tend to be flexable because,through their a diversity of experiences, they can see peoples and situations from insider and outsider perspectives.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>The other group of people who prefer a life to be the same benefit from their unchanging lifestyles.</MI2><SI2>These people feel attached to their communities and works so that they can make deep relationships with many members who live near their houses and work with them. Also,there is safety in stability.In other words,people who remain their lives the same can prepare to plan their futures as the main componants of their lives will not change.It enables these people to enhance their lives of standard step by step.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion.</TR>although each lifestyle has its own benefits,in my case,I prefer a life that is filled with a deluge of chances and adventures because I know when I face difficult tasks,I feel more animated toward my own life.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas really needed examples.

column1: 393&Many people have a close relationship with their pets. These people treat their birds, cats, or other animals as members of their family. In your opinion, are such relationships good? Why or Why not? Use specific reasons and examles to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Many people consider their pets as a member of the family and have very close relationship with them. Some people insist that this kind of relationship have negative influences on personal relationship, making people spend less time in communicating with each other and place more emphasis on their association with pets than with other people. However, others disagree with this argument and support intimate relationship with pets. <TS>In my opinion, a close relationship between pets and humans is good for relieving loneliness, basic needs of human being for love and care and understanding natural environment around us.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> as human society is getting more industrialized and technological advances proceed, people have less contact with others.</MI1> <SI1>We spend more time by ourselves rather than socialize with others thesedays. We feel more lonely and isolated and try to find ways to meet the basic needs for love and care. The number of people who live alone have steadily increased recently and to have pets is one of the most popular and effective ways to compensate those social needs.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly,</TR> having pets gives an opportunity to understand other forms of life in the environment around us.</MI2> <SI2>Those who stay close with pets tend to understand and care more about the natural environment and associate with others better than those without pets. In addition, they learn the wisdom of how to coexist with nature, not to destroy it or subordinate it under human society.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR> as mentioned above, I support a close relationship with pets because it relieves loneliness and helps people to meet basic social needs in the modern individualized society. Also, it encourages better understanding of other forms of life and natural environment.</CO>
column23: The two supporting ideas were very broad, and would have been stronger with examples or data to back up the claims.

column1: 394&when people succeed, it is because of hard work. luck has nothing to do with success. do you agree or not?
column3: <IN><TS>I do not agree with that when people succeed, it;s because of hard wotk. luck has nothing to do with success.</TS> We have to work hard and try hard to be successful, but luck is also an important key to success.</IN><BO1><MI1>We wish people good luck when they are up tp somrthing very important in their lives. i believe that we do that because we have learn how important luck is through our experiences.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example,</TR> my husband and I wanted to partcipate on the marathon held in our county. We put a couple hours everyday to prepare for the race. however i could not finish the race because i sprained my left ankle during the race. i worked hard fot it, but i could make it.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><EX>It is very obvious how important luck is in the Olympic Games. I believe that every athlete works hard to perform well in a games. however, many athletes often fail to show their abilities. sometimes, they fall down in races or get sick. no matter how hard they try to succeed, if luck is not in their side, they may lose.</EX></BO2><CO>we have to work hard to accomplish our goals but it is up tp luck after we have done everything we are supposed to do. we need good luck that allowes us to demonstrate our abilities in right monents and right places. to be successful, we need both hard work and luck.</CO>
column23: The second body paragraph was really just an example of the thesis and the first body paragraph. The main idea of the first body paragraph really didn't introduce anything new other from the thesis. So all in all this essay didn't communicate a whole lot beyond luck being important.

column1: 395&Do you agree or disagree with the following statememt? All students should be required to study art and music in secondary school. Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>Art and Music are necessary in our society and I think it has many benefits to study art and music in secondary school.</TS> It can give a help for their future job, give them common interests, and in good for their mental health.</IN><BO1><MI1>As you know, in this morden society we always meet various forms of utilization of art and music,</MI1> <SI1>They are used to design the state- of-the-art machines, create advertisements, and the like. In other words, to have knowledges and skills about art and music are helpful for getting the job.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Furthemore,</TR> art and music give them common interests.</MI2> <SI2>So many students have their own compact disc player or MP3 player and spend much more time for liestening to the music. TTherefore study music and art will give them more valuable common interests.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Lately,</TR> to study music and art is also good for their mental health.</MI3> <SI3><EX><TR>For example,</TR> some kinds of classics get their mind to be comfortable and relax. And painting the picture offers them kind of exit to get some feelings bothering them out of their mind.</EX></SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In short,</TR> I agree the statement that all students should be required to study art and music in secondary school, because it is useful for future job, give students common interrests, and make their mentality healthful.</CO>
column23: The thesis was not strong. It established that art and music have benefits to society, but did not established whether it should be required study. The supporting ideas were not strong. They made very broad statements that made claims about the way people think, without any real evidence to back it up.

column1: 396&When people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in person. Which way do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>From time to time, we experience that what we bought is disordered though we didn't mistake anything. In letting the compony know about that, there are two ways , which are to complain in writing and in person. Some people say that writing is more convenient and faster than in person while others think that to talk the clerk face to face is more firmly to complain their opinions. <TS>In my opinion, to write is more helpful than to talk directly in complaing.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all.</TR> we can abridge what we want to complain in writing.</MI1> <SI1>If we call to the clerk or to meet and talk ourselves, it is easy to miss what I said. Furthermore, when we lose our temper by the poor service of the clerk or meet the unexpected situation , most people would forget the main problem and they focus on the the other problem such the staff's unkind service. On the other hand, writing enables us to think considerably about the problem and convey the point to the company briefly.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR> a writing system is very quick by e-mail in these days.</MI2> <SI2>There are lots of phone calls and mail of the client to require better service or refund what they bought last. If we use the phone, we have to wait for the operator due to the busy lines and we call again to spend the same time or more in case our connection is interuppted. However, it doesn't need a long time for company to check to reply to their client by email. Not to speak of, client don't need the spend the time, holding the phone with doing nothing. They can be satisfied with the result by typing and clicking few times.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In concllusion,</TR> writing brings us more benefit to complain than to contact in person in that we convery the main point briefly and need little time to get the respond. Personally, I strongly recommend to use this way not only when complainiong but also when buying something.</CO>
column23: There were many grammar, spelling, and formatting errors, but otherwise this was a fine essay.

column1: 397&People remember special gifts or presents that they have received. Why? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>The gifts can give us a lot of plasure. Moreover, special gifts allow enjoying huge happiness and particular feeling. In my thought, special gifts make us remember in that the presents may hold the true heart of givers and specific meaning.</TS> Through a couple of examples, I will demonstrate my viewing points.</IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> special gifts always contain the true heart of the doner.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>In my case,</TR> I received hand made sweater that was made by my girl friend. Whenever I wear the clothes, I always appreciated to her. After that, I married her. </EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Sencon,</TR> that kinds of presents have special meaning.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For examples,</TR> in Korea, when their daughter marry. the mother give her the ring that was come from her mother.</EX> Like this, people must have rememberd perticular presents.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion,</TR>either expensive or cheap, it is more important that the gifts should contain the sincerity and meaning. If you want to send your heart to other, special gifts is the best way to obtain their minds.</CO>
column23: The supporting ideas were not strong. In the first body paragraph, the entire supporting idea was the example. However, the main point was that the gift contains the giver's true heart. But the example focused only on how the receiver felt about it. In the second body paragraph, the example also took up the entire supporting idea. The example in this case talked about a very specific type of gift, and did not provide any indication that that kind of principle could be applied universally.

column1: 398&When people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in person. Which way do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Sometimes, we are disappointed to poor service or product so that complain through various methods. <TS>In a variety of complaining methods, I prefer to complain in person because that is to convey correct meaning and take direct response.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> complaining in person can convey correct meaning about uncomfortable problem.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For a instant,</TR> I bought a shirt which was founded a fault, at first I talked to the fault by phone, the salesclerk said that the design was not any problem. Eventually, I went the shop and showed the shirt because I and the salesperson weren't well communicated. The staff confirmed problems of the product and repaired the product.</EX> As stated above example, complain in person allows to convey correct meaning of the problem.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also,</TR> I think that complaining in person is the best way to get direct response of company.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>In my experience,</TR> when I complained by writing, it took a long time to solve the problem. However, I visit the shop I bough the product, staff of the shop pays attention to my dissatisfaction and solve the problem.</EX> In this respect, complaining in person is promptly possible to take response of staff of the company.</SI2></BO2><CO>As stated above reason, if I happened to the case of unfavorable product or service, I would like to complain direct in person. That is because complaining in person to solve the problem is to communicate right intension and to get prompt solution.</CO>
column23: In the first body paragraph, it didn't establish how things would have been different had you complained in writing. So the differentiation wasn't there, as it was in the second body paragraph.

column1: 399&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Reading fiction (such as novels and short stories) is more enjoyable than watching movies. Use specific reasons and examples to explain your position.
column3: <IN>In modern society, the entertainment becomes a essential thing in human life because modern people are interested in the leisure than people of the past. There are many kinds of entertainment in our society, and the most popular things are fictions and movies. About these, some say that reading fiction is more enjoyable while others say that watching movies is more exciting because of the enjoyment by visible effects. <TS>In my opinion, I agree with the opinion that reading fiction is more enjoyable because it gives the tremendous enjoyment by infinite imagination and lively expressions without any limitation.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all,</TR> reading fiction enable me to enjoy through exerting of infinite imagination.</MI1> <SI1>When a reader read a fiction, he or she would specify every scene as real situation by imagination of themselves, and feel more interesting about that. <EX><TR>For example,</TR> I like science fictions very much, and when I read those, I always imagine a feeling of vast universe and apperance of aliens appearing in fictions. In this course, I feel as if I become a character in the fictions, therefore, I believe that reading fiction is more exciting than directly watching the scenes in movies.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second of all,</TR> through reading fiction, I can meet various expressions without any limitation.</MI2> <SI2>In movies, there are many fators which are impossible to express in the screen ; however, contrasting with that, fiction is only by description of the writer without any needs for visible expression. Accordingly, it can provide every scene that writer want to depict to readers. <EX><TR>To illustrate,</TR> the fiction of England "Harry Porter" is made movies in some time ago, and althogh it has been very popular over the world, I was not satisfied with that because it was couldn't express efficiently comparing with the fiction.</EX> Based on an example in above, I'm sure that fiction can give bigger joy than movies to us.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up,</TR> I think that reading fiction is more amusing comparing with watching movies in that it provides unlimited amusement to readers through encouraging imaginative power of readers, and can express everything which is intended by writer unrestrictely.</CO>
column23: There were some grammar problems but otherwise this was a good essay.

column1: 400&In general people are living longer now. Discuss the causes of this phenomenon. Use specific reasons and examples to develop your essay.
column3: <IN><TR>Generally speaking</TR>, people are living longer now. Life expectancy reaches 80s in most developed countries now.
