Although each of maintain has its own reasons, I oppose to construct a factory near my house because it harms environment and make traffic situation worse.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>On one hand</TR>, the advent of new factory helps development of our community in some economic aspects.</MI1> <SI1> It will make more jobs available by hiring many people from adjoining region.<TR>In addition</TR>, in whole extent, it can help the community's industrial progress grow. <TR>However</TR>, I think these good economical effects can't outweigh the harms it will bring to our town.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>First of all</TR>, emerging of factorial region will damage the environment.</MI2> <SI2>According to a recent research, conducted in City Engineering Dept. of Pusan University, more than half of the citizen living industrial place suffer from environmental diseases caused by factories, some of who even die of them.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>What's more, since the facility, the traffic will be worsen.</MI3> <SI3>Because the staffs and employees commute everyday, our town may be more crowded, especially in rush-hour. <TR>In my case</TR>, for example, when I was in high school, a complex of industrial buildings were constructed near my school. <TR>Since then</TR>, I had to undergo severe traffic jam when I go to school.</SI3></BO3><CO>Of course, we can't ignore the some positive economic effects from new factory. <TR>However</TR>, I still disagree to build it because the disadvantages, such as environmental spoilage and worsened traffic situation, surpass these advantages. The owner of factory should reconsider these negative things and make solution for them before starting the construction.</CO>
column23: This is an excellent essay. The there is great balance in th paragraphs of the essay as well as a nice selection of main and supporting points.

column1: 608&People recognize a difference between children and adults. What events (experiences or ceremonies) make a person an adult? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>It is certain that children and adults are different, and there are several reasons to show that. Through many events, a person would be an adult. <TS><TR>About this</TR>, some people say that the twentieth birthday is the event while other people insist that a graduation from a highschool is the event. Both opinion are very reasonable. <TR>However, in my opinion</TR>, the two off the most obvious events that make a person an adult are marriage and job because those mean that the person must be responsible for his or her family, and can be independent in terms of monetary things.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>On the one hand</TR>, the marriage makes a person an adult which means that the person should be responsible for family.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Before marriage</TR>, most people are considered to be young because they do not need to think about their family very seriously, usually parents do that job. <TR>However, after marriage</TR>, the person has to consider a lot of things about his or her own family, such as how many babies a couple would have, and how to earn the money to live successfully. <EX>For example I thought a friend of mine was very childish about everything, but after she got married, I couldn't stop thinking she changed very much and she bacame more considerate than before.</EX> <TR>For this reason</TR>, I woule like to insist a marriage could change a child to an adult.</SI1></BO1> <BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, getting a job maked a person an adult by letting the one be independent about monetary things.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>For instance</TR>, in my case, I had to ask my parents to give me some money to hang around with my friends before I got a job(even a part time job). But as soon as I got a part time job and made some money, I spent and saved money on my own and even I could give my parents money or presents with it. It made me feel that I was a real adult and I could be more independent.<TR>Like above</TR>,getting a job so being able to earn money, regardless the amount of money, makes people more independent meaning do any thing by oneself.</SI2></BO2><CO>To summerize, I think there are two events to make a person a real adult which is different from children. The one is a marriage by which one would feel more responsible for oneself and ones family as well, the other is getting a job causing a person to be independent. It is clear that we would experience our lives as real adult by passing these events that I mentioned</CO>.

column1: 609&When people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writing and others prefer to complain in person. Which way do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>We buy many things and get serviced from shops. If we feel uncomfotable about the products of services, we can complain about it actively. Whem people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writhing while others prefer to complain in person. Both the two opinions might have good sides. <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, I would like to complain in writing because it is easy to organize my thoughts and more objective.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, complaing in writing is easy to organize my thought.</MI1> <SI1> By using this way, we can write down our complains very clearly. <TR>For instance</TR>, few days ago, I called a mobile company because of a mistake for entering my accout number for the cell phone rates. While we were talking to each other we had the problem to understand what we said. Finally I e-mailed them with attatched file that I was going to say and the receipt that caused the problem, so I could transfer all I wanted to say them and solve the problem in a very neat way.<TR>At the time</TR>, I realized that it is very important to express my opinion very clearly, and writing is the best way to to so.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, complaning in writing is more objective than in person.</MI2> <SI2>When we talk about something made me unsatisfied, we can become very upset easily, because a conversation is emotionally going. In that case, after tranquilize ourselves, we can write about it with an objective view, and have a chance to think about the problem one more time. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, right after someone is offended, the person can't say what the problem is exactly. They are apt to say only about their feeling.</EX> <TR>However</TR>, if he or she chooses another way to complain, that is in writing, they will complain more effectively.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, even though make a speech of complaining about something has some benefits, I prefer to complain in writing because it enables me to give staff my organized opinion which is easy to understand, and to be more objective not be emotional. With well-organized thought, we can get back our rights about bartering goods and service.</CO>

column1: 610&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A zoo has no useful purpose. Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Nowadays</TR>, there are many zoos built to provide places for people to enjoy and take a rest in there. Some people insist since there are more better places to enjoy, a zoo is useless for people while others insist differently. Although these two different opinions are both reasonable, in my point of view, a zoo has still very important purpose for both people and animals.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, a zoo provides a place where people can have a great time.</MI1> <SI1> Some adults think a zoo as useless place, however, for every children, a zoo is a place where they can enjoy with various animals and learn about them. <TR>Also</TR>, there are many adults who visit a zoo to see various shows. <TR>For instance</TR>, when I was young, my family often visited zoos because my parents thought I could learn about animals and I really liked to visit a zoo.<TR>Also</TR>, there were numerous shows which adults could enjoy so a zoo was a place where both adults and children can enjoy. As seen at the example, I believe a zoo has a purpose to make people enjoy and take a rest.</SI1></BO1> <BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover<TR>, a zoo is an important place where animals can be protected.</MI2> <SI2>Nowdays, many hunters kill wild animals illegally to earn money. To protect animals and cure hurted animals, a zoo is an essential place. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, last month, I saw a hurted bird which is almost extict in the TV and I worried about the bird. <TR>Soon</TR>, the bird carried to a zoo and provided cure, good food and place.</EX> <TR>At that time</TR>, I realize how zoo is important for animals.</SI2></BO2><CO>I conclusion, I strongly believe that a zoo still plays an important roles in our life because it provides both people and animals joy and shelter. If every zoo were abolished, people would lose a place where they can see wild animals and animals would lose a place where they can be protected.</CO>
column23: This is an excellent essay. The thesis takes a position but does not give a preview of points that will be made. The rest of the essy does a fabulous job there are great transitions, main, and supporting points.

column1: 611&In the future, students may have the choice of studying at home by using technology such as computers or television or of studying at traditional schools. Which would you prefer? Use reasons and specific details to explain your choice.
column3: <IN><TS>As technology relating to education has developed, many students prefer studying with computer to in the classroom. <TR>However</TR>, I think that traditional education is more helpful to students than distance education because of the following reasons: face to face relationship between students and teachers and importance of learning social aspect in schools.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, even though distance education can offer technologically effective lectures to students, studying in traditional school gives heartwarming relationship between students and lecturers.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, teachers out of class can give advice to some students about what subject they feel difficulty.</EX>It is important for them to develop their schoolwork.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>The another reason why conventional studying in a classroom is better than distance education is that it makes students learn social aspect such as association with others.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>In fact</TR>, diverse group work in class develop students¡¯ academic achievement as well as let them learn social aspect, leadership, association with others, etc.<TR>However</TR>, distance education causes students to feel loneliness because there are no relationship with another company.</SI2></BO2><CO>Therefore, While distance education makes students feel convenience with computer or television, I believe that studying in traditional schools teaches more valuable and more various instruction than distance education because schooling education influence students¡¯ academic performance as well as their social aspect.</CO>
column23: This is an excellent essay. The there is great balance in th paragraphs of the essay as well as a nice selection of main and supporting points.

column1: 612&Many students have to live with roommates while going to school or university. What are some of the important qualities of a good roomate? Use specific reasons and examples to explain why these qualities are important.
column3: <IN><TS>Many students live with roommate while going to school or university. Because they live together,a good roommate is important during their school life. I think the qualities of a good roommate are enthusiasm for learning and consideration for others.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Above all</TR>, enthusiasm for learning is a one of the important qualities of good roommates.<MI1> <SI1>Because students spend much time with their roommates, it can be influenced from their roommates. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, if roommates don¡¯t like to study hard and enjoy drinking or playing, even if people who have an affection to study, they can be apt to get along with their roommates.</EX> <TR>On the other hand</TR>, if roommates study hard even in the dormitory, they can have enthusiasm for studying because it motivates them to study harder.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Furthermore</TR>,good roommates should have consideration for others.</MI2> <SI2> This is significant factor to get along with roommates. <TR>For instance</TR>, some people who don¡¯t like to wash their body or clean their clothes, makes you unpleasant. <TR>Moreover, sometimes</TR>, people don¡¯t have same schedules, for example, some people like to study at night and sleep until late morning, and others like to sleep early.<TR>In this case</TR>, they must try to disturb others, if not, they can be conflict often. <TR>So</TR>, it is important to have consideration for others.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, in my opinion, an enthusiasm for learning and consideration for others are most important factors of good roommates. It helps get along well during the school or university life. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I believe choosing a good roommate is very important to many students.</CO>
column23: This is a well written essay. The introduction is a bit too short, and the thesis sentence seems a little weak. There are great transitions and main points.

column1: 613&People learn in different ways. Some people learn by doing things; other people learn by reading about things; others learn by listening to people talk about things. Which of these methods of learning is best for you? Use specific examples to support your choice
column3: <IN>Considering the way people learn in their lives, Some persons learn by doing things. Other persons learn by reading about things and others learn by listening to people talk about things around them. <TS>There are to be the ways to be well fitted to each person. But I think learning by doing things is best for me in my life. In the following, I will show the reason why I think of about it.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, I had a chance to study in the graduate school and to earn the money in the company.</MI1> <SI1> Before I entered the company which is named SK in Korea, the friends around me told me that it is better for you to enter the company than study in the graduate school, while my parents told me not to enter the company because I don¡¯t have to earn the money yet. But I finally got out of the graduate school and entered the company. While I was working there, I felt that I am the type of scientists, so called a scholar rather than a entrepreneur or company worker.<That is very important to have the experiences directly by myself to know the correct things about me.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Then</TR>, I won the driving license 7 years ago.</MI2> <SI2> But there is a story that I have some difficulties to get the license. At that time the magazines and people around me who¡¯d already obtained the driving license told me that it is very easy, in the other words, it is a piece of cake to win the license. So I didn¡¯t think that I need to study the contents related with the driving.Eventually I failed to pass the driving license test. I felt that I was wrongly informed by the people or books. And I worked hard to get the license again.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I learn by doing things directly by myself. To refer the book written by other people or the people¡¯s talk can cause me to misunderstand the things and the problems to need to be solved by myself. Although it takes a long time to learn by doing things, it is a confident way to succeed and do the right things for me.</CO>

column1: 614&Music tells us something about a culture. What does the music of your country reveal about the culture of your country? Use reasons and specific examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>Listening to a country's music, we can assume the nation's cultural aspects on which it is based. Music of Spain expresses its fervent national feeling, while Chinese melody shows us a magnificent view of its people. In case of my country, I believe music of Korea represents several things of Korean people and culture. Those are cooperation, sorrow of women, and preference to sing and dance.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, we can find the spirit of cooperation in Korean labor songs.</MI1> <SI1>Not only do these songs, sung during farming works, teach us that Korea is traditionally an agricultural land, but also its people work together efficiently singing these songs. <EX> For example, there is 'Seeding song', and people fit their working rhythm with others by singing this song.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Next</TR>, we can learn that sorrow and sadness of women in previous era. In traditional Korea, man was conceived to excel women, and women were too oppressed to live as they wanted freely.</MI2> <SI2><TR>For instance</TR>, from the song 'A life of woman,' most of which is filled with sad melodies, we can understand the harsh ways of life in which those women had to undergo as female.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, we can notice that Korean people love to sing and dance. Korean people are known for their ardor to music and dance, and we can detect this fact in Korean traditional music.<MI3> <SI3>According to recent research, conducted in Korean Music Dept. in Seoul University in last year, more than 60% of Korean songs are composed by unnamed singers' mouth, and, moreover, most of the songs are accompanied by dance. In this manner, we can know how Korean people like to sing and dance.</SI3></BO3><CO>Music is a mirror of culture, so we can learn about a nation's national feeling by listening and understanding its music. When you experience Korean music, you can notice that Korean people is cooperative, have a deep sadness in their minds, and greatly enjoy singing and dancing.</CO>

column1: 615&Do you agree of disagree with the following statement? There is nothing that young people can teach older people. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinions.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Usually</TR>, people think older people teach younger people. Some people believe there is nothing that younger people can teach older people while others believe differently. Although these two different opinions are both reasonable, in my point of view, when young people have more knowlegable than old people, they can teach old people. <TR>Also, thesedays</TR>, many new technics are appear so it is common for young people to teach old people.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I think between teaching and learning have no age. When a person know more than another person, he can teach others.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, I saw a special person at TV last month and the reason why he is special is he became professor of a university at his age of 25. At his interview, he told that at first, it is hard to teach people who are older than he but older people respect him as a teacher so there was no problem with teaching someon who is older than he.</EX> As seen at the example, when someone is more knowledgable than others, he/she can be a teacher whatever his age is.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover<TR>, <TR>nowadays</TR>, there is numerous new knowledge what old people never know while younger people are used to doing it.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>For instance</TR>, in my father's generation, there are few computers and not many people use it and they did not know the efficency of computer. <TR>However</TR>, in my generation, it is very common to use computer and almost everyone know howto use it. So my father always ask me about computer when he have a problem with it and I can teach him because I know better than him.<TR>Like this</TR>, young people can teach old people new things such as computer, cell phone that they have never learned about it.</SI2></BO2></CO>In conclusion, I strongly believe that it is possible for young people to teach old people when they have better knowledge and know about new things. Since there are numerous things that young people know, im my point of view, people should abandon the thought that the teachers should be older people and the learners should be a young people.</CO>

column1: 616&You have enough money to purchase either a house or a business. Which yu choose to buy? Give specific reasons to explain your choice.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Nowadays</TR> it is difficult to earn money and it is important how to spend money. If I have enough money to purchase either a house or business, I would like to buy a house. Because it provides our family with a good place to live in and it also can be a excellent investment.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, a pleasant living place is very important for us. In modern society, a lot of people live in a city which has small a area.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, I live in Seoul whose population is about fourteen million but whose area is just as big as the those of the smallest state in the United States.</EX> <TR>As a result</TR>, in Seoul, many people live in a small house with a unpleasant surroundings. and there is no exception for me. The higher density of population is the lower quality of life. <TR>Consequently</TR>, it is the best choice for me to buy a house, if I have enough money to buy a house.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Additionally</TR>, buying a house is also a good investment in Korea.</MI2> <SI2> Many rich people buy a house, especially an apartment for an investment instead of for a living place. Because buying another apartment gives a high return to its owner.<TR>That means</TR>, if doing so, the investor can earn much money without little effort. Low risk, high return. What a ideal way of investment it is!</SI2></BO2><CO>In sum, I would like to buy a house if I have enough money to purchase either a house or a business. Because a house give us pleasant place in which we can rest and it might be a excellent investment in Korea. <TR>As years go</TR>, It is becoming more important that living place and its environment.</CO>

column1: 617&Some people prefer to plan activities for their free time very carefully. Others choose not to make any plans at all for their free time. Compare the benefits of planning free-time activities with the benefits of not making plans. Which do you prefer ¡ªplanning or not planning for your leisure time? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your choice.
column3: <IN><TS>when people active during their free time, they show different preference whether make a plan or not. some people want to plan activities for their free time, while others decide to do leisure activities without plan. Both of these types about plan have their own advantages.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>There are some benefits of planning free time activities.<MI1> <SI1> <TR>First</TR>, with an elaborate plan, people usually make good use of their time and maney. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, during the holiday season, it is difficult to get a ticket for transfortation and a room to stay without reservation, and there are specially priced coupons, which will reduce their cost of traveling.</EX> Namely. If we make a plan for free time, we can cut corners time and money. second, people can double their satisfaction by collecting a lot of information about the place they visit.<TR>That is to say</TR>, according to their timetable, they can see as many famous places as they can.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Benifit of not making plans exempt a lot of work in the course of planning leisure time. so, It relieves stress.</MI2> <SI2><TR>For instance</TR>, after final test, I enjoyed free time without plan. It makes me feel freedom.</SI2></BO2><CO>In my view point, I prefer to plan activities for my free time. Benefits which I can get through plan can efficiently use time and expanse for leisure time, and can feel increasing satisfaction. When I make no plans for free time, I can relieve stress.But, I think that Benefits which I can get through plan are more beneficial than benefits which I can get through no plan. In conclusion, If I have a free time, I will make a plan for advantages I mentioned above.</CO>

I am sure that only such parents¡¯ love and attention can do it.Eternal love and interest are good example, which show parents¡¯ ability as teacher.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I strongly believe that parents are the greatest teacher in children¡¯ lives. Children need sufficient understanding, affection and concern, in my point of view, only parents can give it to their children.</CO>

column1: 622&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Teachers should be paid according to how much their student learn. Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN><TS>A main concern of the world today is the education or our children. People wonder how the education that their children recieve could be better. They develop different programs that either fail or have tremendous impact on the affected schools. One proposed idea is to pay teachers only according to how much their students learn. Some people say that this is not very efficient way, <TR>however</TR>, I believe paying teachers by their students help teachers to teach better and it is fair for teachers, too.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, to give money for teachers according to their students can stimulate them to teach better.</MI1> <SI1> They would try to teach students more efficiently and make their students smarter. Some teachers give up some of their students because they think their students are not very smart and can not understand what they are saying. <TR>However</TR>, if teachers try hard to teach them, they would realize that the students are not stupid, but thay understand little slower that others.<TR>Therefore</TR>, if teachers are paid according to the amount of what their students learn, they would not give up their studernts and try hard to teach better.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, it is fair to pay according to their students.</MI2> <SI2> If teachers are paid all same, some people would not teach their student hard. <EX><TR>For instance</TR>, in my school, there are two physical education teachers and every teacher paid all same. On of them is my P.E teacher and he does not teach well. he always appear in class lately and do not teach us but usually just let us to play sports. <TR>However</TR>, another P.E teacher in my school teach students hard and the difference in grade between my class and others classes is big.My class students want to learn from another teacher but it is impossible.</EX> <TR>As seen in the example</TR>, if teachersare paid all same, some people would try not to teach efficiently and just let students play in classroom.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I strongly believe that paying teachers according to their students learn stimulates them to teach better and it is fair for them. Although most of the teachers try to teach students hard but to prevent some teachers who do not teach well, teachers shouldbe paid accoring to how much their students learn.</CO>

Some people say visiting museums increase their knowledge while other think it is just for fon. Although there are many reasonable reasons, in my point of view, people go museums to learn other countries' history and culture and to see famous pictures.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, museums provide lots of information about their countries.</MI1> <SI1> So when people visit museums, they could realize unique history and culture of their own country.<EX><TR>For instance</TR>, one of my friends visited India during summer vacation, she told me that the first place where she visited was museum. The reason why she visited it fist is that museums provide many important things about Indina such as famous art pictures, artifacts and so on. Though their ancestors remains, she could learn about India's history and though pictures or sculptures, she couldlearn about its culture.</EX> <TR>Like this</TR>, museums are one of the best place where people can studyother countries' history and culture.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, visiting museums provide the chance to see famous art collection.</MI2> <SI2> <EX> For example, when I visited France, I went the Louvre museum to see the Mona Lisa which was drawn by Leonardo da Vinci.</EX> Many people know about Mona Lisa and see in the books but since I live in Korea, it is hard to see the real picture.<TR>However</TR>, visiting museum made me to see real Mona Lisa picture and I am proud of my self that I saw it. As seen in this example, visiting museums increase my experience and chance to see famous art collection in all over the world.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I strongly believe that visiting museums when people travel to other countries is not waste time because visiting museums provide the chance to learn about their history and culture and see famous gallery. For the following reasons, people go museums during their trips.</CO>

column1: 624&Some people think that children should begin their formal education at a very early age and should spend most of their time on school studies. Others believe that young children should spen most of their time playing. Compare these two view. Which view do you agree with? Why?
column3: <IN><TS>Children have curiousity since they are young and want to learn reading, calculating, speaking and so on. Some people say that children should play a lot because early school studies can make children lose their interest in study while others think that starting study at the early time is helpful for them. Although these two different opinions are both reasonable, in my point of view, to take advantage of these natual born curiousity, children should start their edcation early.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>On the one hand</TR>, people believe that early education could take away children's interest in study.</MI1> <SI1> They think children should learn through playing. During playing various games with their friends and their parents, they could learn cooperation ship and freindship between their friends. <TR>Also</TR>, through playing with their parants, parants could teach words and math not intensionally. Then children could learn new words and calculation with fun.If children only spend their most of time in studying, they could lost their interest in study easily and they could reject studying when they grow up as student. It would leave serious problem for them.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, Some people think that early education is really important to children.</MI2> <SI2> Young children like to learn various things such as the name of things and how to calculate things and so on. If children could study at this period, they could learn efficiently because they want to learn something. <TR>Also</TR>, children who have a good habit in study since they were young, they could sustain their good habits until they die. <TR>However</TR>, for children who is always playing it is hard to start study because they do not know how to study.<TR>Therefore</TR>, if children try to study when they already reach as students, who have to study a lot, it would hard and difficult to begin study at first.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, There are both advantages and disadvantages in early education for children, <TR>however</TR>, I think early study could fulfill the curiousity of children and could make good study habits. <TR>Nowaday</TR>, since education for children become a big arguement, people should think about the way to improve the education more efficiently.</CO>

column1: 627&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics.
column3: <IN>There is much debate over whethere studying history and literature is more important than that of science and mathematics or not. Some people point out that learning science and mathematics is more significant than that of history and literature to improve ecomomy and to get better society in physical situations. Others, however, maintain that history and literature are more important in many reasons. <TS>I believe that learning history and literature is more significant than that of science and mathmetics in that studying history makes us see back as a mirror and reflect the way our ancestors kept track of every moment as well as studying literature is to feed our spirit.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Studying history provieds us with seeing back as a mirror and reflects the way our fathors and mothers have trailed.</MI1> <SI1> Without information of history, we can have only a shallow understanding of what is going on in the future. It is easy to predict future when we know history or past of which our ancestors have kept. When we know that the Korean war brought in 1950 due to the gap of ideology between democricism and socialism, we could search for the way to reduce the gap.<TR>Likewise</TR>, when we are basic on our history, we realize where to go and what to do in the future.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Studying literature is to feed our spirit.</MI2> <SI2> People talk about a crisis of spirit in our country which is various and very complicated. The more a society is elaborate, the more we feel lonely and solitary. To get fertile life, I try to read many kinds of books to feel happy and to learn a variety of feelings such as respect, empathy, and senses thoughout my life.It was difficult, however, for students to understand wide and elebrate world, because I do not have good understanding of settings of history and the mood of the period at the moment. After I learned the famous novel The Scalet Letter written by Nadaneil Hothorn at school, I could feel what real love is.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I totally agree that studying history and literature is more important than that of science and mathmetics in that history gives us the way we have to abandern or abide by as well as help us feed our spirit such as respect, empathy for the other to foster sociable abilities, and all kinds of senses to get rich life. We should not forget that the past is mirror in the future. That is why we have to learn history and literature.</CO>

column3: <IN><TS>Some people say that advertising encourages us to buy thing we really do not need and others have an opposite opinion that says advertising tell us about new products that may improve our lives. <TR>However</TR>, I basically agree with the opinion that says we purchase useless things because of advertisements. There are a couple of reasons why I think advertisements are not helpful: exaggeration and waste of time.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, most advertisements exaggerate their products.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Generally</TR>, people do not suspect that what they see in many advertisement except for some advertisement which do not make sense. Even though they had already seen many exaggerated advertisement before, people are surprised of some fresh products, overstated by publicity, and led to buy them. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, my mother used to look up the shopping channel on television.</EX> Every time amazing things come up, she hesitated to buy them, without any doubts about overstating, and bought some of them. Among the products that she bought, there¡¯s nothing left which she uses now. <TR>Thus</TR>, we need to know that there are only few things which work just like what we from their advertising.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Another reason is that looking up advertisements just results waste of time.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Generally</TR>, not only house keepers watch advertising channel or program on television. Having no purpose, many people see advertisements on their free time. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, I used to put the shopping channel on television when I had found nothing interest on other channels.</EX>If I think about what I had seen on that channel, I can¡¯t remember any of them. I just want to say that I was led to waste the time by advertisements. From my experience, I can say that real useful products can be famous between people without any exaggerated advertisements.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, people have different ideas on use of advertisements. <TR>However</TR>, I am in favor of the idea that we are encouraged to buy useless things by advertisements. column1: 631&Many people visit museums when they travel to new places. Why do you think people visit museums? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>These days, many people visit museums when they travel to new places. <TS>There might be a lot of reasons people prefer to visit museums. I believe people would like to visit museums, because they are able to figure out the culture and history of the residents living in the places where they want to travel.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>More than anything else, visiting museums allows us to know well about the culture of people living in the place where we want to travel.</MI1> <SI1> <TR>In most cases</TR>, we only have very short period of time, for example, during summer break or holidays when we plan to travel to some places. We do not have enough time to travel every place to understand the culture of people who live in the place. <TR>However</TR>, in the museum, there are acumulated resources through which we can learn their culture.<TR>In fact</TR>, I traveled to Paris a few years ago. If I had not visited the Louvre Museum during the trip, I could not have understand France and French people better.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, visiting museums gives us good knowledge about the history of the places we would like to travel.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Of course</TR>. we might understand the places through books or brochures which introduce the places to travelers. <TR>However</TR>, in the museums, there are various tools which the residents have used for a long time.We can figure out their history easily only through walking around the museums for a few hours.</SI2></BO2><CO>To make a long story short, there is no better place than museums in understanding the culture and history of the residents living in the places we want to travel. I believe many people might agree with my opinion in the reasons I mentioned above.</CO>

column1: 632&A company has announced that it wished to build a large factory near your community. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this new influence on your community; Do you support or oppose the factory? Explain your position.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Today</TR>, factories often bring many advantages to our community, such as jobs and developments of economy. Some people agree with the idea about the benefits of building factories; others may argue that factories bring smog and pollution of the water and air. However fundamentally I oppose the plan to build a new large factory near our community. They destroy environment and make a traffic problem. This is the reason why I object to build factories near my city. Through the use of a couple of examples and specific explanation, I will demonstrate why I think it like that.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else</TR>, a large factory makes pollution, both the air and water in town.</MI1> <SI1> If the environment were destroyed, people¡¯s health and nature will be affected. When I was young, there is a pond, called Sajic-Ho, in my town. Many fishes were there, and many people took a walk in the place.<TR>However after the factory</TR>, Sam-Tang, was founded near the stream, no one could see a fish any longer. <TR>Finally</TR>, the pond was disappeared. Making a big factory hurt the nature where people live.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, they bring a traffic problem. If a company build a factory, it could be followed by many cars.</MI2> <SI2> I know a town where many factories were built near our city. There is a dreadful traffic jam in the Monday morning and Saturday evening.People who have lived in the city say that they always feel so uncomfortable because of that. I¡¯m sure that building a factory in our community has a disadvantage caused by cars.</SI2></BO2><CO>To make a long story short, no one denies the fact that factories may give special advantages to the community. <TR>Nevertheless</TR>, I strongly opposite a plan to build a factory near our city. They bring a pollution problem and many cars making a traffic jam. If people give much thought to negative effects of factories, most people would agree with my opinion.</CO>

column1: 634&Some high schools require all students to wear school uniforms. Other high schools permit students to decide what to wear to school. Which of these two school policies do you think is better? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>These days</TR>, a lot of high schools require their students to wear school uniforms. Some people might be in favor of these school policy; others might oppose to them, and high schools permit their students to decide what to wear to school. Each has its own advantages and disadvantages, but I believe that requiring all students to wear school uniforms has better than permitting them to decide what to wear at the school.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else</TR>, wearing school uniforms gives students the feeling of unity.</MI1> <SI1> Through school uniforms, students feel the feeling that they belong to their high school.They might be proud of their high school, and they are able to make friends with classmates more easily.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, students don't have to be worry about what to wear to school every day.</MI2> <SI2> They have only to wear their school uniform every morning. These might be possible for themselves to concentrate their studying more. <TR>Especiallym</TR>, the students whose parents are not rich are very wory about what they have to wear to school.<TR>In fact</TR>, when I was in high school, school uniform policy was abolished at once and I had to wear other clothes to go to school. I was very concerned about what to wear that time.</SI2></BO2><CO>To make a long story short, some people maybe oppose the school uniform policy, but I believe that the policy has a lot of advantages such as the feeling of unity and improving concentration on their study. I think many people don't deny the advantages that I mentioned above.</CO>

We can learn old fashion of architecture and ancestors' lifestyles.It will be useful for children who should know and experience our historical resources for their study.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, a city can earn money from its old and historic buildings.</MI2> <SI2> Many foreigners like to see a city's old buildings in order to know the city's characteristics and the citizens' lifestyles. If a city develops its old buildings, they would be magnificent products and would bear great amount of money.<TR>Then</TR>, a city can invest the money to build some new buildings if they are needed.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To top it off</TR>, preserving old and historic buildings will be more beneficial for a city. They can be valuable historical resources for citizens, especially for youngsters, and a city will be able to earn a lot of money from them if it develops them as sightseeing products for foreigners. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I think a city which has old and historic buildings should try to conserve them with every effort.</CO>

column1: 636&Classmates are a more important influence than parents are on a child's success in school. Do you agree or disagree with this statement? Support your answer using specific reasons and examples.
column3: <IN><TS>Both classmates and parents are really important factors on a child's success in school. They influence a child's thoughts and behaviors in school a lot. But in my opinion, classmates are more important influence on a child's success in school than parents are. I'd like to write why I think so by using specific reasons and my experiences.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, a child's classmates share actual interests and experience them with a child.</MI1> <SI1> When I was in school, I usually talked about my interests - cartoons, TV shows and pets - with my classmates.And talking with friends was one of the most important part on my school life.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, people who knows a child's school life in details best are his/her classmates, not his/her parents.</MI2> <SI2> It is because a child spends most of his/her school day with his/her classmates. <TR>Therefore</TR>, classmates can be aware of a child's merits and drawbacks and can advise him/her in many aspects.<TR>In my case</TR>, when I had problems related to school life, the adviser were usually my classmates, not parents - because my classmates know my life in school best.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To recap it</TR>, a child's classmates are a more important factor than parents are on a child's success in school. Because they share actual interests and really experience them with a child, and they know a child's school life best. <TR>Therefore</TR>, one in school should cherishes his/her classmate with trust and love. They are the most important influence in one's success in school.</CO>
column23: This is an average quality essay. It isn't clear why the author asks more of a question than a statement for the thesis statement it is fairly weak. There were some nice points and examples.

column1: 637&Business should hire emplyees for their entire lives. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>Only a few decades ago people believed that they would enter a certain company and retire from the same company. <TR>However</TR>, nowadays there is less chance to hire employees for their entire lives because business environment has changed so fast that new and innovative people have always been needed. <TS>But I think people should be hired for their entire lives because there should be a loyalty of employees in a company and because co-workers' bond should be needed to accomplish the mission in the company.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>If people bear in mind that they will be fired someday, people cannot have any loyalty to their company.</MI1> <SI1> Such a disloyalty to a company brings stress and lack of efficiency in their work. Employees will always find their will-be jobs in case of being fired from their present jobs and it will be very hard for them to concentrate on their works. <TR>Futhermore</TR>, they might provide the other competitives of their company with the important plan or the top secret so that it does much harm to the company.If business hires employees for their entire lives, however, they will regard their company as their home and will be willing to work harder for their company.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, hiring them for their entire lives is sure to help co-workers' bond promoting.</MI2> <SI2> Without their bond, which is mind of cooperationship, workers might not believe each other and it will affect the effiency of the work because they can think each other as just competitives. <TR>However</TR>, if business hire employeees for their entire lives, they will think each other as kinds of family members and it will be more comfortable for them to work than they think themselves as competitives.<TR>As we know</TR>, Japan is the most distinguishable country to succeed with this program which is eternal employment program. Japanese normally think they should give a loyalty to a company and should try their best.</SI2></BO2><CO>Though business have their rights to hire and fire their employees, it should hire employees for their entire lives. <TR>With it</TR>, people will not lose their loyalty to their company and the bond of co-workers will promote the efficiency of work. Like japan, which is one of the most prosperous countries, business should ensure their employees to work till they retire for their own as well as their workers.</CO>
column23: This is an above average quality essay. The thesis was well thought and written as were the examples.

column1: 638&Some students prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>It is known to be true that it is pretty significant to find one's own way between studying alone and studying with a group oif students. I prefer to study with others, because I can exchange opinions with members, because I can get more infomation concerning what I study, and the motivation to study is raised.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, If I study with others it is possible to change the opinons about the study with other members.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, let's suppose that I'm faced to a problem that is pretty hard to solve alone. Then I can question it with others if I am participated in a study group.</EX>I am sure that this will help me to study.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, I can more information about the study if I study with others.</MI2> <SI2> Because usually everyone has different information about a study, we can exchange one another what we know.<EX><TR>For example</TR>, right now, I am studying TOEFL with my friends.</EX> So I knew that this exam is going to change soon and that it is possible to change the time of the test if I am in a stuation difficult to take the test.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Last but not least</TR>, the motivation will be incresed if I do study with a group of people.</MI3> <SI3><TR>For instance</TR>, normally I do not study much when I am alone. <TR>However</TR>, I do study pretty much to raise the score of TOEFL, since I study with my friends. And also a statistics of English Newspaper of Seoul National University says that 87% of students have experienced to get a study group and that 76% of these students asserted study group took s part in raising a score. So I can say that studying together helps me to study more and gives me a motivation to study.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I prefer to study with a group of members, since I can exchange the opinions, since I'm able to get more information, and since the motivation to study is raised. With these reasons, I prefer to study with others. I'm sure that studying with other people will help me out to make long the studying time and raise the effiencies to study.</CO>

column1: 639&Would you hire an inexperienced worker at a lower salary or an experienced worker at a higher salary if you are an employer? Support your answer using specific reasons and details.
column3: <IN><TS>Hiring good employees is a very important factors on business. <TR>Thus</TR>, when an employer hire a worker, he/she should deeply consider the advantages and disadvantages of both hiring an inexperienced worker at a lower salary and hiring an experienced worker at a higher salary. <TR>In my opinion</TR>, hiring an experienced worker at a higher salary is the best choice for an employer. I'd like to write down why I think so by using specific reasons and some examples.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else</TR>, an experienced worker seldom makes mistakes when he/she works. If you hire an inexperienced worker who makes mistakes many times, you would have to spend extra money.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Besides</TR>, making mistakes can reduces the whole employees' working rate so that a work will be inefficient.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, an experienced worker is very helpful when a problem related to the work occurs.</MI2> <SI2> Because he/she must be a specialist in the field, you need not be concerned with small problems or accidents happened in the work.In case of my father who is a host of a small restaurant, when a small problem related to a kitchen machine happened, inexperienced workers were of no use. So he had to call a specialist and spent money</SI2></BO2>. <CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, hiring an experienced worker at a higher salary will be more beneficial for an employer. He/She seldom makes mistakes so that the work will be very efficient, and he/she will be helpful when a problem related to the work occurs. Of course reducing budget by hiring an inexperienced worker at lower salary is important. <TR>However</TR>, I think a continuous flow of the work by experienced workers and the success of the work will be much more significant.</CO>
column23: This is a below average quality essay. There are not enough transitions for this length of an essay. There was a good effort to give quality points and examples throughout.

column1: 640&Many students are assigned homework every day. do you think that daily homework is necessary for students? Support your answer using specific reasons and details.
column3: <IN><TS>Most schools assign homework to students. Some people agree with the policy while others do not. There are advantages and disadvantages to each opinion. I think that homework is necessary for students, and in this essay, I will discuss the reason why I believe this.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, most school works need time to review them.</MI1> <SI1> <TR>Usually</TR>, it is very hard for students to totally understand what they learned when they only concentrate in the class. Homeworks give students time to review what they learned and the efficiency of education will increases.<TR>In my case</TR>, I got a better grade in the subject which had assigned homework than in the subject which had not assigned homework.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, homework is indispensable because it is sometimes an extra work which is not finished in the class.</MI2> <SI2> It is hard for teachers or lecturers that teaching all things that they plan to in the class. <TR>Thus</TR>, they assign an extra work as a form of homework to students.<TR>So</TR>, if there's no homework, students may lose the chance of studying full lecture of the teachers.</SI2></BO2><CO>To make a long story short, homework is necessary because it gives students chance to review the lecture, and learn the full lecture the teacher intended. Although the homework can cut down your free time, if you want to absorb the whole lecture and get a good grade in the subject it would be indispensable.</CO>

column1: 641&Some people believe that students should be given one long vacation each year. Others believe that students should have several short vacations throughout the year. Which viewpoint do you agree with? Use specific reasons and examples to support your choice.
column3: <IN><TS>I'm a high school student. And this topic seems to be very familiar with me, so I'd like to give my opinion with some detail examples I got through at school.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Through the vacation</TR>, we can learn about and experience many things that we probably couldn't do during the semester.</MI1> <SI1> Lot of things we want to learn, but usually we can't because of lack of time and maybe, due to exam or homework at school.So a vacation is quite necessary. Vacation provides us not only the time but also gives a lot of opportunity to experience something new and also useful for us, as I mentioned before.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>But</TR>, if the vacation is not very long, these time and chances will be less and we may feel that it's not very much different from "holiday" - We don't have to go to school at holiday, but we can't do something else because it's too short.</MI2> <SI2> And if there is a several short vacations throughout the year, we may not be able to concentrate on schoolwork, and so on vacation because of this "periodical" break.I think this is rather a waste of time than the efficient use of vacation.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>In contrast</TR>, if we have only one vacation but it's properly long, it will be a good chances to expand our knowledge or ability through many helpful activities - such as sports, taking a trip, studying foreign languages, reading many books, etc. If time is enough we can forget about school at least during the vacation, and this is much efficient that several short vacations</MI3>. <SI3>And when vacation is over, we can concentrate on school and learn many things again at school that we couldn't during the vacation.</SI3></BO3><CO>Since it is pretty much efficient in educational aspect for many reasons I supported, I agree with the former statement, which states that students should be given one long vacation each year.</CO>

column1: 645&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Throughout our lives, we will have many opportunities to learn many different sources. As newborn babies, we must learn to develop our natural instincts in socially acceptable ways to be fed and cared for. <TS><TR>Thus</TR>, as young children, we depend upon our parents to teach us the basic tools of survival. Whereas our parents can't be the best teachers any more, as we get older. so I do not agree that parents are always the best teachers. <TR>Indeed</TR>, all parents also would not be ideal teacher.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Everyone agrees that parents should undertake responsibility for their and that parents are in the best position to know what their children need.</MI1> <SI1>They also know what sorts of things their children should learn. For teenagers, <TR>However</TR>, parents can't be knowledgeable about thier children need any more. <EXX>For example, highschool students in korea spend a lot of hours everyday in school and private institution. They have no time to talk thier parents.</EX> <TR>Therefore</TR>, they eventually turn to teachers and friends in school to learn other life lessons.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, children learn to abuse their spouse and children and hate others by watching and imitating the behaviors they see from thier parents.</MI2> <SI2> Many people agree that the parents abusing children and spouse has the same experience.Because there are so many cases like this, it is important that other members of society lend their support in teaching children.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary</TR>, parents generally should take responsibility and be the best teachers. so it is easy for society to place the responsibility of teaching children on the parents. but society should be prepared when the parents can't be the proper teachers. It's not enough for society to place the responsibility to children's parents without any support.</CO>

column1: 648&Schools should ask students to evaluate their teachers. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.

Some say schools ask students to evaluate their teachers. <TR>Pesonally</TR>, I have the opinion that students have the right which assess their teachers because of giving teachers incentives to work eagerly and improving the quality of education.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In my opinion</TR>, by evaluating teachers, we can cause teachers' competetion and passion.</MI1> <SI1> In order to gain better valuation, they will prepare more materials for classes and have concerns regarding their students. When I was a highschool student, I always used to complain my geology teacher to my friends. <TR>Especially</TR>, in understanding the theory of plate tectonics, I had hard time and difficulties due to lack of background knowledge.Although I asked my geology teacher data or extroadinary description, he only told that reference books would give what I want without any sincerity. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I suggest that teachers are appraised by their students strictly when it comes to enthusiasm.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, we are able to enhance the standard of education from assessing teachers.</MI2> <SI2> That is, students will exempt incompetent and lazy teachers. column1: 649&Some people think that the automobile has improved modern life, but other people think that the automobile has caused serious problems. What is your opinion? Support your answer using specific reasons and examples.
column3: <IN><TS>The automobile affects our life on many aspects. Some people agree that the automobile has improved modern life. <TR>However</TR>, there are some other people who insist that it has caused many serious problems. I agree with the former opinion, and in this essay, I will discuss why I believe that</IN></TS>. <BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else</TR>, the automobile has alleviated the time to move from one place to another.</MI1> <SI1> When the automobile was not invented, it takes plenty of time to move compare to recent days. <TR>For instance</TR>, my grandmother, who had lived in Kang-won Do when she was young, said that it had taken several days to go to Seoul on foot.But it takes only a few hours to go now. I saw that new kinds of equipment had been introduced every time the new car model have been released.</SI2><.BO2><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, I agree with the opinion that the automobile has improved modern life because it has alleviated the moving time, and it has caused the development of related technologies which are very useful in modern life. If we have proper concerns about the automobile and related equipments, it will really play a key role for the future.</CO>

column1: 651&Do you agree or disagree with foloowing statement? Reading fiction is more enjoyable than watching movies.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Recently</TR>, many people enfoy watching movies becausee there are a lot of theaters. Some people believe that watching movei is more enjoyable but other people think that reading fiction is more enjoyable. <TR>As former</TR>, I believe that reading fiction is more enjoyable than watching movie because of the following reasons; firstly, I can imagine, secondly, I can interpret in diversity ways.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Above all</TR>, reading fiction make me imagine.</MI1> <SI1> About two years ago, When reading books, Harry Porter, I can imagine diverse things such as monsters, many kins of children and magicians. I have read the book with great interest. <TR>After that</TR>, I watched a movie, Harry Porter, because the book is so fun.But I'm disappointed. The movie is not as interest as the book. Lots of scenes are less interest than my imagination.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Besides</TR>, reading fiction make me think as my wishes.</MI2> <SI2> When reading the book, the Lord of Ring, I imagined as my likes, while watching the movie, the Lord of Ring, I couldn't imagine at my convenience because the movie was made by a director who has his own an angle of version. I can't interpret variously during wahtching movies.<TR>In contrast</TR>, I can interpret in various ways during reading fictions, which is so fun that I enjoy it.</SI2></BO2><CO>Although watching movie shows diversty things, I prefer to read fiction. I can have a lively imagination and interpret variety of ways through reading fiction. <TR>To sum up</TR>, I think that reading fiction is much more enjoyable than watching movie.</CO>
column23: This was an above average quality essay. The thesis was excellently written. There could have been a few more transitions to match its length. It was overall a very nice attempt, however.

column1: 652&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>A child is surely affected by his/her surroundings, and especially by the people who give him/her information. <TR>Therefore</TR>, a good teacher plays a key role for the success of the child. Some people thinks that parents are the best teachers for a child. <TR>Otherwise</TR>, there are some other people who disagree with the opinion. I totally agree that parents are the best teachers, and in this essay, I will discuss why I believe that.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else</TR>, parents know their child best.</MI1> <SI1> Parents know not only their child's merits but also drawbacks. <TR>Thus</TR>, a child's merits can be developed successfully, and his/her drawbacks can be cautioned.<TR>In my case</TR>, my parents know my bad habits more than anyone else and always tell me not to do so. It's very helpful for me.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, a child can learn whenever he/she wants and whatever he/she want to know from their parents.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>For instance</TR>, he/she could ask a question to their parents while having a meal with them. In school, it would be impossible to do so.<TR>Furthermore</TR>, parents always try to answer their child's questions related to any part. A child do not have to waste time to go to a teacher who is specialized to one part and ask what he/she doesn't know.</SI2></BO2><CO>To conclude, in my opinion, parents are the best teachers because they know their child best and they can answer any question at any time. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I think a child who has more time to contacts with their parents will take great advantages for their development than others.</CO>
column23: This essay has great structure and content but mainly has an issue with the thesis statement which is fragmented and spread throughout the introduction rather than being presented clearly, comprehensively in on short statement.

column1: 653& In some countries, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. Do you think this is a good idea? Support your opinion by using specific reasons and detailes.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>In some countries</TR>, teenagers have jobs while they are still students. <TR>However</TR>, in other countries teenagers do not have jobs while they are still students. This is an important issue to students, their parents, and other social members. They may agree or disagree that teenagers have jobs while they are still students. <TR>In my opinion</TR>, I don¡¯t think this is a good idea that teenagers have jobs while they are still students as the following specific reasons.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, if students have jobs, they have less time in studying.</MI1> <SI1> <TR>Especially</TR>, it is more serious problem in case of middle or high school students. In Korea, entering the collage is very difficult and stressful.It is depicted as battle or war. In this social mood, it is impossible that students have jobs while they are still students.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, teenagers may be revealed many dangerous situations.</MI2> <SI2> There not exist safety and easy jobs. Some jobs have dangerous or potential harmful factors to teenagers.They affect mental or physical sides of teenagers.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>Some people say that part-time-jobs give teenagers good social experiences. And, they also say that teenagers can have the independent mind</MI3>. <SI3><TR>However</TR>, there are more harmful sides than advantages for teenagers.</SI3></BO3><IN><TR>In the above reasons</TR>, I disagree that teenagers have jobs while they are still students. <TR>Also</TR>, it is not a good idea that teenagers have any part-time-jobs while they are still students.</IN>

column1: 654&When choosing a place to live, what do you consider most important : location,size,style,number of rooms,house amenities, other features? Use reasons and specific examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>When I choose a place to live, the most important is a location which my house is placed to.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>In maxim, it said to us "Humans was controled by his surroundings". If your house is located a place which is very dark, dirty and etc..., you coundn't feel the comfortance, the pleasure which is the most valuable of a house.</MI1> <SI1>maybe you seem to be unhappy and cruel.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, if you have a place to work or to study, this place must be near your house.</MI2> <SI2>otherwise it is obvious that it gives you another anxiety, far distance between your home and workplace.</SI2></BO2><CO>In summary , for selecting a place to live, there are many factors : location,size,style,number of rooms,house amenities,.... but as to say above, a good location is this most important in these factors.</CO>

column1: 655&Nowadays, food has become easier to prepare. Has this change improved the way people live? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>These days</TR>, it is easier to prepare food than before. Many people feel very convenient with it and insist that it has improved the way people live. <TR>However</TR>, there are some other people who oppose this opinion. I think that food that can be easily prepared has surely improved people's live and I will demonstrate why I believe that.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, people can save their time through food that can be easily prepared. When food that can be easily prepared does not released, sometimes it takes longer time to prepare food that to have it.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Therefore</TR>, it does not fit very well with busy modern workers and housewives.<TR>In case of my mother</TR>, she is very satisfied with easily-prepared food because it alleviates housework time so she can use the saved time for relaxing or doing another work.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, people in modern society can have the meal at any place they want.</MI2> <SI2>Because nowadays food has become easier to prepare and it does not need detailed implements, people can easily eat food even at their work. It can increase their work efficiency. I sometimes have food at work and everytime I have it, I really feel comfortable with food which can be prepared easily.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In summary</TR>, nowadays people feel very convenient with easily-prepared food because it saves time to prepare the meal and it can be easily cooked and eaten wherever people want. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I think that food that can be easily prepared is indispensible for people in modern society and really improved the way they live.</CO>
column23: This essay has great structure and content but mainly has an issue with the thesis statement which is fragmented and spread throughout the introduction rather than being presented clearly, comprehensively in on short statement.

column1: 656& It has been said, "Not everything that is learned is contained in books." Compare and contrast knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion, which source is more important? Why?
column3: <IN><TR>Generally</TR>, books are regarded as a good source of knowledge. <TR>However</TR>, there are some people who insist that not everything that is learned is contained in books. <TS>They prefer experience as a great source of knowledge than books. <TR>Of course</TR>, both books and experiences give us a lot of information. But I think live experience is more important for a person than books and I'll discuss why I believe that.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else</TR>, people can gain more detail knowledge from their experience.</MI1> <SI1> Although books give people a lot of information, it is a only general one and does not cover a large varieties. <TR>For that reason</TR>, the information that people get from experience would be really valuable for the same specific plight they may experience again. When I first went camping, I was very poor at doing everything even though I have read some books about camping and memorized plenty of information.<TR>However</TR>, after my first experience, I became very good at doing everything because I have really experienced the detail environment. I thought it was because there were only general knowledge in the books.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, experience can remain in our mind longer.</MI2> <SI2> It is true that we forget much information which was gained from books. But knowledge gained from experience is seldom forgotten.<TR>For instance</TR>, I didn't forget the experience that I went to Jeju-Do and saw many beautiful plants 8 years ago.</SI2><BO2><CO><TR>To conclude</TR>, knowledge gained from experience is more important for a person. He/she can gain more detail knowledge from his/her real experience and will not forget it easily. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I think having copious experience in life is really significant for a person.</CO>
column23: This is a very good and comprehensive essay that has great main and supporting points .It may be too long in some parts however as the body paragraphs overshadow the introduction and conclusions.

column1: 657&Many people have a close relationship with their pets. These people treat their birds, cats, or other animals as members of their family. In your opinion, are such relationship good? Why? Or why not? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Many people have a close relationship with their pets. <TS>These people treat their pets - birds, cats, or other animals - as members of their family. In my opinion this relationship between people and their pets is good.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>There are some people who live alone without any family.<MI1> <SI1> <TR>For instance</TR>, they are divorced men or women, oÀÌ-aged people or other sole people and so on. They spend almost all of their time alone at home. They sometimes feel lonely.<TR>And</TR>, they sometimes want certain friends who talk with them. In this situation, pets become their friends or family.</SI1></BO1><BO2><TR>According to recent research</TR>, kids who have a close relationship with pets can have lovely emotion and warm heart.</BO2><BO3><MI3>Pets never betray their owner.</MI3> <SI23> We can see and hear many dogs in the newspaper or magazines that save their owner¡¯s life and have great loyalty.People who live such as above animals are happy and are proud of them.</SI2></BO3><CO>As the above specific reasons, I have a good opinion about close relationship between people and their pets. If many people have a close relationship with their pets, their life will become happier than they do not.</CO>

column1: 658&It has been said, "Not everything that is learned is contained in books." Compare and contrast knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion, which source is more important? Why?
column3: <IN>Throughout entire life, people gain knowledge in many ways. We learn from books as well as experience. <TR>However</TR>, fundamentally experience provides many advantages that the books could not offer.<TS> Experience gives lively lessons, which wouldn¡¯t be forgot, and teaches friendship, community. This is the reason why I think knowledge from experience is more important than from books. Though the use of a couple of examples and specific explanation, I will demonstrate why I think it like that.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>More than anything else</TR>, we learn realistic and vivid knowledge from experience.</MI1> <SI1> <TR>Surely</TR>, books cannot give this function. When I was young, I feared to ride a bicycle because whenever I tried to take the bicycle, I always failed.<TR>But, finally</TR>, I could get the skill. Now I know that succeed from the fail made me to have confidence and the fail was experience. There is no book teaching it in the world. So I¡¯m sure that experience is the best teacher.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, the experience contributes on learning friendship and community.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>Of course</TR>, some books write about it for student. However it seem to be deficient. As an example of this, I know a man, So-Hyun, who always reads books. Even though he got a good grade in the school, he always could not adapt to new social life.Whenever I see him, I think that knowledge without experience is of no use. Experience can empower people to change their world.</SI2></BO2><CO>To make a long story short, no one denies the fact that knowledge from books may give special advantages to the man. <TR>Nevertheless</TR>, I strongly believed that experience present more many benefits than books. People get lively knowledge, community life and friendship from experience. If people give much thought to negative effects of experience, most people would agree with my opinion.</CO>

column1: 659&Holidays honor people or events. If you could create a new holiday, what person or event would it honor and how would you want people to celebrate it? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>My country, Korea(RPK) was one of the conuntries that have more hollidays than others. However the government has been to decrease the number of the holidays recently to promote our economic development and become more competitive. <TS>Hangul-day, the day to celebrate our language - Hangul - , is one of the holidays that has lost its status as holidays. Although economic development is important, in my opinion it is also precious to regain our Hangul day as holiday in terms of its meaning to us and its preservation.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>In the world there are a small number of countries that have their own language, and we have one of those blessed countries.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Moreover</TR>, our language Hangul is allegedly one of the most unigue and scientific languages. <TR>Therefore</TR>, it is our precious culture treasure and thus we should think of it as precious as our own bobies. One of ways to express our respect of it is celebrating it by creating holiday.With this mathod we can continuously remind ourselvers of the importance of our language and enhance the self-esteem of the superiority of our culture.</SI1></BO1><CO>To celebrate Hangul day, I think we can make an essay contest that gives the prize to the one who use our language most beautifully and correctly. <TR>In addition</TR>, we can also make contest for a good calligraphy for Hangul. Those ways will be able to attract our people's interest to our language's beauty, and thus it will make our people regard our language more precious than before.</CO>
