column1: 738&It has recently been announced that a high school may be built in your community. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details in your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>I went to a high school that was located on out of my town so I had much trouble in attending and studying in school. In my opinion, there would be many advantages thruogh building a high school near my neighborhood. <TR>Thus</TR>, I support an idea of building a high school in my community.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Most of all</TR>, high school near their home makes high school students convienient to attend school.</MI1> <SI1>It enables to spend much time in concentrating on their study. <TR>For instance</TR>, it would lessen the commuting time. <TR>Needless to say</TR>, students can spend more time in studying rather than spending in a bus. Another example can be found in an extra class. It would enable to study in school much longer because they do not have difficulty in going back home even though at late night.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, it would help their parents with many ways.</MI2> <SI2><EX><TR>For example</TR>, students will not have to spend money as bus fare or transportation fees</EX>.The lessened amount of money would be a help to parents.<TR>Moreover</TR>, if a student forgot to bring one of his textbooks, parents could help to bring to his school, which was impossible because it is too long to go school.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Conclusively</TR>, a high school near my community would induces some benefits to my neighborhood. It would help students to concentrating on their study with lessening the comuting time to go school and making it possible to study during the extra class, especially at night. And it also would help parents in several ways. <TR>That is</TR>, amount of money that would be transportation fee would be lessened and they can bring a belong that their child forgot to bring to school.</CO>

column1: 739& Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People behave differently when they wear different clothes. Do you agree that different clothes influence the way people behave? Use specific examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TR>These days</TR>. many people wear clothes in different ways, customs and preferences. Also there are countless kinds of clothes. Some people think that clothings would change the owner¡¯s behavior but other didn¡¯t agree with that. <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, I assent with the former suggestion because the clothes reveal the person¡¯s social status and it restrict his or her activities.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>From the ancient, suits are stand for the social rank or identity.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, in a Indian tribe it is easy to indicate the chief form other tribesmen because his clothes are more flash</EX>. I know it is not always the same way in this time, but still clothes make people¡¯s social identify. In Korea, almost all middle school and high school students have to wear the uniforms. Therefore it is easy to identify that they are students. Also nurses or doctor has their own uniform so they are easily to separate. These ways make their behavior suitable to their positions. Like a doctor cannot behave like a hip hop singer or athletes because of his rank or social eyes. <TR>Therefore</TR> I think the clothes make people¡¯s actions proper while their clothes present their identity.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, the activities are restricted from clothes.</MI2> <SI2> <EX>For example it is very different when you wear a jogging suit or a formal dress</EX>. You can easy run or jump with the jogging suit but not with the formal thing. The extreme case is if you wear a skirt you can¡¯t jump or run and you behavior will change more careful than other times. Also dancers are wearing some spaceful clothes for their dance.<TR>For my case</TR>, I had my formal clothes on and had to attend a party. I was late for that and wanted to run there but the clothes that I wore was not convenient and when I arrived it was a wreck. After that I never run in formal suits. For these reasons the clothes make influence to their owner¡¯s conducts.</SI2></BO2><CO>In conclusion the identity and the activity that come from the clothes is one of the influential key point for the owners conducts. However I know some people they don¡¯t mind at their clothes and just do how they want. Hence in many cases the clothes will have a lot of influence and it will hardly to change. I am also in the clothes which the society¡¯s eyes are still open.</CO>

column1: 740&When people move to another country, some of them decide to follow the customs of the new country. Others prefer to keep their own customs. Compare these two choices. Which one do you prefer? Support your answer with specific details.
column3: <IN><TS>Although there are many different customs over the world, some people adapt quickly to the custom of a new country but others are not. The adaptative power of individuals differ from conditions. even though there are many factors which affect to observe their own customs or to follow the new customs, I think that the age and language of people are the most influential factors.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, younger people can quickly adapt to a new country.</MI1> <SI1>Because younger people have not fully accustomed to their own customs yet, they can easy to alter their own customs to the customs of a new country But older people have not only rooted in their own customs but also have more convenient to their own customs than those of other countries. <EX>My cousin's family emigrated from KOREA into U.S.A in 1988. I showed that sons of my cousin quickly more adapt than my cousin to the customs of a new country.</EX></SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, the children's have often chance to learn language in a new country.</MI2> <SI2>Children have many chances for learning language of a new country. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, school, language center, talking to many friends. But adults have no chance to learn language. Adults must have job and work hard to support living and have limited time for practicing language</EX>.<TR>Moreover</TR>, the research proved that because the brain of adults has less the learning ability of language than that of children, children can easily adapt to the customs of a new country.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I believe that people who want to make their home in a new country need to find a balance. They should keep the best of their native culture and adopt the good things that they find in their new country.</CO>

column3: <IN><TS>Spending most of my time with friends may be valuable and useful. But I do love to do something alone at home or outside.The reason is why I want to have enough time to learn or think for my developments and I want to be more independent and I don't want to be interrupted my freedom due to many friend's relationship.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>,I have to reserve time for myself as much as I can in young ages.</MI1> <S1>because I need to learn many things and upgrade my ability. <TR>In order to do</TR>, I need time to think myself and future. If I just spend precious time meeting with friends,my youth will be passed very fast in vain.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, spending much time with friends can make me rely on other people and I may be always to look for someone to help me whenever I am in trouble.</MI2> <SI2>If I lost the way in another country, I would have to try the best to find the way there rather than I call freinds or parents in Korea.</SI2></BO2> <BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR>,I always want to do as what I want to do,even though it sounds selfish.</MI3> <SI3>but if I spent most of time with freinds, I would have to follow as what they want and meet their preference. To mind something or someone can be much trouble. I may give up taking a trip to China in order to follow their favorite conutry,Italy.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>,I enjoy learning something, investing time and feel happy to live a free life and an independent life makes me come to reach. it's all obviously worth in any case.</CO>
column23: This is an average quality essay. The thesis is a fairly well written but is hung up on the fact that there is little supporting evidence given to bolster the conclusion.

column1: 744&Some students prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Getting a high score is a serious concern for most students. <TS>The style of studying is related to the subject score. Students' pattern to study is different from each person. some students prefer to study alone. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, others prefer to study with a group of students. I think that studying with other friends is more effective than studying alone in consider efficiency and difficult situation.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, students get knowledge more efficiently, when they study with a group of students.</MI1> <SI1>By studying together, they can share information about commonly concerned subjects. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, when I studied with a group of students in last semester, I could learn easily with taking little efforts</EX>. After my friends and I divided the chapter, we studied each section. and then we illustrate the section that each person studied. <TR>By doing this</TR>, we could get a lot of information quickly. <TR>In that reason</TR>, many students make groups every semester.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, group study member can help each other, when they have some problems.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>Sometimes</TR>, students feel depressed on account of severe stress about school grade. In that situation, the person who understand students is a close friend. Students can share problems with study group members.When I have serious problems, I talk to my friends who study together. Because they understand me well, my emotion become to calm. Just like me, many students get help from other group member who study together.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, students get important factors such as help and a lot of knowledge that make increase their subjects grade. When students study alone, they have difficulty to solve problems in certain situation since there are no one to help them. the reduction in studying and stable emotion would make a good effects on grade. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I think that studying together is the best way for students.</CO>
column23: This is an excellent essay. There is not only a strong balance in the thesis but also in the main and supporting units which act like a team together.

column1: 745&Some people think that the family is the most important influence on young adults. Other people think that friends are the most important influence on young adults. Which view do you agree with? Use examples to support your position.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Usually</TR>, young adult can easy to be effected by someone who are around him.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Both the his parents and His friend can influence on young adults.</MI1>. <SI1>I think that friends is more significant effect to young adoults. Because at that age, between friends they have their own common things such as girl friend problems or school grade. Also they spend a lot of time together in school or private institution, so they talk and share their own opinion. Under the same age, Between the friends have common and shared thing which can influence each other. <TR>At that age</TR>, they have their own world which cannot be interuped by their parents or teacher <EX><TR>For example</TR>, i can say a girl friend's problem. when we are in young adult age, every perception is verysesibility especailly interesting in opposite gender. They are curious about sexuality, but it is not easy to say to parents</EX>. <TR>However</TR>, they shared their thinking with their friend readily. By asking and adviseing each other, they are huge influence on other friends.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, they spend most of time together in a school, playgroung, library or even in home bycalling each other. Naturally they talk much about their privacy things, their school problems.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>Moreover</TR>,Because of spending time longer and longer together, their behavior can get more similar and similar. <TR>In my case</TR>, when i was in high school i always get along with my best friend who usually talk with stronggesture.Before i met her i never used gesture during talking , but the more i spend time with her,I'm very similar with her including her speaking habit, body gesture and etc. I think it is very common thing that closed friends can similar each other.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, Especailly young adult age can be most important influenced by their friends because,they can easily share their thinking and opinion that can influence on each other and they spend most of their time with friends. It is cacused that they sitmulate and become similar each other. I know that Parents also can huge effect to their young adult, but at that age, role of friends is most superb infffluence.</CO>

column1: 746&People learn in different ways. Some people learn by doing things; other people learn by reading about things; others learn by listening to people talk about things which of these methods of learning is best for you? Use specific examples to support your choice.
column3: <IN><TS>There are many ways of learning. Doing directly, reading, listening to one's opinion are main ways to learn about things. All these ways have their merits, however, I think without doing things by oneself, no one cannot be gotten. <TR>Thus</TR>, to learn something, you must do it. There is no way except it.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><EX>Here is an example. When people learn sports, without doing by themselves, they can't enjoy it.</EX></MI1> <SI1>People can learn about rules from reading and listening <TR>However</TR>, Only listening or reading are no use to learn playing. Nothing cannot replace of practical experience. This principle is applicable to other many activities.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Not only sports, but also knowledge based on intelligence have a certain dimension that can be mastered by experience.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>In the history</TR>, when Napoleon planned to conquer Russia across the Siberia, many scholars thought it would be possible, but he cannot stand coldness in Siberia.His failure is caused his ignorance about it because he didn't go through it before the war. This story gives us the lessen that experience is the most precious knowledge.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>As an age is changing, a person of deeds is being in the spotlight.</MI3> <SI3><TR>In the past</TR>, it is thought that knowledge from books and others' words gives the most valuable lessen to live. <TR>But for now</TR>, practical experience is more important than them. A case in point involves the phenomena that the person who graduate a junior college is more preferred than elite from illustrious university in a test for service in a company.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, reading and listening to others are also important to learn things. But I think that doing things is the best way to reduce a mistake because of the trend of society, lesson from historic event, and my inclination. <TR>To individuals</TR>, what methods of learning they choose depends on their inclination, however, they must consider what society want.</CO>

column1: 747&¡°When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing to do with success.¡± Do you agree or disagree with the quotation above? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your position.
column3: <IN><TS>Some people say when people succeed, it is because of hard work while others argue that people¡¯s succeed is depend on their own luck. Of these two assertion, I agree with the statement that people¡¯s succed is not lucky but a fruit of their hardship and their effort. I will demonstrate my opinion through the use of a couple of reasons.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>There is a proverb ¡°God helps those who help themselves¡±. This proverb means even though a lucky person, there is no success without his own effort.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, when I was third grade in highschool, one of my friend was always the first grade of term exam</EX>. I thought that my friend is a very lucky person. Because he did not study hard during the exam period. <TR>One day</TR>, another friend of mine told me that he saw the friend who always the first in the library. <TR>Then</TR>, I realized that why he always did a great job in the exam. <TR>For the fist time</TR>, I¡¯m aware of the value of effort and from that time I did a good job in the exam because of not lucky but my own effort. In this manner, success is the fruit of blood-and-tears endeavor..</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Another reason is can founded through the story of Thomas Edison.</MI2> <SI2>He always interested in invention, but he always fail in his experiment. <TR>Nevertheless</TR>, he always fail, but he did not give up easily. The more his experiment fail, The stronger his passion for experiment. <TR></TR>For this very reason, he succeeded in his experiment.If there was no interest and effort, there was no luck and success. Lucky is follows the person who has continuous interest and endeavor in his or her field or study.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, a good luck Is important role in success. But, the luck is only a small part of success in life. If the people have their own dream and make every effort to accomplish that, I have no doubt that the luck is naturally follows them.</CO>

column1: 748&You have received a gift of money. The money is enough to buy either a piece of jewelry you like or tickets to a concert you want to attend. Which would you buy? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>To have a piece of jewelry and to attend a concert both have advantages seperately.<TS> It is difficult to choose between them, but I will go to a concert without hesistate. Not only do I like go to a concert better than to adorn myself, but a concert also has additional advantages.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I can buy a piece of same jewelry that I like another time, while it could be once in a life time chance to attend a concer.</MI1> <SI1>In my case, I had an experiences of missing a concert of Kim, Gwang Suk, a Korean well known singer. <TR>After that concert</TR>, he died so I cannot attend his concert anymore. Even though it is possible to make same jewelry anytime, the past time would not come again.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Furthermore</TR>, I can have fun with singing and dancing together in a concert hall.</MI2> <SI2>It is difficult to sing or dance by myself because I am a shy guy, but the concert enables to dance and sing a song. <TR>Besides</TR>, I can take a picture of a singer and it will remain longer. <TR>That is to say</TR>, the memory of participating a concert that I really wanted to attend would be unforgettable memory.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In short</TR>, although it is difficult to make a right decision between two choices, to buy a piece of jewelry or to attend a concert, to me, I would attend a concert without hesitate. The concert might give joy and also the memory of attending that concert would be great.I can also share my memory with friend through pictures that are taken in a concert. <TR>Thus</TR>, I would choose to go a concert that I really wanted to attend.</CO>

column1: 749&Some people prefer to spend time with one or two close friends. Others choose to spend time with a large number of friends. Compare the advantages of each choice. Which of these two ways of spending time do you prefer? Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>People spend a lot of time with their friends. They are sometimes with one or two close friends because of talking about their worry. They sometimes discuss about some issue with many friends. Both of them have advantages. <TR>However</TR>, I prefer to spend time with a large number of friends for broader human network and hearing various opinions.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, spending time with one or two friends make one's relationship deeper.</MI1> <SI1>One with one or two friends can also share secrets. They might be more familiar because they have an opportunity to be together and have a lot of time to communicate with each other. <TR>For instance</TR>, <EX>my younger sister like to be one or two friends and spend many time to talk one friend. She sometimes share secrets. Her friend listens to the story very carefully as hers and my sister finds a solution.</EX> <TR>Thus</TR>, people liking to spend time with one or two friends make deep human relationship and relieve their suffering through the taking with their close friend.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, spending time with a lot of friends enlarge my human network and many friends can provide various opinions about some issue.</MI2> <SI2> When I organize a study group, I try to collect many people. The reason is that I am able to know people in various parts and they offer me various thoughts. It can be a big help to me because my major is very different from it and it is very difficult for me to come up with the thought.<TR>Therefore</TR>, a lot of friends make me broader human relationship and I can learn various knowledge. <CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, staying with one or two friends can shape deep human relationship and relieve my worry. Being with a lot of friends can broad my human network and learn more knowledge. I prefer to be a lot of friends in that I can meet more friends and they can advise me in various view. I think that many friends give me help in various parts.</CO>

column1: 750&A gift(such as a camera, a soccer ball, or an animal) can contribute to a child's development. What gift would you give to help a child develop? Why? Use reasons and specific examples to support your choice.
column3: <IN><TS>Among such a variety kinds of gifts kids like, I think lego satisfies all of the conditions that toys should have. It develops children's creativity, helps them learn patience and provides them with a sense of fulfillment.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, since there are no set of rules in assembling the blocks except for a model design, children can make whatever they want and make stories from their imagination.</MI1> <SI1>Compared to many other toys which are already made, I believe lego activates their brains in the process of making it. <TR>In the long run</TR>, kids will probably be accustomed to making things flexibly within limited stuffs.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, there are many levels of lego which everyone can enjoy from toddlers to young adults and usually with smaller and more blocks that consist of, it gets harder and more complicated to completely assemble them all.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Of course</TR> that means a considerable amount of time is needed for people to sit and concentrate on.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, after hours of hard work and effort, a fully self-made product will come out with a satisfactory expression on a kid's face.</MI3> <SI3>I remember when I completed one of my piece of arts, I proudly displayed on my desk and showed to my family bragging about how hard it had been to make it.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, as our life gets more digitalized, kids mostly tend to play computer games during their free time. I guess maybe, it is possible that there is even a computer program which we can virtually build lego blocks on the computer screen. Everything has its bad and good sides, but it will surely be different with the feelings of analogue way with which we can actually touch and smell.</CO>

column1: 751&Some people prefer to study alone. Others prefer to study with a group of students. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Which do you prefer between studying alone and studying with your partners? <TS>Some people say that they prefer to study alone, because they can concentrate on the study when alone. They don't like to be disturbed by other people. Others say they could have more effects when they study with a group of people. In my opinion, it depends on the situation or the kind of the study and it is related with the personality of the learners.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, in case practicing speaking skill of other languages, we should study with other people.</MI1> <SI1>To learn the foreign language, we should use many expressions and should try to make an effort in expressing the idea. By realizing the wrong expressions, we can be a more fluent speaker of foreign language. <TR>Like this</TR>, other people who study with me are very helpful for me, because by hearing them speak, we can catch the wrong expressions or we can learn more about better expressions they speak.</SI1></BO1> <BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, in case of the study that needs some concentration on it, we should study alone. A few years ago, I took the philosophy course "Kant" in my university.</MI2> <SI2>The delicate explanation of the professor was very helpful for me to understand the idea of Kant. But I realized that I would need some time to think over it. So I read Kant and I started to think about alone why Kant threw the questions about our life and art that ordinary people couldn't even imagine.To study alone and think alone made me understand the content of the text and think from various perspectives. So I have ever participated in Seminar for Kant.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Second</TR>, the extravert people like to study with other people.</MI3> <SI3>They usually want to get some idea from other people by discussing. <TR>On the contrary</TR>, shy people tend to study alone. If the shy people have some chance to study other groups of students, they might think it is not effective for them to understand the thing that they should know.</SI3></BO3><CO>In short, it is up to the kind of the study and the learner's personality whether we should study alone or study with other students. If we want to hear other people's opinions, we should study with other people. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, when we have to think over and meditate the text, we might as well study alone and think alone. In addition, the personality of each person is also critical factor to decide whether study alone or not.</CO>

column1: 752&If you could invent something new, what would you develop? Use specific details to explain why this invention is needed.
column3: <IN><TS>Since I was a child, I was curious about dreams. Dreams in our sleep often reflect our desire and things we did or thought but even show things that we never experienced or met before. I believe a dream recording device will solve everything mysterious about dreams and cure some sleep-related disorders that are not clearly defined.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, there are so many questions we have about dreams and sleep beyond our knowledge.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Of course</TR>, there are some studies conducted and dreams are said to be correlated with psychological minds and some kinds of brain activities as far as I know. <TR>However</TR>, many other things are still not explicitly proven that how we create things through our dreams and are affected by them. Because dreams are mostly not vivid, I have wondered that how my thoughts are expressed in the dreams.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, there are many sleep disorders such as sleepwalking, sleeptalking and insomnia.</MI2> <SI2> So we might probably be able to cure such things through analyzing the recorded dreams.<TR>Also</TR>, small curiosities such as what color our dreams are will be easily solved.</SI2></BO2><CO>Although it might sound nonsense, I think it is not just totally impossible. <TR>Someday</TR>, we might even sell dreams like movies and compete who produce more interesting dreams. I am eager to see the new type of industry that would amuse people and a new world free of people suffering from sleep disorders.</CO>

column1: 753&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Only people who earn a lot of money are successful. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Nowadays</TR>, money is essential for us to live in modern society. Although money is a important tool in order to our ecomonical parts, I don't agree that people who make a lot of money were successful. Because I think that real success is not only being a famous man but also getting happiness.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, I suppose that the rich is not always successful people.</MI1><SI1> We can easily find them who become famous for their field. For instance, I respect Mother Teressa. Even though She helped the poor during whole life, She doesn't want to earn plenty of money for her. There are many people who help others through sacrify themselves. They had not much money, but they were very famous people in our society, and we always respect them.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, I suggest that we should get a happiness in persuing success.</MI2> <SI2> Without happiness of life, it maybe gloomy times. When we have an achievement in a series process, we can feel a happiness. In a these course, we can naturally earn money. If rich people can't feel a happiness, money is not a success but beautiful papers.<TR>Definitly</TR>, it is needless to say that happiness is important.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I'm convince that making a lot of money isn't the most valuable thing otherwise fame and hapiness. We have to consider real success with humanity, and think good spirits about success before we earn money.</CO>

column1: 754&"what would you recommend as a resentative of your culture?"
column3: <IN>Sometimes typical Koreans make jokes by saying ¡°I can live on just Kimchi.¡± <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, this short statement tells the position of Kimchi in Korean culture. Due to the its specialties, Kimchi, the core of Korean tradition, is the window through which you get to know what Korean culture is. Let me explain how Kimchi is taking up its spot in Korean culture.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, The way Kimchi is made tells us how Korean food culture is.</MI1> <SI1>To make Kimchi we have to heed the recipe and there are lots of recipes in Korean. Those recipes, however, have something in common such as adding more than 10 vegetables and sources, burying Kimchin in the ground for seasoning it and so on. <TR>Of course</TR>, these recipes apply to a lot of Korean food. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I can tell Kimchi is one of the typical food that thoroughly expresses Korean food culture.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, through Kimchi culture, the lifestyle of Korean people can be assumed.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Traditionally</TR>, Korean people like to share anything including food, clothes and so forth because Korea had been poor financially for the time being. <TR>As a part of it</TR>, Korean people share Kimchi and sometimes housewives gathered in some places to make Kimchi together. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, in the winter time some voluntary activists make a lot of Kimchi and donate them to charity, the poor, the old and orphans. <TR>In my opinion</TR>, those facts above show Korean people¡¯s lifestyle especially tendency to share anything.</SI2></BO2> <CO><TR>Needless to say</TR>, Kimchi is one of the unique constituents of Korean culture as part of Korean food and Korean people¡¯s lifestyle. <TR>Therefore</TR>, Kimchi is a definite item representing Korea.</CO>

column1: 755&Some people choose friends who are different from themselves. Others choose friends who are similar to themselves. Compare the advantages of having friends who are different from you with the advantages of having friends who are similar to you. Which kind of friend do you prefer for yourself? Why?
column3: <IN>People usually spend a lot of time with friends and having time with friends is important in various parts. Whether people spend time with friends who are different from themselves or friends who are similar to themselves depend on their character.<TS> I prefer to have time with friends who are similar to myself. The reason is that they understand me better and we have a good time because we have same hobby.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, friends who are similar to myself are interested in same parts as me.</MI1> <SI1>They also know my thought well without my saying because they have similar character. <TR>For instance</TR>, I like to see a concert. When there is a good performance, my friends take tickets and we enjoy the performance together. When I am so depressed, they sometimes relieve my pain by providing me something that I love. <TR>Thus</TR>, I prefer to be with friends who are similar to myself.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hand</TR>, friends sho are different from myself can cope with difficulty more intelligently.</MI2> <SI2>They can find a solution that I unexpected because they have different view point from me. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, I sometimes spoil my working because I used to be hurry in a difficult situation. However, friends who are different from myself solve the problem step by step</EX>. <TR>Therefore</TR>, spending time with these friends is very important in that they having different view points can advise me.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, spending time with friends having similar character can be an enjoyable time for sharing hobby. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, spending time with friends having different character can be help to me because they have different view points. <TR>However</TR>, I prefer to be with friends who are similar to myself in that they understand me better and we enjoy same hobby. Whether people spend time with friends who are different from themselves or friends who are similar to themselves rely on their character.</CO>

column1: 756&Businesses should hire employees for their entire lives. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>With an economic downturn throughout the world, nowadays, there are a lot of companies that fire their workers. Lay off might save money to the company, but it also cause some problem. Hiring employees for their entire lives could induce employees to have loyalty to company and to concentrate on their work.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, life long hired workers might have loyalty to their company.</MI1> <SI1>Worker can work without fear of laying off. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, as a senior worker, he might try to tell his knowhow to coworkers becuase he think that his work would be easy through telling knowhow to his coworker</EX>. <TR>Needlessly to say</TR>, it brings kind of development to company. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, he might work with his full abilities because he do not have to save them for the new company.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, as working for entire life, he can concentrate on his work very well.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>That is</TR>, he has a chance to add a demension to his work throughout life time and that might bring some advantages. <TR>For instance</TR>, if he made a new statistic program due to his long experiences, it might lessen the waisting money that goes into making useless data of statics.<TR>Moreover</TR>, he can solve any problem about his work because he had experienced that throughout his work.</SI2></BO2><CO>In short, to hire an employee throughout his life brings advantages, having loyalty to his company and having knowhow on his work. It helps company financially and makes company consistently. <TR>Thus</TR>, I agree that businesses should hire employees to entire lives.</CO>

column3: <IN><TS>I prefer to be alone most of the time. The reason is various.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, when I spend my time with many friends, I feel a pressure on my chest. The time is tedious.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, I have three sisters. They are talkative persons. So my air is always noisy. I am deeply offended by my sisters, because I can never concentrate upon my work.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Third</TR>, Time that I spend alone gives freedom to me. I freely spend the time. column1: 760&You have the opportunity to visit a foreign country for two weeks. Which country would you like to visit? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice.
column3: <IN><TS>There is a little island country next to Borneo called 'Brunei'. It might sound a little bit unfamiliar for many people. I want to visit their at least once in my lifetime because I want to find out many hidden things about that country and am eager to see beautiful kingdoms where gold is everywhere.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, there are not much information known about Brunei and still many people think that Brunei is not a separate country but a small area that is subordinate to Borneo.</MI1> <SI1><TR>However</TR>, it is one of the richest countries in the world where the nation mostly depend on oil production. I heard that the King is so rich that he himself established the kingdom with his own money and most of the cars on the roads are Mercedes Benz or BMW. I found it so amazing and mysterious because I didn't actually know there existed such a small rich country so secretly.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, Brunei has magnificent castles where the King lives.</MI1> <SI1>They are known to be the biggest castles ever exist in the whole world. I saw the picture of them taken at night and it was so beautiful because it was covered with gold. Gold dusts are scattered even on the carpets. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, what made me more curious was the custom of the country. Although it is an affluent country, people there are still so conservative and keep their traditional value much. There are many strict rules such as 'no drinking, no finger pointing at the picture of the King.' </SI1></BO1><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, it could be tough to go there only with the thoughts that the country is full of beautiful things. I might need to have enough information to get ready to go. I am not going to break the laws there and get arrested. The thoughts of possible dangers are something that make that country more attractive and appealing to me.</CO>

column1: 761&Do you agree or disagree with following statement? Teachers should be paid according to how much their students learn. give specific reasons and examples to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>It has become quite a common proverb in my country that "all workers must be treated by contributing on their job, especially in monetary affairs." <TS>Another way to say, this is that teachers should be paid according to how much their students learn, because any teacher is one of workers in their community and in case of teachers his or her faculty in education can be evaluated by quantity of how much their pupils learn. But such a opinion may agitate many of arguable controvecies, for the criterion is too speculative. <TR>For that reason</TR>, some people believe that teachers ought to be paid by means of the quantities their learner study. Other people believe that the "teacher", the word should be considered to be specific in moral education.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>The first group of people say that members in education, especailly teachers, should be paid according to how much the students are influenced in substancial learning.</MI1> <SI1>They point out that the education must be carried out from capable leaders, teachers, so such a way to be paid will work as an incentive to teach well. <TR>After all</TR>, under these condition teachers will try to improve their teaching skill or know-how for getting more payment. Almost all students will choose more prolific skills in learning after throwing away the past clumsy ways.<TR>In the meanwhile</TR>, unqualified teachers who are poor at instructing in their class will be screened by a set of above process. To grant a specific example, when the reform in education, by a statistic agent in Korea, was begining and teachers were paid by their ability to let students learming so much, a half of teachers in existence were changed into fresh and vigorous young instructor. That means students are willing to hail the prospective and helpful teachers for them.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In the other hand</TR>, there are people who think that the standard by which teachers can get their salary from school is so indistict that to make how much students learn number or figure for calculating is not easy to make it general.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>Moreover</TR>, if the job,"teacher" would be regarded as virtuous and rightous career, this promblem could be more complex. Suppose that a teacher who is illegal, impudent, and vulgar, not deserves to get any esteem in his school, must be capable of teaching his disciple and makes it possible to make them get better grade or scores in their exam. No doubt anyone are reluctant to learn their study about justice from the rude teacher. And the teacher, finally, will be expelled from his school by immoral performance.They still focus the educational values on moral principles and believe that teachers should be treated by specific and special situation, which is obviously not how much they learn like quantities but what values they learn such as quality, conscience, and moral.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>Personally</TR>, I find that I cannot align myself completely with either group. That's why I have some reservation about positions. No one can deny that teachers who instruct their students well and so much should be paid more than unqualified ones. But I want to take it for granted, if only they don't have any problems in morality as "teacher". <TR>In my opinion</TR>, teacher's salary should be appraised after considering their morals. Only after their mind is proved to be pure, teachers should be paid according how much their students learn. it means a lot that at least in education the teacher should be cosidered not only by their quanties but also their quality.</CO>
column23: This is a very comprehensive essay that covers all sections of a written essay. It would have been nice if the thesis had included a preview of the points that were going to be taken.

column1: 762&Films can tell us a lot about the country where they were made. What have you learned about a country from watching its movies? Use specific examples and details to support your response.

I think that the thing that people have learned about a country from watching its movies is their culture and history.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, people can learn the country's culture from watching its movie.</MI1> <SI1>In movies, people can understand the way of life and thoughts of the country people. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, I watch the movie whose title is Amaedus Mozart. This movie showed Mozart's music life and living. I could learn about classic music and social environments at that time</EX>. It is a good advantage that people can learn diverse cultures in the movies.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, the movies provide information about the country's history.<MI2> <SI2> Some movies reveal the important events in history. Shindler's list is the movie that show true nature of nazzism. After I watch the movie, I could grasp the meaning of nazzism exactly.I also could know the situation in second world war vividly. By getting a knowledge about history the range to understand others is broaden.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, people can get the information about the history and culture from the movies that tells about the country where they were made. If the movies provide knowledge about history and culture on and on, the tendency that people like to watch the movies would last in the future.</CO>

column1: 763&A gift can contribute to a child's development. What gift would you give to help a child develop? Why? use reasons and specific examples to support your choice.
column3: <IN>When I was a child I used to play with many cars. Even if I can not answer the reason why I liked cars so much, I remember that my parents bought various cars for me whenever I asked them. <TS><TR>Nevertheless</TR>, if I had a child I would like to give him/her clay toys. Here are some reasons of my preference toward clay toys</TS></IN>.<BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, clay toys are helpful for children to develop their brains.</MI1> <SI1>According to studies, the growth of brains are occurred when children move their hands a lot, especially fingers. The more frequently children use their hands, the more growth of brain can be expected. With playing clay toys, children can not help using their hands and this activity causes their brains to be matured very much.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, creativity and the ability of expressing one's feelings can be extened by playing with clay toys.</MI2> <SI2> Most of toys that are given to children have already been made in the factories. It means that children are not able to change them at all.<TR>In contrast</TR>, clay toys are easily changed and transformed according to children's feelings and intention. To give examples, a clay toy can be not only a car but also an animal and even an astronaut by childeren's imagination.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, clay toys have various effects on developing children. Such effects appear as the growth of brains and the extention of creativity. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I choose clay toys as gifts for my children.</CO>

column1: 764&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Children should begin learning a foreign language as soon as they start school. Use specific reasons and examples to support your position.
column3: <IN><TS>Early education of foreign language is one of the most interesting issues of this society. Some people says learning a foreign language in early age is good for child while others argue that It could raise problems of excessive early education among the parents. People have their own idea about this subject. <TR>In my opinion</TR>, learning a foreign language in early stage can bring a serious problem to us.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, If children begin to learn a foreign language in early age, It can be produce an excessive early education problem among their parent.</MI1> <SI1>In my country, Korean parents are interested in their children¡¯s education very much. <TR>Therefore</TR>, the percentage of the individual education cost is comparatively high in household economy. According to the statistics from the ministry of education in my country, the rate of Individual education cost especially foreign language education cost is nearly five thousand dollars each household. Every child may go to the private school every day because of their parents. They might want to go out and get along with their friends, but they couldn¡¯t. From my point of view, early education of foreign language can produce serious social problem to national Economy and can restrains children¡¯s personal life.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, excessive early education of foreign language may give rise to a serious problem that may confusing children¡¯s linguistic organization.</MI2> <SI2> As a good example of this, I once heard the news reported from a research institute. They said a child who was learned foreign language in early age give rise to confuse of linguistic organization. He has watched a video tape to learn a foreign language all day long for two years.He was watched a video tape from five years old and now, he even can¡¯t speak their own language well. This story is show us how the early education can causes serious problem. For this reason, I strongly disagree about early learning of foreign language.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, learn a foreign language in early age can bring us unrecoverable results as showing in this essay. But these bad aspects of early education of foreign language can be overcame If we find a better alternative idea.</CO>

column1: 767&It has recently been announced that a new movie theater may be bilt in your neighborhood. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>It is reported that a new movie theater may be built in my neighborhood. Some of my neighbors oppose that it bring a noise, air pollution and heavy traffic. <TS><TR>However</TR>, I am in favor of the suggestion. The reason is that I can have a good time seeing a movie in the theater with my friends and family and a lot of commercial group according to the building of the theater make me more convenient.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, a new movie theater could give me a good time. My family and I love to see a movie in a theater and we would have a happy time seeing a movie together.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Until now</TR>, my family and I hardly go to a theater because it is far from my house. However, if a theater is built in my neighborhood, we would have more opportunities to be together and double our pleasure with a movie in the theater. <TR>Thus</TR>, I support to establish the movie theater in that my family and I could spend more time together and it could increase our pleasure.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, if a new movie theater is built in my neighborhood, commercial group would be built step by step.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>For instance</TR>, bookstore, restaurant, coffee shop and fastfood shop would be arranged near the theater. <TR>Thus</TR>, we could enjoy more convenient lives using facilities. <TR>Additionally</TR>, they increase a chance to engage.<TR>Therefore</TR>, building the theater makes my neighborhood more convenient village through the shaping a commercial group.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, I support to build a new theater in my neighborhood. The reason is that it give my family a good time and it make my life more convenient for building various commercial groups. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, it enlarge an opportunity to hire people living in my village. <TR>Of course</TR>, it has some down sides such as noise, heavy traffic and air pollution. <TR>However</TR>, if we try to prevent them, we could know the indispensibility of building the theater.</CO>

column1: 768&Some people think governments should spend as much money as possible exploring outer space (for example, traveling to the Moon and to other planets). Use specific reasons and details to support your answer
column3: <IN><TS>It is said that some people agree that governments should spend their revenue in exploring out space and it could bring some benefits such as enabling to travel outer space individually and contributing to astronomy through giving new informations. <TR>However</TR>, I believe that there are still lots of places where government should help through investing money. By using money to help people who want to get a help, we can make more comfortable and convenient world.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, there are still lots of people who suffer from shortage of basic stuff.</MI1> <SI1>A survey show that many of African people have been dying from shortage of food. A lot of people in undevelopesd contries go to buy a basic commodities on foot, which takes more than an hour, due to undevelopes transportation system. <TR>Needless to say</TR>, it can be very helpful that governments use money to giving food to Africans and investing on developing transportaion system such as constructing road and supporting bus fee.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, we still have lots of problems that can be dealt with investing money.</MI2> <SI2> It is believed that many of people are suffering from cancers that might be conrtrolled by suppoting patients.If governments use money to build specified hospitals for cancer patients, of coursely, it would be helpful a lot.<TR>Furthermore</TR>, many students want to enter college, but they connot due to high admission fee, that can be supported by governments.</SI2></BO2><CO>In short, even nowadays with high technology and developed society, there are a lot of places to need money. It can help Africans and cancer patients. From the examples that I presented above, I strongly recommend governments to use money for basic needs on Earth.</CO>

column1: 769&People have different ways of escaping the stress and difficulties of modern life. Some read; some exercise; others work in their gardens. What do you think are the best ways of reducing stress? Use specific details and examples in your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>There are three options of getting rid of the stress and getting out of difficulties of modern life. ; Reading, exercising and working in gardens. Three of them all have advantages, but I think the best thing I can remove stress and difficulties is to read books.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>By getting into a book</TR>, which is possible when I read a book very enthusiatically, I can forget all difficulties and stress from the real world.</MI1> <SI1>A scientific novel can lead me to the cyber space where there is no stress and difficulty. <TR>Moreover</TR>, by dreaming to be a main character of a book, I can do everything. <TR>That is</TR>, I can win a war against a million enemies with ten thouand subordinates like Napoleon. It will bring kind of achievement that help to eliminate stress.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Initially</TR>, it is easier than exercise or work in gardens to read a book.</MI2> <SI2> By reading a book on a sofa or a bed, we can save our energy. <TR>Needless to say</TR>, we can feel kind of refreshment by saving energy.<TR>Furthermore</TR>, it is easy to start. We can place our books everywhere we want. We can read a book in our office and in my home. Eventhough we have only few minutes to read a book, we can start and have fun.</SI2></BO2><CO>In short, there are several advantages through reading a book. We can take a reat by reading a book very conveniently because we can start to read a book everywhere and anytime when we have time. Thus, we can have fun easily. And reading a book enables to save energy. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, by reading a book, we can get out of real world. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I strongly belive that to read a book is the best way of getting rid of stress and getting out of difficulties.</CO>

column1: 771&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Families with fewer children should be rewarded for helping to prevent overpopulation. Use reasons and specific examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>In a world of more than six billion people, overpopulation is apparently a big problem. Giving the first thought on that matter, we are to easily find out that it causes a lot of problems such as environmental ones as well as poverty ones. <TS><TR>However</TR>, overpopulation is confined mainly to the areas of less-developed countries, or LDCs. Developed countries face not the problem of overpopulation or increase in a number of nationals but the problem of the opposite, decrease in population. Hence giving incentives to producing less number of children should not be applied universally but differently country by country.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>As mentioned above</TR>, overpopulation causes a number of problems.</MI1> <SI1><EX><TR>For example</TR>, in China after millions of people live on in a meadow for a period of time the meadow turns to a desert</EX>. Then they move on to another place and then the place also turns to the desert. There are the word "environmental refugees" nowadays, as people like them increase drastically. <TR>Consequently</TR> China and many other developing countries which suffer from these problems reward families with fewer children, that is to say, one or two, as a governmental policy.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>This is an unnecessary step for those countries who have such problems caused by overpopulation.</MI2> <SI2><TR>However</TR>, in case of Japan, for instance, situation is very different. <TR>In Japan</TR>, there are only one or two children in one family and more and more youngsters do not marry.Thus their problem is decrease in their number of nationals and adequate work forces. It must be ridiculous to say in front of Japanese that, "You should reward to the families with fewer childern since they help prevent overpopulation."</SI2></BO2><CO>In short, it may be consistent to give some incentives to the families with fewer children so as to prevent the deepening of overpopulation; however the diagnosis for overpopulation should be applied region by region, with regard to its own situations. Of course overpopulation causes disastrous problems such as poverty and destruction of natural resources and it should be solved as soon as possible. <TR>However</TR> there are countries whose problems are decrease in their number of nationals. <TR>Therefore</TR> in view of their situation, giving rewards to the families with fewer children is lack of consistency.</CO>

column1: 772&It is sometimes that borrowing money from a friend an harm or damage the friendship. Do you agree? Why or Why not? Use reasons and specific examples to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>Probably almost everybody has had the experience in their life of loaning money to a fiend and later having problems recovering the debt. <TS><TR>In fact</TR>, some people day that borrowing money from a friend is likely to harm or damage the friendship. I agree with this point of view for two reasons: <TR>First</TR>, since friends don¡¯t write down agreements when they make loans, confusion can later result about the terms of loan and its repayment. <TR>And second</TR>, friends often have trouble communicating frankly if a debt isn¡¯t repaid promptly, and problems in the friendship can result.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Lack of documentation is the beginning of serious problems between the two friends.</MI1> <SI1>Few friends would ever think of writing down the terms of a loan when one friend loans money to another. The advantage of having the terms of a loan written down is that both parties clearly in understand the amount involved, the time when it will be repaid, any interest to be paid, and any penalty for late payment. Without such a piece of paper it is often the case that the person loaning money expects the loan to be repaid in a short time but the person who received the loan believes he can wait a long time. Without a written agreement, the two people may have very different understandings of the terms of the loan. This misunderstandings can lead to problems that may seriously damage the friendship.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Besides</TR>, friends often find it awkward to communicate frankly if a debt isn¡¯t repaid promptly, and damage to the friendship may result.</MI2> <SI2>It sometimes happens that when someone loans money to a friend and the loan isn¡¯t repaid promptly, the person who loaned money may want or need his money back quickly and feels frustrated when his loan is not repaid. <TR>However</TR>, because of the friendships, the person may hesitate to frankly ask his friend for quickly repayment. Instead of communicating openly, the person may allow resentment and anger to build up, day after day, until he begins having very negative feelings about his friend. Because money is such a sensitive subject in friendship, people are often reluctant to discuss it frankly.This lack of communication can lead to anger and frustration that never gets discussed openly and the warm feelings of friendship may disappear.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, borrowing money from a friend can harm or damage the friendship because of lack of a written agreement and communication. When I was younger I used to loan money to several friends, but I ended up having the kinds of problems like those I described above. I learned a valuable lesson from my own experiences; Money and friendship don¡¯t mix. That¡¯s why I believe it is never a good idea for one friend to loan money to another.</CO>
column23: This is an average essay. It is of average length and has some great points made in it. It is longer but is lacking some transitions necessary to aid in the flow of the essay.

column1: 773& Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Children should begin learning a foreign language as soon as they start school. Use specific reasons and examples to support your position.
column3: <IN><TS>Early education of foreign language is one of the most interesting issues of this society. Some people says learning a foreign language in early age is good for child while others argue that It could raise problems of excessive early education among the parents. People have their own idea about this subject. In my opinion, learning a foreign language in early stage can bring a serious problem to us.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, If children begin to learn a foreign language in early age, It can be produce an excessive early education problem among their parent. In my country, Korean parents are interested in their children¡¯s education very much.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Therefore</TR>, the percentage of the individual education cost is comparatively high in household economy. According to the statistics from the ministry of education in my country, the rate of Individual education cost especially foreign language education cost is nearly five thousand dollars each household.Every child may go to the private school every day because of their parents. They might want to go out and get along with their friends, but they couldn¡¯t. From my point of view, early education of foreign language can produce serious social problem to national Economy and can restrains children¡¯s personal life.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, excessive early education of foreign language may give rise to a serious problem that may confusing children¡¯s linguistic organization.</MI1> <SI1>As a good example of this, I once heard the news reported from a research institute. They said a child who was learned foreign language in early age give rise to confuse of linguistic organization. He has watched a video tape to learn a foreign language all day long for two years. He was watched a video tape from five years old and now, he even can¡¯t speak their own language well. This story is show us how the early education can causes serious problem.<TR>For this reason</TR>, I strongly disagree about early learning of foreign language.</SI1></BO1><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, learn a foreign language in early age can bring us unrecoverable results as showing in this essay. But these bad aspects of early education of foreign language can be overcame If we find a better alternative idea.</CO>
column23: This is a very comprehensive essay that covers all sections of a written essay. It would have been nice if the thesis had included a preview of the points that were going to be taken.

column1: 774&You have the opportunity to visit a foreign country for two weeks. Which country would you like to visit? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice

And Hokkaido is one of the famous places for snowboarding because of great natural snow instead of artificial one and scenic spots. In Korean, unfortunately I hardly have a chance to enjoy snowboarding in natural snow. Accordingly, I always long for going Hokkaido.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the other reason to want to visit Japan is that I love to visit my friend who lives in Tokyo.</MI2> <SI2>She is my one of closest friend of high school. A couple of years ago, all her family members move to Japan.After her moving I haven¡¯t seen her even one time. this is the second reason to choose Japan as a country I¡¯d like to go.</BO2><CO><TR>To sum up</TR>, even though there are many various countries all over the world, Japan is just country I love to visit. That¡¯s because there is fantastic place for snowboarding and I want to meet my friend living there.</CO>

column1: 775&People have different ways of escaping the stress and difficulties of modern life. Some read; some exercise; others work in their gardens. What do you think are the best ways of reducing stress? Use specific details and examples in your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>As the structure of our society is more complecated, people who live in modern society are getting much stress. <TR>As a result</TR>, many people are trying to find ways to remove their stress in these days. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I will introduce some ways for removing the stress.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>At first</TR>, you should exercise regulary.</MI1> <SI1><TR>Generally</TR>, the physical condition of most modern people is not good because of their overworking and stress. Regular excercise can make your muscle healthy and strengthen your lung and heart facillity. After your physical condition is recovered, you will feel that your stress falls down so much.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, watching movies is also a good way to remove stress.</MI2> <SI2> While you are watching the movie, you can forget complex things bothering you and take a rest. Sometimes you will be hopeful if the movie's story is very impressive to you.Through watching movies, you can get rid of stress piled up on your brain.</SI1></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Finally</TR>, you should try to be optimistic.</MI3> <SI3>This is the most important thing. Although you encounter terrible situation and are getting so much stress, your optimistic attitude will save you. Following some scientists, your brain make very useful wave when you are optimistic. This wave helps you get rid of stress, and you can solve the terrible situation more easily.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, living in modern society is very hard. That's why we must get rid of our stress. I think you will solve your problem if you follow these advices that I gave you.</CO>

column1: 776&It has recently been announced that a new high school may be built in your community. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details in your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>It is quite controversial issue whether a high school should be built or not. I totally maintain the idea that a high school should not be established in our community. There are several proper reasons why I claim like above; firstly, the facility worsen the congestion of traffic in our neighborhood, secondly,  there is no enough ground to construct a school in this town, and lastly, the number of high school students is not very large.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Most of all</TR>, the traffic condition of our town is more terrible than other cities.</MI1> <SI1>If we set up a new school, our town will be crowed much more by students and teachers than now. <TR>Therefore</TR>, it would make only worsen the situation of traffic congestion.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, there is not sufficient space of land to hold a additional building, since whole plottage is relatively narrow and they are already occupied with households, offices, or factories.</MI2> <SI2><TR>Furthermore</TR>, even though there is available ground to build, The facilities, like a grand mall, a public park, or a hospital, are pretty more useful for convenience of residents than a school.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>In addition</TR>, almost all the student in this city is graduated from high school, but twenty people only need for the educational service of high school.</MI3> <SI3>Not only the number of teenager going to a high school is absolutely small, but the total population of young people also is continually decreasing by degree.</SI3></BO3><CO>To summarize what I mentioned above, I am convinced that a new construction of high school has a lot of disadvantages. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I strongly oppose the building plan of school.</CO>

column1: 778&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Teachers should be paid according to how much their students learn. Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN><TS>There is an argument that teachers should be paid according to their ability to teach students. I know that if teachers get their salary according to the amount of their wtudents learn, it may harm the positive relationship between teachers and students. <TR>However</TR>, as far as I concerned, the salary of teachers is assigend by the amount of their students learn.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Basically</TR>, as written in the constitution, how much money can make should be decided by how much someone can do for his job.</MI1> <SI1>According to this, the teacher who is good at deliever and explanation of his subject should get more money than other teachers who are not good at teaching their subjects. If he is teaching a mathematics, he will try to use another method in solving a problem not to explain only one method.<TR>Needless to say</TR>, the students who learn from this teacher can get much information. <TR>In other words</TR>, the system of payment by amount of students learn can affect on positively both of teachers and students.<SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, the competitive environment among teachers who want get much money might heighten the quality of education.</MI1> <SI2>That is, teachers who have not try to develpe themselves will depart their job due to less amount of salary. <EX><TR>For example</TR>, the physics teacher who has taught for 20 years without developing new method of teaching so it causes his class to get the lowest grade of all the classes of that school cannot support his family with small amount of salary</EX>. So there will be a new mathematics teacher and helps students to learn a lot.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>In conclusion</TR>, the system of paying salary for teachers should be decided by amount of their students learn. It could lead teachers try to develop themselves and also heighten the quality of the education. <TR>Finally</TR>, I strongly give an approval for the policy that the amount of teacher's salary shoud be assigned according to how much their students learn.</CO>

column1: 779&People have different ways of escaping the stress and difficulties of modern life. Some read; some exercise; others work in their gardens. What do you think are the best ways of reducing stress? Use the details and examples in your answer.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Recently</TR>, plenty of books concerning with how to manage the stress are easy to find in a book store. Even though those books introduce hundreds of solutions about escaping from stress, in my opinion, taking a walk and having a conversation with your friend can be recommendable methods against stress and diffieculties that we are suffering from. Let's take a peek at how those two ways work in our lives.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, taking a walk is one way to relieve your stress and difficulties.</MI1> <SI1><TR>As we know</TR>, when we are stressed out we tend to be getting mad at something and easy to upset about what you are bugging. In this situation, if you take a walk and look back on what you have done up to now you will find out how you have let the stress and difficulties bug you so far. <TR>Also</TR>, watching beautiful sceneries and taking fresh air definitely sooth your anger, anxiousness, and nervousness. <TR>Therefore</TR>, you can get a grip on yourself by taking a walk.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, getting stressed out can be avoided if you have a conversation with your friend.</MI2> <SI2> Sometimes when you are under stress you can tell your friend why your are having trouble and ask what you should do about that. If so, your friend may have a solution to your problems, so you happen to find how to overcome your situation that you are facing with.<TR>On the other hand</TR>, your friend may be streesed out for some reasons and you can give him a hand. <TR>Personally</TR>, I'd like to have a talk with my friends if I want to escape from my stress and hardships.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>As a result</TR>, I can get some feedbacks from my friends and my friends are given a piece of advice by me. <TR>Thus</TR>, have a conversation is the good way to deal with your stress. <TR>As mentioned above</TR>, stress and difficulties can be gotten rid of by some measures. Among them taking a walk and talking to your friends are the most efficient and the easiest exits that help you relieve your stress and difficulties.</CO>

column1: 780&When people need to complain about a product or poor service, some prefer to complain in writing others prefer to complain in person. Which way do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>The other day</TR>, I read a newspaper article on people's predilections on ways of compaining. The newspasper conducted a survey on this subject, and according to that survey, the number of people complaining in person is increasing, whereas people who write complaints are decreasing. It means more people prefer to complain in person than write. Since people are getting used to talking person to person in order to complain about something, the goverment of my country abolished a system of sending in a complaints and it encourages people to talk to government officials. I am in favor of this idea because it is direct and fast, and also, I can avoid misunderstandings caused by grammatical errors or obscure meanings.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>In the first place</TR>, I prefer complaining in person because it is direct and relatively fast.</MI1> <SI1>If I write about my inconvenience and poor service and hand it in to companies, it takes so much time to read it over and correct the problem. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, if I have a word with a manager responsible for the problem, they will understand what I am complaing about exactly and I can get better service immediately. A couple of months ago, I wanted to talk about the quaility of my cellular phone because it was better than I expected even though it was newly made. I found some defects in it, so I wanted to get a refund or exchange another product. By the time I made a compaint in writing, they did not answer to it. <Tr>Finally</TR>, I had a talk with the representative manager of that company, and I successfully conveyed my intention. They made a quick response and I got another new item right away. <TR>At that time</TR>, I realized that complaining directly is a better way than writing because I can get my problem corrected quickly.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In the next place</TR>, I agree with the idea that it is better to talk in person since it avoids misunderstandings.</MI2> <SI2> <TR>In general</TR>, writing is potential to be misunderstood, because it is indirect. <TR>Also</TR>, it can contain words with dual meanings, and then, it can probably be mistaken. When I was pretty young, I wanted to complain about goverment officials' attitude, because I was treated as just a young kid and I could not get what I wanted from the governmnet office. I wrote complaints and sent them in.<TR>However</TR>, I could not recognize my complaints were accepted afterwards. <TR>After that</TR>, I got to know that my intention was misregarded and they could not solve the problems. If I talked about it first hand, they could have improved the situation.</SI2></BO2><CO>In summary, it is far better to complain in person than in writing because it is more direct and fast, and also, it is more clear and avoids possibility of misunderstandings. As the status that I mentioned above says, complaining in person is more effective and certain. I strongly hold the opinion that telling to the resoponsible manager or official is a better way of complaining.</CO>

column1: 781&Imagine that you are preparing for a trip. You plan to be away from your home for a year. In addition to clothing and personal care items, you can take one additional thing. What would you take and why? Use specific reasons and details to support your choice.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>In general</TR>, people like making a trip, and my case is not different from others. We usually enjoy our trip, but I feel inclined to suggest all people who are about to leave for trip taking a video camera, because it is good for both travelers and people around them, in the sense that they can record what they see and also, they can show videos to their people by playing it.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, a video recorder enables me to keep my amazing memory and in mind easily by recording all things in the places I have been to.</MI1> <SI1><One of the purposes of traveling is to experience in different places and learn a wide variety of things in other places. If I keep what I learned and saw during my trip in my recorder, it will allow me to have fragrant memories forever in my mind and not to forget about them. TR>Moreover</TR>, I have once taken a course on the best way of handling it in a community center and have been practicing how to function my camcoder well by myself since I first bought it. <TR>Thus</TR>, I am sure it will be a good opportunity to apply my practical skill of it for the first time.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In the next place</TR>, a video recorder will give me a chane to show what I saw and heard to my family and friends who have never been where I traveled around.</MI2> <SI2>They probably do not know what is famous or valuable in those places and have never seen beautiful scenery there before. I would like to show people around me after the trip, because I can share my experience and <TR>Also</TR>, it is perfect for me to explain what I felt there to them, showing what I recorded in the places I visited. <EX>From my experience, I once dropped by Austrailia, and of course, I brought my tape recorder. Thanks to it, I could keep everything that impressed me in it. After coming back home, I could tell where to go in that country and what was beautiful and amazing to people planning to go there</EX>. Since Austrailia is very different from my home country, it was also good for me to tell them about my trip, not to mention that they were moved and inspired by my explanation.</SI2></BO2><CO>It is obvious that it will be a perfect choice if I take my video recorder, as I am able to remember good experience for good and to show them to my acquintances, thus to share my fragrant feelings with others. If someone asks me what take for his or her trip, I will definitely recommend taking a video tape recorder, as I did while visiting Austrailia.</CO>
