column1: 825&Some people are very fond of their pets and treat their pets almost as family members. Do you approve or disapprove of this kind of relationship with pets? Why? Use specific examples and reasons to explain your opinion.
column3: <IN><TS>Pets may be sometimes bothering something to us, but in the most of cases, they are good friends to opening mind without talking when we feel gloomy. I can surely say it is often more than family members. I have several reasons for it.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, Pets can be the best friend for us in lonely life of human. Pets give us comfort and they can be always with us as long as pets aren't dead. Pets can easily notice in what mood we are now and then, they seem to act properly as the atmosphere. Lonely life of old men makes a serious problem these days</MI1>. <SI1>I falled in deep sorrow to see that an old man killed himself because his children didn't come to see him in the new year. if he had been with a pet, he wouldn't have chosen death. <TR>With this point</TR>, pets couldn't be better family member.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>,pets can help us to keep our happiness. Pets never anger for the people who live with them. Depressed family can become lively by loving pets with one heart</MI2>. <SI2><Pets can be a bridge linking discord to harmony. Indifferent family can be an union,looking after pets or looking for the lost pets accidently.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>We're living in rapidly changing and dangerous society. we may suddenly lose our important person at any time</MI3>. <SI3>Pets would be much consolation in our life at any time, though they aren't only comforts for such a terrible case.</SI3></BO3><CO>In conclusion, I approve of treating pets as family members. Pets deserve enough to be treated as family members.</CO>

column1: 826&When people move to another country, some of them decide to follow the customs of the new country. Others prefer to keep their own customs. Compare these two choices. Which one do you prefer? Support your answer with specific details.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Nowadays</TR>, people tend to move another country according to their own business. <TR>Most of the people</TR>, even if they have a variety of purposes, may be meet peculiar or unusual new country's customs. <TR>However</TR>, I follow the customs of new country because I would like to respect their own discipline or social contract and I am familiar with neighborhood in the community.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, if the society had any contract considering as taboo, we have to follow of new customs</MI1>. <SI><EX>For example, I unconsciously touch children on the head by hand as expression of interests, love, and encouragement whenever I usually see lovely children in my country</EX>, But these behavior may be accept as a tabooed meaning of neglect for the children in some country. Although I give the children to good impression, parents dislike the behavior and would not like to meet them again</SI1></BO1>. <BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, if you would like to meet people who have diverse language, culture and age, you may better to follow ritual standard as well as food, clothing, etiqutte in religious place. <TR>For instance</TR>, I asked to someone what should prepare for rule or discipline to go religious place. <TR>Then</TR>, one explain to me that women shouldn't excessively their expose body</MI2>. <SI2><TR>Therefore</TR>, I recommend that we choose appropriate behavior or manners for their own customs than keep to our customs.</SI2></BO2><CO>In clnclusion, as mentioned above, I have reasons that follow the customs because interact with neighbor hood and respect social or religious rule related new customs of another country rather than keep our own customs before. <TR>By doing so</TR>, we can broden understanding of diverse culture and customs without preoccupied thinking.</CO>

column1: 827&Films can tell us a lot about the country where they were made. What have you learned about a country from watching its movies? Use specific examples and details to support your response.
column3: <IN><TS>Since films appeared at first, films have very developed and can have occupied our life and culture. <TR>In many countries</TR>, movies are made and we can know a lot about the country where they were made. As films show us a lot of things about a country, we can learn its history, culture, tradition.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can learn a country¡¯s history through its movies. In other words, while we watching a movie, we come in contact with the country¡¯s history through its lines and scenes</MI1>. <SI1><EX>As an example of this, I hadn¡¯t known the Titanic which sank at the sea until I watched Titanic</EX>. <TR>Through the film</TR>, I can know the Titanic and immigrants who went to the U.S.A from Europe because of economical reasons or religious freedom. <TR>In this matter</TR>, films in a country are the best method to inform other countries¡¯ people about its history.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, in films, we can watch other countries¡¯ culture and tradition. Although these culture and tradition may not occupy the films, they will influence our mind and subconsciousness. <TR>For instance</TR>, as movies from Hollywood have been imported in my country, many teenagers can learn about American culture and tradition</MI2>. <SI2><TR>As a result</TR>, they want to eat hamburgers , to wear blue jeans, and learn American way of thinking. <TR>Now</TR>, American culture and tradition occupy many parts of my country. <CO>In conclusion, even if we don¡¯t go to other countries, we can learn about countries from watching their films such as history, culture and tradition. I think films are essential for us to know other countries in Global Ages</CO>
column23: This was an above average quality essay. The introduction was fairly weak. The thesis statement was excellent. The focus on the topic as well as the inclusion of examples was nice.

column1: 828&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is better to be a member of a group than to be the leader of a group. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>In a society, there are many kinds of groups in a school, family, work. And all of us belongs to some of those groups as a member or a leader. Leaders should control their group while members follow them. I completely agree with the above statement for three reasons.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>One reason I like to be a member of a group is not to worry about matters like decision making. As a leader you will be required to make decision alone and let members obey what you decided. <TR>Your decision, however</TR>, can't satisfy every member's preference so that they may complain and even say a bad word about you. In my highschool, I was one of the class leaders and that one year was a very hard time for me. Whenever I had to organize some events, there were always lots of arguments according to each member's benefits</MI1>. <SI1>Although I tried to do the event well they didn't think of me at all. <TR>At that time</TR>, I reallized that being leader is not an easy thing. So I prefer to be a member.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Second reason is that I don't want to waste time as a leader. Leaders has a lot of things to prepare, discuss, and practice. My friend, Sujin, was elected as a president of our highschool. After she became a leader she always had to stick within a school so that I had no chance to meet her often althogh we were best friends</MI2>. <SI2>She coudn't study at all and she regreted to be a leader. I don't want to lose my time for spending most of my time to do works for members. I prefer doing my job and following leaders as a member.</SI2></BO2><CO>To conclude, there are a lt of diffeculty to be a leader. They are responsible for most of things ocuuring in a group so they have to worry about that all the time and this leads to waste leader's own time. As a result I think it is better to be a member and when I do what I am obligated to do in a group helping leaders, we can make a good group.</CO>
column23: This was a below average quality essay. The thesis statement was actually split up into pieces and inserted throughout the introduction. column1: 829& People attend college or university for many different reasons(for example, new experiences, career preparation, increased knowledge). Why do you think people attend college or university? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>As the society is developed, many people tend to attend college or university and that reasons are also very various. <TS>But I think people enter college or university because of career preparation for getting a good job you want and new experiences which I have no chance at high school.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, these days, our society has a various of fields. and they want to get people who are suitable for special field. So if we¡¯d like to get that job, we should have college or university diploma basically</MI1>. <EX>For example, I worked for developing new medicine at the research institute and to accomplish that work, special technique and a lot of information are need. So if you¡¯d like to get specialized information, you should go to college or university</EX>. <SI1><TR>Thus</TR>, I think that to getting a job you want, people want to have a chance at college or university.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>secondly</TR>, college or university is different from high school. In my country when we were high school students, all students learned the same subjects and they were only interested in attending college or university. so we hardly couldn¡¯t afford to have new experiences. But, In college or university, we have a lot of chance to new people more than high school and by meeting friends have different major, we can get new information.</MI2><SI2><TR>Therefore</TR>, I think people attend college or university to get a lot of new experiences.</SI2></BO2><CO>In conclusion, the reasons to attend college or university depend on individual. But I think people have a chance at there to get career preparation and to new experiences.</CO>
column23: This is a below average quality essay. The thesis is well written and comprehensive. There is a good focus on the topic and effective main points. The only real issue was that the authro didn't develop any of the sections to the extent that would be expected. They are too short.

column1: 830&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN><ts>As many subjects are in school, there are different preferences among students. It is the ancient belief that studying history and literature is more important than studying mathmatics and science, whereas others think the opposite for following reasons: wisdoms from our ancestors, being proud of their own root, and expression of individuality.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>The most important aspect from studying history is learning the life skills from our forefathers. Even if modern people have more convenient skills invented through science, the more useful skills exist in the ancient time</MI1>. <SI1><EX>For example, there are many pills maded through the ancient ways</EX>. <TR>Especially</TR>, in Korea, many doctors use some plants for the ingredients of pills, as our ancestors have</SI1></BO1>. <BO2><MI2><TR>Next</TR>, knowing their origins well makes people be proud of themselves. As they atudy history and its literature, they can be taught what people before them have done for them; it makes them to feel thankful for their ancestors and look up for the people ahead</MI2>. <SI2><TR>Afterall</TR>, they feel how proud they feel about what they are.</SI2></BO2> <BO3><MI3><TR>lastly</TR>, through the literature, people can reveal their expressions. Sonce long, if a country rules other countries, they tried to steal thier language and literature, which forms most of a culture</MI3>. <TR>That is</TR>, the literature reveals individualities and thoughts so that the subordinate countries can think of the rebels less without their culture. <SI3><TR>Therefore</TR>, learning literature helps people show their own personal values and feelings. </SI3></BO3><CO><TR>As stated above</TR>, knowledges of living methods, self-proudness from one's origin, and individualities are gained by studying history and literature. <TR>As a matter of fact</TR>, you can find out more advantages about the learning these domian than the field of science or mathmetics. <TR>Thus</TR>, people should value more in learning history and literature than in sciense and mathematics, and try to gain such benefits though the study.</CO>
column23: This is a below average quality essay. There is no real thesis statement. The problem with this essay is that the author takes much too long to say anything. The first real conclusionary statement of any sort is the final sentence of the essay.

column1: 831&People have different ways of escaping the stress and difficulties of modern life. Some read; some exercise; others work in their gardens. What do you think are the best ways of reducing stress? Use specific details and examples in your answer.
column3: <IN>people have lots of stress and difficulties of modern life. <TS>owing to having the complex structure in modern society, there is no place to make people feel comportable in their working place. modern people need something to relax their mind. The best way of reducing stress is that they have to find something to control their mind.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>first of all</TR>, the most important thing is that they have to find something that they are very interested in. it is related to their hobby. if they are interested in watching movie, they are supposed to go to theater and make them feel easy during watching movie</MI1>. <SI1><TR>after that</TR>, they can be reducing your a bunch of their stress and they can control their mind whatever they do.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>belong with finding out their interested thing, people try to meet friends who are very friendly and tell something what they've stressfully done</MI2>. <SI2>once they are supposed to talk , they can be finding out the best way to do without getting stress. it is self-awareness to find out their ways.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>in addition to find out their ways, it is one of good way to reduce stress which might be forgetting everything related to thier jobs. and they are supposed to take a trip in few days<MI3>.<SI3> they have such an instinct curesity to do your working.</SI3></BO3> <CO>in conclusion, they have to control their mind and find out their interested thing and need have self- awareness also need some stimulate thing to have curesity related to their working. column23: This is a below average quality essay. The author makes this essay very impersonal when it could have more effectively been written as personal. There is poor word choice and grammar throughout this essay.

column1: 832&Should governments spend more money on improving roads and highways, or should governments spend more money on improving public transportation (buses, trains, subways)? Why? Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3: <IN>Some people believe governments use more money on improving roads and highways, while other people believe governments use more money on improving public transportation. <TS>Although both parties have their strong points, improving public transportation is more effective than improving social facilities such as roads and highways. Governments should use money on transportation as following reasons. 14¡±</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First off</TR>, constructing a new road or highway is not a perfect solution to solve traffic congestion. In order to make new roads and highways, it is not indispensable to destruct our nature like mountain, river and even our hometown</MI1>. <SI1><TR> In other way</TR>, those new constructions are increasing environment pollution, so governments should spend our precious money on restoring our nature. 23¡±</SI1></BO1> <BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, a little change in transportation system is more profitable than an additional road and highway construction. Governments can dissolve sever traffic jam on the road by increasing the lines of subway. Although subway lines have a short point that subway trains should stop on each fixed station, bus lines could be a supplementary method for it. (30¡¯) <TR>Also</TR>, like England, we can make 2 stories buses, which are good for traffic jam and for sightseeing to foreigners</MI2>. <SI2><TR>Especially</TR>, the purpose of train should be altered into focusing more on delivering goods than carrying customer, because there are more convenient transportations to deliver passengers in a little amount of time. 43¡±</SI2></BO2><CO>I believe governments should invest money on improving transportation, instead of increasing roads and highways. Transportations and roads are similar to between blood and artery in our body. Too many bloodlines could cause a shortage in some part in our body or could hinder the natural circulation of blood. 50¡± </CO>
column23: This is an average quality essay. There are parts that are really well done and others that are not. More examples would have been preferred.

column1: 833& Some people believe that university students should be required to attend classes. Others believe that going to classes should be optional for students. Which point of view do you agree with? Use specific reasons and details to explain your answer.
column3: <IN>Some insist that it is a mandatory for university students to attened a class becuase students want to play sports and game rather than learn theories. <TS><TR>However</TR>, university students have abilities to choose it by themselves. <TR>Thus</TR>, whether students go to classes or not would be optional. It could bring several advantages such as motivation for learning and spending time more efficiently.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, students could be motivated for their studying by choosing to go to classes by themselves. They would be interested in their classes because they atted the classes when they need them. <TR>For instnace</TR>, I prefer experiments to study about some concepts. I had to have a dull time with the lecture of the concepts. These are the concepts to learn on line more rapidly by myself</MI1>. <SI1><TR>However</TR>, I am still remembering the experiments that were conducted last year. <TR>Thus</TR>, classes should be optional for students becuase of motivation.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, when classes are optional, students could use time more efficiently. In the classes being enforced to attend, they could nap or waste time thinking about their personal happening. <TR>However</TR>, they could spend efficient time when they attend classes needing to them. <TR>For instance</TR>, one could learn a deeper theory while there are the class for him knowing very well</MI2>. <SI2><TR>Therefore</TR>, classes should be optional to spend time more efficiently.</SI2></BO2><CO>In conclusion, students have to choose whether to go classes or not by themselves. The reason is that it could heighten their motive and interest and it could be helpful for students not to wate time. <TR>Of course</TR>, they could miss important classes for playing sports. <TR>However</TR>, they are adult and have ability to decide superiority.</CO>
column23: This was an average quality essay. The thesis was a bit vague and weak, but the essay had some good points that develeped into a decent conclusion. There were some grammatical and spelling mistakes throughout the essay.

column1: 834& Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People behave differently when they wear different clothes. Do you agree that different clothes influence the way people behave? Use specific examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>A saying goes, "Colthes make the man." It means how we dress affects how we behave. Some people would agree with the proverb while others do not. <TR>In my view</TR>, I agree with the idea that different clothes influence the way people behave because of the following reasons.</TS></IN> <BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, a certain type of clothes makes people feel more responsiblity and conduct more cautiously. It occurs especially when people are in uniforms, because according to their behaviors their group may be blamed. Because of this feeling of responsibility, the police, soldiers, and pilots wear uniforms. Even students wear school uniforms for the same reason</MI1>. <SI1><EX>For example, when I wear a school uniform I behave more considerably than when I do not wear the school uniform</EX>. By wearing a certain type of clothes, we can do things more liably and cautiously. <TR>Therefore</TR> people are influenced by what they wear.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, the kind of clothes may make someone more active. <EX>For example, when I wear pants, I usually behave more actively than when I wear skirts</EX>. Many people feel like me so they usually wear pants when they have to do an active thing such as doing some exercises</MI2>. <SI2><TR>Also</TR>, a person wearing a casual cloth do work more actively than a person who is wearing a suit. <TR>Therefore</TR>, people may be affected by the type of clothing.</SI2></BO2><CO>To sum up, the type of clothes influences how people condut in various ways. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I strongly agree with the idea that different clothes influence the way people behave.</CO>
column23: This was an average quality essay. The thesis should have included a preview of the points that would be made. It did, however, include the author's hypothesis. There are a decent amount of transitions and the main and supporting points are wonderful. It would have bee nice if there had been a bit more fluidity in the essay and a more developed conclusion.

column1: 837&what are some of the qantitise of a good parent? Use specific details and examples explain your answer.

column23: This is an average quality essay. There are many great points made but without evidence or examples. The body paragraphs contained only the minimum of details. column1: 839&It has recently been announced that a new high school may be built in your community. Do you support or oppose this plan? Why? Use specific reasons and details in your answer.
column3: <IN><TR>In these days</TR>, many buildings are constructing such as a big department, a hospital, and a school. If it has recently been announced that a new high school may be built in our community, some people say that they disagree with that plan because it may cause some negative effects, such as high traffic jams, while others argue that it is good because our community certainly will be developed. Both opinions are reasonable. <TS><TR>However</TR>, <TR>in my opinion</TR>, I support a new high school will be built in our comunity because it helps our community to make a learning environment and gives us more business oportunities.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, if a new high school will be built in our community, our community could have a learning environment. There is no doubt that some academies and bookstores are accompanied to a new high school</MI1>. <EX>For example, a five years ago, a new middlle school was built near our community, and then some bars and builiards were disappeared. Our sons and daughters went back home directly after classes without any things luring them</EX>. <SI1><TR>Therefore</TR>, building a new highschool in our community enables our children to study hard.</SI1></BO1> <BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, to build a new high school in our community gives our community more business oppotunities. Building a new high school means that hundreds of people will be gathered in our community and we have hundreds of consumers. <TR>To illustrate</TR>, if a new high school will be built, obviously many students will be moved into our community, and then their families are moved into with them. We can earn a lot of money as building restaurants, arcades game rooms, and markets which will satisfy new neighbourhoods' wishes to buy something, eat outdoor, and enjoy entertainments</MI2>. <SI2><TR>Thus</TR>, the economy of our community will be developed in that there are many people spending money.</SI2></BO2> <CO>In conclusion, for the above-mentioned reasons, I agree that a new high school will be built in our community because I am sure that our community will have a learning environment and the economy of our commumity will be more lively with a number of people.</CO>
column23: This was an excellent essay. The thesis statement was develeped and complete. There were many transitions, though there could have been a few more. The main and supporting points were excellent.

column1: 840&It has been said. "Not everything that is learned is contained in books". Compare and contrat knowledge gained from experience with knowledge gained from books. In your opinion. which source is more important? Why?
column3: <IN><TS>A human being is a educational animal. Whether we want to learn or not, we learn something by seeing, feeling and hearing everytime. Some knowledge is gained from experiences and others can be gained from books. Which is a major method? Or which is more important? It's very difficult to answer it.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>Knowledge from experience, called Direct Knowledge, is remained in our brain long time. We can learn by heart. But it have great limit</MI1>. <SI1><EX>For example, we cannot eat poison to experience</EX>. And our lifetime is limited. So What we experience directly is limited.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>On the other hands</TR>, Indirect Knowledge which is gained from book is contrast with Direct Knowledge by all means. Advantage of Indirect Knowldege means disadvantage of direct Knowledge. Knowledge from book is various and no limit. It doesn't have limit for time or space. Book contains experience of another person</MI2>. <SI2><TR>From book</TR>, we can recognize and learn someting which we didn't experience. But such a knowledge is forgettable. If we don't repeat and recall continuously it, we would forget it soon. Both knowledges have a simility. Both of them are from experience.</SI2></BO2><CO>In result, Both knowledges have advantage and disadvantage. But if we should select one, knowledge gained from book is more important.</CO>
column23: This was a poorly written essay. The author is trying to be fancy and philosophical. Such an attempt would require a good grasp of the language, which the author is lacking. The essay was off topic because it only tried to introduce the topic. The whole essay could have been merged into one paragraph with the final sentence in the conclusion finally becoming the thesis statement. Proper grammar and word choice would have drastically shortened the body paragraphs. This is not an essay.

column1: 842&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? A zoo has no useful purpose. Use specific examples to explain your answer.

column1: 843&Do you agree or disagree with the following statements? All students should be required to study art and music in secondary school. Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>All students in secondary schools are forced to study art and music. There are some people against this policy while others take it for granted. I agree that all sudents are required to study those subejects in their secondary school because it is the best time to go through diverse things and to laern everything fast .</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Above all</TR>, the age of teens is the best time to experience a lot of various things as they are in the position of students. Once people get a job and have a family to support, they can hardly have enough time to enjoy what they want. Though most adults had studied hard to live a better life, their efforts to succeed do not stop even after achieving some high positon. They should try to improve themselves to survive in a competitive society, not being caught up with other people</MI1>. <SI1><TR>However</TR>, when in school, students can explore various fields freely and that will be a good chance to find out their talents in art and music.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Also</TR>, students can learn everything fast in their teens. Long before, when my 14-year-old sister started to learn how to plat the fluit, my 37-year-old aunt also did at the same time. <TR>However</TR>, as time goes by, they showed diffrent process of learning; my sister were getting superior to my aunt in playing the fluit</MI2>. <SI2><TR>As this exaple shows</TR>, it will be difficult for many adults to start something new after losing the well-timed opportunity. Studying art and music in their school time will be more effective learning after growing old.</SI2></BO2><CO>In conclusion, students can study art and music in their teens more freely and effectively. Secondary schools should be places that can help them to explore these areas freely and deeply.</CO>
column23: This was an average quality essay that was very mixed in its performance. The thesis was actually very nice except that it only implied the subjects of art and music. column1: 844&In the future, students may have the choice of studying at home by using technology such as computers or television or of studying at traditional schools. Which would you prefer? Use reasons and specific details to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>With development of TV and computer which provides us visual effect, nowdays we are getting used to utilize such technology to study. However we are still obligated to go to school as it has been from the past. <TS>I think that stubents should be allowed to study at home using visual material like TV because it can be comfortable way to study and I can concentrate on the subject by studying when I feel like to do.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>One reason I prefer to study at home is to do work more comfortable than in case of going to school.</MI1> <SI1>Every morning I have to hurry because I am used to oversleeping. I have to run not to lose subway on time and the metro is always crowded with so many people. It really makes me exhausted. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, I becomes so tired that I can't study hard at shool. I sometimes sleep during class. Also I have to take care of your looking whenever I go to school. Sometimes It can be streesful. <TR>On the other hand</TR>, if students study at home using some kinds of technology, they can save their time and they will be able to sleep enough. <TR>Moreover</TR>, they don't have to take the subway during rush hour. these things are why I suggest that students should study at home by computer or TV.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Another reason for my preferance studying at home is to concentrate on the subject I study.</MI2> <TR>In school</TR>, there's a same class schedule for everyone. <TR>As a result</TR> sometimes I have to study even when I feel sick or too sleepy.<TR> In this occasion</TR>, I can't focus on what teachers say and it is unefficient. <TR>However</TR>, when you study at home by using TV or computer, you can choose when you will study because you can just turn on the TV or computer if you are ready to study hard. <SI2>Since you can start studying when you feel like studying by youself, you will focus on the subject and it may be very useful method to undrestand what students are taught.</SI2></BO2><CO>To conclude, I think it is better for students to study at home seeing monitor of TV or computer. By doing like this, they can relax when they are studying and study efficiently compared to studying at traditional school. Students should remined that they are required to have self- determined attitude to study at home without teacher's help.</CO>
column23: This is an excellent essay. The thesis statement was develeped and complete. There were many transitions, though there could have been a few more. The main and supporting points were excellent.

column1: 845&Some people say that physical exercise should be a required part of school day. Other people believe thar students should spend the should school day on academic studies which opinion do you agree with. Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>When we went to school, the class for physical training is one of the many classes that we are essentially required. We had always looked forward to the time and we enjoyed the education allowed in the time. <TS>The waiting is the why that we could acquire not only pleasure but other benefits. <TR>Therefor</TR>, I strongly believe that physical exercise should be needed part of every school day. There are a couple of benefits for this.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>. physical healthy is related with mental healthy. <TR>That is to say</TR>, when physical healthy is getting good, mental healthy is also getting good</MI1>. <SI1>When students in school, after the class for physical activity, we could feel that our body became noticeably lighter and our heads became more clear.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, as mental ability improved when we have the physical training time is getting good, we can feel that our concentrated ability is gradually improved.</MI2> If concentrated ability is improved, it is proper that our learning ability is improved. <SI2><EX>For example, When our concentrated ability feel down, we stand up or move our body</EX>. Though this motion of small size, we can immediately feel that our head become clear.</SI2></BO2><CO>In summary, I insist that installing physical education be needed for students who study in school, because of the improvement of physical healthy as well as spiritual healthy.<TR> In other words</TR>, the more good our physical ability is, the more good our mental ability is. By having physical exercise, our students may obtain the improving of education ability and improve the overall quality of our society.</CO>
column23: This was an excellent essay. The thesis statement was develeped and complete. There could have been a few more transitions, and the grammar could have been fixed up a bit. Overall a great essay though.

column1: 846&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? It is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN><TS>As many subjects are in school, there are different preferences among students. It is the ancient belief that studying history and literature is more important than studying mathmatics and science, whereas others think the opposite for following reasons: wisdoms from our ancestors, being proud of their own root, and expression of individuality.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>The most important aspect from studying history is learning the life skills from our forefathers. Even if modern people have more convenient skills invented through science, the more useful skills exist in the ancient time</MI1>. <SI1><EX>For example, there are many pills maded through the ancient ways</EX>. <TR>Especially</TR>, in Korea, many doctors use some plants for the ingredients of pills, as our ancestors have.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Next</TR>, knowing their origins well makes people be proud of themselves.</MI2> <SI2>As they atudy history and its literature, they can be taught what people before them have done for them; it makes them to feel thankful for their ancestors and look up for the people ahead. <TR>Afterall</TR>, they feel how proud they feel about what they are.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>lastly</TR>, through the literature, people can reveal their expressions</MI3>. <SI3>Sonce long, if a country rules other countries, they tried to steal thier language and literature, which forms most of a culture.<TR> That is</TR>, the literature reveals individualities and thoughts so that the subordinate countries can think of the rebels less without their culture. <TR>Therefore</TR>, learning literature helps people show their own personal values and feelings.</SI3></BO3><CO><TR>As stated above</TR>, knowledges of living methods, self-proudness from one's origin, and individualities are gained by studying history and literature. <TR>As a matter of fact</TR>, you can find out more advantages about the learning these domian than the field of science or mathmetics. <TR>Thus</TR>, people should value more in learning history and literature than in sciense and mathematics, and try to gain such benefits though the study.</CO>
column23: This was a well written essay except that it was written for something other than the topic at hand. The thesis is for an informative essay about the evolution of subject matter in Korean schools. This is in contrast to the topic of what the author thinks is more important: history/lit vs math/science. This essay utterly fails at even touching this topic.

column1: 847&Do you agree or disagree with the following statememt? All students should be required to study art and music in secondary school. Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>In Korea</TR>, the secondary school students have to study art and music in school. Some people insist that students should not be required to study art and music in school. <TR> In my view</TR>, however, students have to attend music and art classes, because students can find their talents and develop cultual attainments through music and art classes.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, students can cultivate their cultual attainments. Modern society concentrates more and more on music and art. Imagine one person doesn't know about Picasso or Mozart. Even if he is a succesful besinessman or a famous scientist, people would laugh at him. To avoid such shameful situation, students should know about the art and music. They do not have to draw or play instruments very well, but they have to know about basic knowledge about art and music</MI1>. <SI1><TR>Additionally</TR>, students can get this knowledge most efficiently from school. <TR>Therefore</TR>, secondary schools have to require students to attend art and music classes.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Moreover</TR>, students can find out their talents in art and music though the classes<MI2>. <SI2>Sometimes, students do not know what talent they have. <TR>In this case</TR>, schools and teachers should give them chance to find out it. If we do not teach art and music in school, students who have talent in these field could not develop their talents, even in their whole lives. To give opportunity to find out student's hidden talent, we should oblige them to take music and art lessons.</SI2></BO2><CO>To sum up, there are advantages in learning music and art in two ways. One is for cultual attainments and the other is for finding hidden talents. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I agree with the idea that all students should be required to study art and music in secondary school. Enforcement is better than freedom in some cases.</CO>
column23: This was an above average quality essay. The thesis was strong and good. . There could have been a few more transitions to help the flow and a few more examples to give the points some weight. Otherwise, it was a great essay.

column1: 848&you have received a gift of money. The money is enough to buy either a piece of jewelry you like or tickets to a concert you want to attend. Which would you buy? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>When people get extra money, they are wonder how they use that money such as buying a piece of jewelry or tickets to a concert they like. Although buying a piece of jewelry is not a bad choice, tickets to a concert could give more benefits to people than just one accessory does. Without any hesitation, I would like to buy tickets of Jazz or rock concert that I have really want to go. Because tickets to a concert are giving us the advantages as the followings.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, concert tickets enable us to share precious moments with our loving family or friends. People sometimes could not remember when they had a meal with all their family members, and they feel indifference to each other</MI1>. <SI1><TR>For instance</TR>, I gave a musical ticket to my parents¡¯ wedding anniversary and our family members were felt we should make this kind of occasions often.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, the tickets could enrich our barren mind. Students or businessmen are hardly able to find their freedom and relax. They¡¯re just sitting on a couch and watching a Television on weekends. But taking participate in a concert would give them a moment to look back on themselves and some energy to refresh their soul<MI2>.<EX> For example, in a rock concert, people would shake their heads and sing together. While doing these, they could feel they are alive and energetic</EX>. <SI1>Also it¡¯s amazing to meet the stars on the face, not just on the Television.</SI1></BO1> <CO><TR>Therefore</TR>, tickets to a concert are more helpful to us as well as others. A piece of diamond would make people think that you are attractive, but there is no consideration for others.<TR> Additionally</TR>, people know that sharing a joy is better than bragging a diamond.</CO>

column1: 849&When people move to another country, some of them decide to follow the customs of the country. Others prefer to keep their own customs. Compare these two choices. Which one do you prefer? Support your answer with specific details.
column3: <IN><TS>Some new immigrants want to keep their customs, otherwise some try to follow customs of new country. It came from the differnce of preference of adopting culture. <TR>However</TR>, I think both of the ideas have own benefits. We can easily make our lives comfortable in new country by adopting new customs and keeping our origianl customs.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, when we see as a point of view of natives, by following native cultures they do not think us as strangers</MI1>. <SI1>That is, it makes easier to be familiar with new neighbors. If we make traditional food that makes strange odor, it can bother neighbors and it also causes some problems due to the difference of cultures. <TR>However</TR>, if we try to follow new customs like to have a B.B.Q party in the garden in the America, it makes easy to make friends.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Otherwise</TR>, there are some case when we want to keep our customs. Even though we try to follow new customs without hesitation, we sometimes have difficulties due to the homesick</MI2>. <SI2><EX>For example, if we finished hard work during a day, we need to take a rest without following new customs that normally bring a kind of stress</EX>. We can drink traditional alchohol and we can share traditional food with other immigrants. It would help a lot.</SI2><CO><TR>Shortly</TR>, it is difficult to live new country due to the difference of customs. <TR>But</TR>, if we should live under new customs, I would like to live with keeping my customs and following new customs together. By following new customs, I can be familiar with new neighbors and by keeping my customs, I can relax and take a rest that help to decline stresses.</CO>
column23: This is a below average quality essay. The author makes this essay very impersonal when it could have more effectively been written as personal.

column1: 850&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Television has destroyed communication among friends and family. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN>It is said that television is a necessary appliance of all families. Some people like to talk about TV shows, dramas, and news with their families and friends while others devote to watch TV without any conversation. <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, TV hinder the communication, especially among families because people spend too much time to watch TV and can't do anything when turning on TV, I think.</TS></IN> <BO1><MI1>Many people only watch TV when they don't work or study. TV even forces people to watch itself instead of conversation</MI1>. <SI1><EX>For example, children turn on TV even without saying "hi!" to their mother as soon as they come back from school</EX>. <TR>Without control</TR>, they usually watch TV until the time to sleep. <TR>As for adults</TR>, the situation is not different. <TR>On Sunday</TR>, Wives cannot talk with their husbands who are sitting on the couch watching football all day long. <TR>Similarly</TR>, TV forces people to spend too much spare time. So, they have no time to talk one another. </SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>People are not able to do anything when they watch TV</MI2>. <SI2>When interesting program is on TV, people don't want to be disturbed, especially by talking. My sister says that I should not talk to her whenever her favorite TV drama shows. <TR>Sometimes</TR>, my father doesn't eat dinner during documentary film time. He doesn't want to be disturbed. <TR>In short</TR>, TV make people so isolated that they don't have the opportunity to talk with their families. </SI2></BO2><CO>TV ruins the relationship among the families by take away their time to communicate and by forcing only to watch TV. Though TV gives us much entertainment and information, misuse of it results in isolated son, daughter, and parents. It must be true that TV is the present of the modern technology but it also must be true that TV blocks the way people communicate.</CO>
column23: This is a below average quality essay. The word choice and grammar are fairly poor. There are great ideas, but they don't flow together very well. A focus on structure would have been very good.

column1: 851&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Teachers should be paid according to how much their students learn. Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
column3: <IN><TS>Some people say that payment of teachers should be decided of their students learging becuase it is fair and can be a stimulus to teachers. Others insist that it is wrong because it is harmful to learning environment for students and work environment fot teachers. Teachers should be instructors about social behavior as well as various knowledge.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>I disagree the statement. When teachers are assessed by amounts of students learning</MI1>. <SI1>it could disturb for students to learn various knowledge and to learn moral behavior.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>First of all</TR>, it could disturb for students to learn various knowledge</MI2>. <SI2>Abilities of students might be measured by mid-term or final test. Thus, teachers would always be ready for tests. When students want to take courses which are not realated to the tests, they can not take them. <TR>For instance</TR>, courses such as experiments, music or sports could disappeared because there are lack of time to study math or English courses. <TR>Therefore</TR>, it could be harmful for students to study various courses. </SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Secondly</TR>, it could make immoral teachers</MI3>. The best way to be a eminent teacher is to improve the score of students.<TR> Thus</TR>, if students get a high score, teachers can pretend not to see the students cheatting. <SI3><TR>Futuermore</TR>, they sometimes use a lod. Students also could learn these immoral behavior. Thus, teachers and students could be immoral people more and ore. </SI3></BO3><CO>In conclusion, evaluating teachers by students scoring is wrong way. It could disturb for students to learn various knowledge and it could make immoral teachers and students. Students would be more intelligent people through variouos knowledge. <TR>Also</TR>, teachers should be a model of students about moral behavior.</CO>

column1: 852&Some people prefer to spend time with one or two close friends. Others choose to spend time with a large number of friends. Compare the advantages of each choice. Which of these two ways of spending time do you prefer? Use specific reasons to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>It is difficult to choose to spend time either with close friends or with many friends for me. Both of them have advantages respectively, spending time with close friends would make me more comfortable than with a lot of friends or spending with many friends enables to play games or sports. <TR>Thus</TR>, I do not have any preferance to spend time between with close friends and with a number of friends. It is decided by the situation that I have at that time.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, If I want to have sincere talking, I would call close friends and talk heartfully and try to get advices. In other words, by talking and revealing my secrets that have bothered myself to close friends, I can be comfortable because my close friends might understand me and try to help me</MI1>. <SI1><TR>Otherwise</TR>, when I am boring so I need to spend with chat or funny stroies, I would find many of my friends because more fun stories will be given in more friends.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, by gathering together with a lot of friends of mine, I can play a sport or a game that I want to enjoy at that time because it is possible to choose among sports or games</MI2>. <SI2><TR>However</TR>, If I want to spend time with one or two close friends of mine, I can play only computer games or watch television. <TR>Sometimes</TR>, in my case, I want to play computer games and learn from a close friends of mine because I hope to be good at those games.</SI2></BO2><CO><TR>That is</TR>, the way of spending time with whom is decided by my circumstance of at that time. I sometimes want to get funny stories to get rid of stress and want to say my secrets to get out of my trouble. <TR>Furthermore</TR>, when I want to group game, I try to gather many friends and when I want to enjoy and learn computer game, I find only close friends. <TR>Therefore</TR>, as I mentioned before, I would prefer to spend time with close friends or with many of my friends according to that circumstance.</CO>

column1: 856&Food is now easier to prepare. Is this a good thing?
column3: <IN><TS>People usually have three meals a day and they need much time to be prepared. The people in fast time could enjoy their cooking. The people in modern time, however, could not enjoy their cooking time because human society changed into busy world.</TS></IN>BO1><MI1>This busy atmosphere produced food easily prepared.</MI1> <SI1>Frozen food and instant food are good example of this. They dramatically shortened time to prepare food. I remember my mother spent many time to prepare food in the kitchen. She sacrificed her precious time for family meals. If she used frozen and instant food more frequently, she could save time for her own sake.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Basically main function of food is to supply nutrition for human. If we can obtain enough nutrition, the way of cooking does not matter. Some people insist that frozen and instant food use harmful ingredients for health of human body</MI2>. <SI2>I cannot totally ignore their warning. I, however, also believe that a product of instant food has been developed for safer food.</SI2></BO2><CO>Now we live in very busy world, and we are struggling with many works to do. Frozen and instant food will save our time, and it will help us to spend time to develop ourselves and complete our works.</CO>

column1: 858&In general, people are living longer now. Discuss the causes of this phenomenon. Use specific reasons and details to develop your essay.
column3: <IN><TS><TR>Nowadays</TR>, there are many people who are living longer around us and they occupy many part of population. Although there are numerous reasons for longevity,<TR> in my case</TR>, I think people are living longer thanks to advance of medicine and increasing interests in health.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, advance of medicine has caused people to live longer. <TR>In general</TR>, progress of medicine makes it possible for doctors to diagnose most diseases and cure a lot of them</MI1>. <SI1><EX>For example, in the past days, a cholera was one of fatal diseases. Thus doctors couldn't remedy it and many people died of it</EX>. <TR>However</TR>, thanks to advance of medicine, doctors can diagnose it and save our lives. If there weren't this improvement, longevity might not exist. </SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, increasing interests in health can influence on longevity. Most people want to live much longer without diseases, which cause them to exercise and eat food safe. <SI2><TR>For instance</TR>, in my country, many people spend their spare time on exercise such as running</MI2>. <TR>Also</TR>, they prefer a vegetable diet to animal diet for their health. <TR>Therefore</TR>, longevity is universal in my country. </SI2></BO2><CO>In conclusion, I think advance of medicine and increasing interests in health impact on longevity. Those might let people live longer than 100 years.</CO>

column1: 860&Holidays honor people or events. If you could create a new holiday, what person or event would it honor and how would you want people to celebrate it? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>There are hundreds of holidays which many people regard them as sacred or honorable. <TS>Also people who celebrate them are all different by cultures, nations, or religions. For my country, I think there should be a remarkable holiday, the World Cup Celebration Day. It remembers the successful World Cup event held in 2002.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1>The first reason is that the event improved Korea's worldwide status as one of the most important nations in the world. There were many events that improved Korea's position before World Cup</MI1>. <SI1><EX>For example, the 88 Seoul Olympics was the biggest national event since the Korean government has been established</EX>. <TR>However</TR>, the World Cup replaced it. There were many improvements in economics, tourism, and even education during this campaign.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>Second reason is that the worldwide soccer festival brought all Koreans into one. They like computer game or TV program which are violent rather than books. My 8 years old brother also play computer game like star craft whenever he meet with his friends. One day my father bought him an interesting science book and he was very pleased with that gift. Because the book was about mysteries about nature and my brother always had a curiocity about that, he spent time reading instead of watching TV. I think it's important that having good reading habit fome one's childhood so I will give a child books to develop their reading habit.</SI1></BO1> <BO2><MI2>Another reason is to teach them about history or science naturally by reading books. Books contain lots of useful information about the topic they have. Instead of studying and memorizing, they can approach important facts with amusement. Books for children may have funny pictures in it or they can be a cartoon</MI2>. <SI2>These factors will make children to pay attetion to the story, and children will learn lots of things that can help them know more about world they live.</SI2></BO2><CO>As a result I would like to give children books which have some advantages: contribute to good reading habit and help them to get various knowledge easily. <TR>Moreover</TR>, we need to choose suitable book for children.</CO>

column1: 866&"When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing to do with success." Do you agree or disagree with the quotation above? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your position.
column3: <IN>I agree that success has something to do with hard work. Although the use of a couple of example and specific explanation, I will demonstrate why the effort could bring out success.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, endeavor is related to success to which you want.</MI1> <SI1>Some peolpe hope that they gain some knowledge to which they want without effort. <EX>In my case,I got a score "C" in my math class. Since he listened about his fortune-teller's word, he had always lived idle. <TR>Then</TR>, he had failed his business. <TR>Therefore</TR>, we have to hard work, because a fortune is a superstitious element.</SI2></BO2> <CO>In summary, success is not a result of luck, but a result of effort. column1: 868&A university plans to develop a new research center in your country. Some people want a center for business research. Other people want a center for research in agriculture (farming). I think that latter is more desirable choice in terms of my country¡¯s condition.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>As everybody know</TR>, my country is one of the biggest country that produce various crops include rice.</MI1> <SI><TR>But</TR>, now many peasants have undergone through the influx of other countries crops. Foreign crops are cheaper than ours. <SI1><TR>So</TR>, my countries have to develop the technology of agriculture such as agricultural economy, agricultural productivity. If we not, our agricultural industry might be breakdown.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2>The breakthrough of agricultural technology can make possible to compete against our countries.</MI2> <SI2>With the research of agricultural techniques, we might be export our excellent seeds and then, our foreign currency holdings increase. This will make our country more abundant. <TR>Moreover</TR>, we can deal with the tendency of world crop market very well.</SI2></BO2> <CO>In conclude, agriculture research center can bring us with benefits what I mentioned above. column1: 869&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing games teaches us about life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN>People may think that playing games is for fun. <TS><TR>However</TR>, this activity can be not only for fun but also for learning something about our life. <TR>Thus</TR>, I agree that playing games teaches us about life. There are three major reasons supporting my agreement.</TS></IN> <BO1><MI1><TR>At first</TR>, people can learn cooperation through playing games.</MI1> <SI1>Even though there are some games which do not need cooperation such as video games, most games need to be organized with other members. <TR>To have a good result</TR>, each member needs to obtain cooperation from other members.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, what playing games teaches people is leadership.</MI2> <SI2>As I said above, to play games, a team should be organized. In this process, all of the members may feel that they need someone to lead their team, and a leader can be elected. The person who is elected as leader should consider and decide how he is going to lead the team of which he is in charge. By the process of consideration and decision, the person in charge of leading a team can learn leadership.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>The last one I want to say is people can experience and prepare what they do not directly belong to in real life.</MI3> <SI3>The more technology develops, the more some games such video games as Monopoly, Simcity become able to allow people to experience various situations. These kinds of games cannot reflect the real world, exactly. <TR>Nevertheless</TR>, we can learn, even a bit, many business skills through the game, Monopoly, and we can learn how much difficult city mayor¡¯s work is through the game, Simcity.<TR> Thus</TR>, people are able to have a experience of proxy.</SI3></BO3><CO>In conclusion, because of three reasons I mentioned above, cooperation, leadership and proxy experience, I would like to agree and say that playing games can be good method for people to learn about life.</CO>

column1: 870&Some people think governments should spend as much money as possible exploring outer space (for example, traveling to the Moon and to other planets). Other people disagree and think governments should spend this money for our basic needs on Earth. Which of these two opinions do you agree with? Use specific reasons and details to support your answer.
column3: <IN>Human beings have faced radical development ever since the industrial revolution and, with the high technologies developed, are now able to go far outer space. <TS><TR>However</TR>, because the exploring outer space costs astronomically high, we often come to think about it's worth.<TR> In my opinion</TR>, it's not good idea to spend so much money on exploring outer space with so much problem in the Earth such as famine, needs of substitutional resources, and etc.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>Firstly</TR>, one of the most urgent problems we are facing is famine.</MI1> <SI1>So many people around the world, especially in Africa, are dying from starvation. If the innumerous money is partly spent for those starving people. it would be more than enough to save all those dying people, and I'm sure that it is much more important and urgent than wasting the big money on exploring outer space which is even proven to be almost impossible.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, another urgent problem is that the current natural resources we are depending on can not last long enough to support our future needs.</MI2> <SI2>According to a research, petroleum, the most crucial fuel we are depending on will be depleted in no later than fifty years. Which means new development of substitutional resource to petroleum is inevitable. <TR>Thus</TR> I think it would be better idea to spend the money on developing the substitutional resource.</SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Lastly</TR>, many people think that the exploration of outer space would help find a planet like earth.</MI3> <SI3><TR>But</TR>, unfortunately, it's proven that the percentage of the earth-like planets' existance is almost zero because of the large gap between times. <TR>Therefore</TR> I think it would be more profitable to focus on practical things.</SI3></BO3><CO>To summarize, instead of spending the money on exploring outer space, it would be more practially helpful to spend the money for starving people, development of substitutional resource and other important matters.</CO>
column23: This was an above average quality essay. The thesis was strong and good. . There could have been a few more transitions to help the flow and a few more examples to give the points some weight. Otherwise, it was a great essay.

column1: 871&How do movies or television influence people's behaviors? Use reasons and specific examples to explain your answers.
column3: <IN><TS>We acquire much information through movies or television. <TR>However</TR>, have you ever thought about the positive effect and negative effect they give us? We have taken it for granted that we spend a great deal of time watching TV or movies, but now we should think over the influence of them.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can think the positive influence. Now we live in the Information Age, so it is necessary for us to have enough information to keep up our society.</MI1> <TR>However</TR>, we have limited time to approach that kind of information, because we are busy making money to keep our life. In this situation, TV or movies can provide us with a variety of information concerning our job or our life. <SI1><EX> For example, there is a person who works for an animation company</EX>. <SI1>Usually he needs time to create a new character, but he does not have much time to imagine. So by watching TV or movies, he can get a new idea and intuition</SI1></BO1>. <BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, in spite of this positive effect by TV or movies, many people are worried about the negative influence.</MI2> <SI2>They say there are many kinds of programs on TV or movies our adolescents should not watch. Although these programs should not be permitted to seen by the young, in reality, our young generation are exposed to those programs very easily. <TR>AS a result</TR>, they do not think serious about the crime that happen in the real world. <TR>Rather</TR>, they become to lose the sense of criticism about violence more and more.</SI2></BO2><CO>In short, we can use TV or movies as the medium for getting the new information, when using them, we should consider their negative influence on young generation. <TR>By doing that</TR>, we can overcome the negative effect of TV or movies, become the wise users to get useful information.</CO>

column1: 873&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Parents are the best teachers. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>It cannot be said that all parents are good. Some parents leave their children alone even though they need extreme care. While others are so good that they bring their children up in special care. Regardless of parents' character, however, parents are the absolute teachers of children's life because the early education of parents judges children's character and children behave alike their parents for their whole life.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, parents educate their children when they are babies and that makes their character for whole life.</MI1> <SI1>Babies don't have any knowledge or feeling of the real world. From parents' education, they come to know 'the world' little by little. <EX>I've heard, for example, that my parents often spoke English when I was a baby</EX>. <TR>Thus</TR> I am more familiar to English than Korean friends of mine whose parents cannot speak English at all, I think. <TR>In short</TR>, only their parents can give the early education which influences on children's whole life.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, children usually behave in the same manner as the way their parents do.</MI2> <SI2>Children tend to imitate their parents. They try to say, walk, eat and drink alike their parents. <TR>In fact</TR>, I have a habit that I eat very fast. I learned that habit from my father who eat and drink faster that any other families. Though I have tried to fix my bad habit, I still eat as fast as my father. <TR>Briefly to say</TR>, parents should not behave in the wrong way because their children reflect that behavior.</SI2></BO2><CO>To conclude, It is true that children are the mirror of their parents. Children are easily affected by parents' education in their early age and they try to do alike their parents. Early education and imitation are the basic components of teaching children. So it is thought that parents are the best teachers and guides of their whole life.</CO>

column23: This was an average quality essay. The essay was a bit off topic because it was supposed to be concerned with what one would take, not what one would do. column1: 880&do you agree or disagree with the following statement? it is more important for students to study history and literature than it is for them to study science and mathematics. Use specific reasons and example to support your opinion.

I will give you the reasons that I am devoting my youngth to math and why it is important than history and literature</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, history and literature are vary subject.</MI1> <SI1>though I think the war between south korea and north korea necessary, you may think it useless and just hurting history. and anyone can decide which one is right or not. so history always change. one day a person lived two hundred years ago is regarded a great man, but the other day he is a extremely bad man. we can't be certain what we have studied. and become confused. but mathematics teach only accurate and not changeable. once we learned it, it will give you a constant standard about something till you die.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, literature is only a problem of your heart.</MI2> <SI2>it express what you feel, what makes you sad or happy. sometimes it is useful and make us realize something, but it is not essential in our life or survival. but science is essential element in our life. what makes you warm in winter and cool in summer? does literature give you the solution? we can enrich our life by studying science not literature.</SI2></BO2><CO>In summary science or mathematics makes you learn object and constant things, so suggests a standard for solving problems. and makes your life more comfortable and convenient. but literature or history is a collection of subject and changable stories. and those can't make your life comfortable. so it is more important for students to study science and mathematics than it is for them to study history and literature.</CO>

column1: 881&Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Playing games teaches us about life. Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
column3: <IN><TS>People may think that playing games is for fun. However, this activity can be not only for fun but also for learning something about our life. <TR>Thus</TR>, I agree that playing games teaches us about life. There are three major reasons supporting my agreement.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>At first</TR>, people can learn cooperation through playing games.</MI1> <SI1>Even though there are some games which do not need cooperation such as video games, most games need to be organized with other members. <TR>To have a good result</TR>, each member needs to obtain cooperation from other members.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Secondly</TR>, what playing games teaches people is leadership.</MI2> <SI2><TR>As I said above</TR>, to play games, a team should be organized. <TR>In this process</TR>, all of the members may feel that they need someone to lead their team, and a leader can be elected. The person who is elected as leader should consider and decide how he is going to lead the team of which he is in charge. By the process of consideration and decision, the person in charge of leading a team can learn leadership. </SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3>The last one I want to say is people can experience and prepare what they do not directly belong to in real life.</MI3> <SI3>The more technology develops, the more some games such video games as Monopoly, Simcity become able to allow people to experience various situations. These kinds of games cannot reflect the real world, exactly. <TR>Nevertheless</TR>, we can learn, even a bit, many business skills through the game, Monopoly, and we can learn how much difficult city mayor¡¯s work is through the game, Simcity. <TR>Thus</TR>, people are able to have a experience of proxy.</SI3></BO3><CO>In conclusion, because of three reasons I mentioned above, cooperation, leadership and proxy experience, I would like to agree and say that playing games can be good method for people to learn about life</CO>

column1: 886&How do movies or television influence people's behaviors? Use reasons and specific examples to explain your answers.
column3: <IN>We acquire much information through movies or television. <TS><TR>However</TR>, have you ever thought about the positive effect and negative effect they give us? We have taken it for granted that we spend a great deal of time watching TV or movies, but now we should think over the influence of them.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First</TR>, we can think the positive influence.</MI1> <SI1>Now we live in the Information Age, so it is necessary for us to have enough information to keep up our society. However, we have limited time to approach that kind of information, because we are busy making money to keep our life. <TR>In this situation</TR>, TV or movies can provide us with a variety of information concerning our job or our life. <EX>For example, there is a person who works for an animation company</EX>. Usually he needs time to create a new character, but he does not have much time to imagine. So by watching TV or movies, he can get a new idea and intuition.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, in spite of this positive effect by TV or movies, many people are worried about the negative influence.</MI2> <SI2>They say there are many kinds of programs on TV or movies our adolescents should not watch. Although these programs should not be permitted to seen by the young, in reality, our young generation are exposed to those programs very easily. <TR>AS a result</TR>, they do not think serious about the crime that happen in the real world. <TR>Rather</TR>, they become to lose the sense of criticism about violence more and more.</SI2></BO2><CO>In short, we can use TV or movies as the medium for getting the new information, when using them, we should consider their negative influence on young generation. <TR>By doing that</TR>, we can overcome the negative effect of TV or movies, become the wise users to get useful information</CO>

column3: <IN>A parent has many tasks which are included with teaching there children, nursing him, and so on. <TS>So, they need to have some of quality of a parent, because it determines your success for teaching or nursing children. These qualities are endurance, moderate mind, and objective.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, endurance is necessary for a good parent.</MI1> <SI1>Children who don't know everything often have a mistake. Therefore his parent talk to about there mistake, but they would not understand it or they would forget it if they would understand then. If their parent have not endurance, they will mislead their children. But, if a parent have endurance so they have a time, they will conceive their mistake and amend their behaving.</SI1></BO1>BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, moderate mind is necessity. It seems that a parent anger, because they see children's unwanted doing</MI2>. <SI2><EX>For example, he robs good of their friends or he fights with their friends</EX>. Moderate mind hinder that you are irritated so you can teach their children about goodness or not.</SI2></BO2> <BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR>, I think that objective is necessary factor for a parents.</MI3> <SI3>You might have a chance of comparing your children with other's him. Or, you might have to decide who are right. If a parents is not objective, they will teach a wrong way to their children. Therefor their children have a unfair view of world</SI3></BO3>. <CO>In this regard, the qualities of good parent are essential. <TR>Especially<TR>, endurance, moderate mind, and objective are the important qualities. If these qualities are a parents, their parent have an ability of teaching for children to have a right way.</CO>

column1: 890&What are some of the qualities of a good parent? Use specific details and examples to explain your answer
column3: <IN><TS>In modern society, many people don't want to raise their children, because of economic systems , time which can be lost by children and difficulties to be a good parent. In that case, if they really want to be a good parent, they must satisfy some qualities such as open mind, love, not struggling. The detail things are as follows.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>First of all</TR>, they who want to be a profit parent must have open mind.</MI1> <SI1>When they raise a child, they sometimes complain about their children' mistake or bad habbits. Whenever they scold their children. their family break down step by step. I know a person who have a bad boy. He, however, understand the boy. He thought first like this "What is the reason that the boy act badly". <TR>Finally</TR> he can understand the boy, then he forgive the boy. <TR>In that case</TR>, the boy alway thinks himself again. I think that it is essential thing to be a good friend.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>Second</TR>, parent must have love.</MI2> <SI2>As many people already know, if someone were the richest person in the world, he should think that he could do everything except the emotion including love. It is definately right. He cannot buy love. If parents want to be a good man, they must have love. In korea saying, " A good family consists of love between parents and their children. If parents have love, the children grow rightly. In other words, the children will not be a bad person such as murder , robber and so on. </SI2></BO2><BO3><MI3><TR>Third</TR>, but not least, parents never struggle each other. Father and mother is the base of the family. If they fight each other all the time, their children learn from parents about the struggling. When their children grow up and they are profit age to go elementary school or higher school, their children's first doing is fighting with their friends, not study their subjects</MI3>.<SI3> It is very important things. Fighting each other is a kind of evil to the young people.</SI3></BO3> <CO>In summary, being a good parent is difficult thing. However parents have a essential things such as open mind, love to the children and not fighting. In korea saying, " The famous person alway produce in a good family " and " The good family makes up of love each other" I strongly agree these sayings. If parents really want to be a good father and mother, the solution is located by their nearest part.</CO>

column1: 891&You have the opportunity to visit a foreign country for two weeks. Which country would you like to visit ? Use specific reasons and details to explain your choice.
column3: <IN>It is interesting to talk about which country I would like to visit when I have the opportunity to visit a foreign country for two weeks. Opinion about which foreign country people want to visit(=the issue) can be different depending on individuals. <TS><TR>In my opinion</TR>, I would like to visit the United states for two reasons. <TR>First</TR>, I can meet my sister. <TR>Second</TR>, it is the place that I can never forget.</TS></IN><BO1><MI1><TR>To begin with</TR>, if I go to the U.S.A., I can see my pretty sister who is studying there.</MI1> <SI1>Before she left for it, she and I had spent a lot of happy time by(while) going to the movies, swimming, skiing, and climbing a mountain. What was better, we also advised each other about many problems. <TR>However</TR>, I cannot do such anything at all now. <TR>Of course</TR>, even though I can communicate with her over the phone or by computer' messenger, it is difficult because of having different time each other. I would like to know how her health is and what her house looks like. I love and miss her too much. <TR>Therefore</TR>, I will go to the United states to see my sister during given two weeks.</SI1></BO1><BO2><MI2><TR>In addition</TR>, the Grand Canyon made me change some part of my life style.</MI2> <SI2>When I was and University student, I traveled the United stats here and there for one month. <TR>Of them</TR>, the Grand Canyon has the grand, huge, and wide spectacle with the figure as natural state is and the memory remains still in my mind. The Grand Canyon made me (to) realize that I had lived in a small world without expanding my view of the world. <TR>After that</TR>, I came to have an active and challenging position in my life more and more, and now I try to do so.</SI2></BO2> <CO>In conclusion, if I become to have two weeks for a foreign trip, I will go to the United states. That is because I want to see my one and only sister and because I want to go to the Grand Canyon where it gives me help in my life again.</CO>
